mt0: <pad> In April, Spanish authorities seized a yacht belonging to Russian oligarch Viktor Vekselberg, the owner of the Russian conglomerate Renova Group.</s>

en: Last week, the U.S. House of Representatives passed a measure that would allow the U.S. government to sell forfeited Russian properties worth more than $2 million for the benefit of Ukraine.
sna: Svondo rakapera,  dare revamiririri reU.S. House of Representatives rakatendera danho raizotendera hurumende yeU.S. kuti itengese nzvimbo nezvivakwa zvakatorerwa zvinoto zvekuRussia zvinokosha mari inodarika mamiriyoni maviri emadhora, mari yacho igobatsira Ukraine.
mt0: <pad> Mumwedzi wapera, House of Representatives yeUnited States yakapinda mutongo unobvumira U.S. gov't kutengesa zvinhu zveRussia zvakarembwa zvinokosha $2 million kuitira kuti Ukraine inobatirwa.</s>

en: The measures next step is the Senate.
sna: Danho iri ramirira kuti ribvumirwe nedare ranasorojena, kana kuti Senate.
mt0: <pad> Mitemo yacho inozoenda kuSeneti.</s>

en: (Some information in this report comes from Reuters.)
sna: (Chimwe chikamu chezvinyorwa izvi chakabva kuReuters.)
mt0: <pad> (Mamwe mashoko ari munyaya ino anobva kuReuters.)</s>

en: WHO Report Says COVID Cases Decline, Except in Americas, Africa
sna: Chinyorwa Chezvakabuda Mutsvakurudzo Che WHO Chinoti Vanhu Vari Kubatwa neCOVID Hwoderera, Kunze Kwenyika dzemudunhu reAmerica, Africa
mt0: <pad> WHO Report Says COVID Cases Decline, Except in Americas, Africa, Asia and Australia</s>

en: The World Health Organization said Wednesday that the number of newly reported coronavirus cases and deaths globally continued to fall in the last week, continuing a decline that began in March.
sna: Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rose reWorld Health Organization rakati neChitatu kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa kekutanda nedenda re coronavirus nendufu dzacho pasi rose dzakaramba dzichidzikira svondo rakapera, richiteedzera kuderera kwakatanga munaKurume.
mt0: <pad> The World Health Organization inotaura kuti nhamba yenyaya dzinotangazve dzeCOVID-19 uye rufu pasi rese yakaramba ichipfuura mumavhiki apfuura, vachienderera mberi kuderera kwakatanga kubva muna March.</s>

en: In its weekly report on the pandemic, the U.N. health agency said there were about 3.8 million new infections and more than 15,000 deaths last week, a 17% and 3% drop on the week respectively.
sna: Muzvinyorwa zvetsvakurudzo dzaro dzinobuda svondo rega rega, sangano iri, riri chikamu chemubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rese chichiona nezvehutano rakati kune vanhu vangasvika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kekutanga uyewo nendufu dzinodarika zviuru gumi nezvishanu svondo rakapfuura, kuderera kwezvikamu gumi nezvinomwe kubva muzana pane vakarwara nechirwere ichi kekutanga, nekudererawo wezvikamu zvitatu kubva muzana kwendufu musvondo irori.
mt0: <pad> In its weekly report on the pandemic, the UN health agency said there were about 3.8 million new infections and more than 15,000 deaths last week, a 17% and 3% drop on the week respectively.</s>

en: But those figures are believed to be a significant underestimate of COVID-19's true toll as increasing numbers of countries abandon widespread testing and surveillance.
sna: Asi huwandu uhwu hwunofungidzirwa kuti hwakanyanya kuderedzwa zvachose kwekurwarisa nekuuraya kuri kuita COVID-19 sezvo nyika dziri kungoramba dzichiwedzera pahuwandu hwadzo dzakanda pasi tsika yekuongorora ropa revanhu uyezve nekuronda nekuongorora kaupararira kwedenda iri.
mt0: <pad> Asi izvo zvikamu zvinofungidzirwa kuti zviri kuedza kunyengera zvakanyanya kufamba kweCOVID-19 sezvo nyika dzakawanda dzichisiya kuongorora uye kuona chirwere ichi.</s>

en: Still, WHO noted that cases rose by about a third in Africa and 13% in the Americas.
sna: Zvakadaro, WHO yakaona kuti hurwere hwakawedzera nechikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu muAfrica uyewo nezvikamu gumi nezvitatu kubva muzana munyika dziri mudunhu reAmerica.
mt0: <pad> Zvisinei, WHO yakataura kuti matenda akawanda muAfrica akawedzera neimwe nhengo ye3 % uye muAmericas ne13%.</s>

en: There was also a nearly 70% jump in deaths reported in India, although that was attributed to delayed reporting rather than a recent surge of disease.
sna: Pakavawo nekusvetuka chaiko kwendufu dzakaziviswa vezvehutano muIndia, kunyangwe hazvo izvi zvakanzi kwaiva kunonoka kutaurira vezvehutano pamusoro pendufu, kusati kuri kuwedzera kwedenda.
mt0: <pad> Kune zvakare 70% kusimukira kwekufa kwakataurwa muIndia, kunyange zvazvo izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekutadza kunyoresa kwete kuita kuti chirwere chiwedzere.</s>

en: Last week, authorities in South Africa said they had noted an uptick in COVID-19 cases attributable to the BA.4 mutant of omicron, although they said it was too early to tell if that would result in a significant new wave of disease.
sna: Svondo rakadarika, vakuru muSouth Africa vakati vakaona kuti pakaita kusimukira kwevanhu vanedenda reCOVID-19 zvinzi zvaibva kumhando yechirwere inonzi BA.4 iyo inonzi yakabukira kubva mu omicron, iyo inoratidza kuti ine hukasha hwekupararira nekukurumidza kudarika omicron, kunyangwe hazvo pasati pava nenguva yakakwana yekuongorora kuti izvi zvaizoreva kuti paizova nekupararira kutsva kwedenda iri kune mutsindo.
mt0: <pad> Mumwedzi wapera, vakuru veSouth Africa vakataura kuti vakaona kuwedzera kwenyaya dzeCOVID-19 dzinobva kurudzi rweomicron BA.4, asi vakati zvakare zvaiva zviri masikati kuti vazive kana izvi zvichakonzera chirwere chitsva chinonyanya kuipa.</s>

en: Although the BA.4 version of COVID-19's omicron variant appears more infectious than omicron, WHO said there was no evidence yet that it was leading to substantially higher rates of hospitalization or death.
sna: Kunyangwe hazvo BA.4 iyo yakabukira kubva omicron inovawo davi reCOVID-19 richiratidza kuva nehasha yekupararira nekukasira kudarika omicron, WHO yakati pakange pasina humboo hwairatidza kuti yakange ichibva yakonzera kuwedzera kwevarwere vaiendeswa kuzvipatara kana kuwanda kwendufu. there was no evidence yet that it was leading to substantially higher rates of hospitalization or death.
mt0: <pad> Anyway, WHO said there was no evidence yet that the BA.4 version of COVID-19's omicron variant appears more infectious than omicron, WHO said there was no evidence yet that it was leading to substantially higher rates of hospitalization or death.</s>

en: Salim Abdool Karim, a public health expert at the University of KwaZulu-Natal, said that while only a "modest" rise in cases had been noted, South Africa was also in the middle of a holiday period and testing had dropped significantly.
sna: Salim Abdool Karim, nyanzvi inoona nezvehutano hweveruzhinji ichishandira paUniversity of KwaZulu-Natal, akati kunyangwe paive nekuwedzera "kwakadzikama" muhuwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa nedenda kwakaonekwa, South Africa yakange iri pakati penguva yezororo uyewo kuongororwa kuti vanhu vane chirwere here kwakange kwaderera zvikuru.
mt0: <pad> Salim Abdool Karim, nyanzvi yehutano hwevanhu paUniversity of KwaZulu-Natal, akati kunyange zvazvo "kusimudzwa kwakaderera" kwakanga kwaonekwa, South Africa yaivawo mukutanga kwekupedza nguva yezororo uye kuongororwa kwainge kwakadzikira zvikuru.</s>

en: He said the cases were slowing and were "not following a rocket-like upward trajectory we would expect" in another spike of disease.
sna: Akati huwnadu hwevanhu vane denda hwakange huchiratidza kudzikira uye "hwusingatevedzeri kutushikira kuenda mudenga sechitendemuseresere zvatinotarisira" panowedzera kupararira kweimwewo mhando yechirwere.
mt0: <pad> He said cases were slowing and were "not following a rocket-like upward trajectory we would expect" in another spike of the disease.</s>

en: At a press briefing on Wednesday, WHO emergencies chief Dr. Michael Ryan said it was too soon to tell if COVID-19 was entering a seasonal pattern and warned against countries dropping all of their restrictions too quickly as many in the West have done.
sna: Pachiitiko chekutura mashoko kuvatapi venhau neChitatu, mukuru anoona nezvetsaona nenjodzi Dr. Michael Ryan akati zvinenge zvakurumidzirwa kuti vanhu vagone kunyatsoona kuti COVID-19 yange yatora mutoo wekuwanda mukati memwaka yegore, uyewo vakayambira nyika dzavakurerutsa matanho ekudzivirira denda iri nekukasira sezvakaitwa nenyika zhinji dzekumavirira.
mt0: <pad> At a press briefing on Wednesday, WHO emergency director Dr. Michael Ryan said it was too soon to tell if COVID-19 was entering a seasonal pattern and warned against countries dropping all of their restrictions too quickly as many in the West have done.</s>

en: The jury is still out as to how seasonal this virus will become, he said, explaining that it wasn't proven yet that COVID-19 would naturally drop off in the summer and that the world could yet face more unsettling variants.
sna: Hazvisati zvava pachena kuti denda iri richange richitevedza mwaka yegore here, vakadaro, vachitsnangura kuti zvakange zvisati zvaratidzwa nehumboo hunoibatika kuti COVID-19 yazoderera yega munguva yezhizha vakati nyika dzepasi rose dzaigona kusangana nedzimwe mhando dzedenda iri dzinovhundutsa.
mt0: <pad> The jury is still out as to how seasonal this virus will become, he said, explaining that it wasn't proven yet that COVID-19 would naturally drop off in the summer and that the world could yet face more unsettling variants.</s>

en: "If people are crowded together in conditions where a new variant is spreading, you will see high levels of transmission," he said.
sna: "Kana vanhu vakaminyana mumamiriro ezvinhu ekuti mhando itsva yedenda iri kupararira, uchazoona kuwanda kuzhinji kwekutarirana nekupararira kwechirwere," akadaro.
mt0: <pad> "Kana vanhu vakawanda vari pamwechete mumamiriro ezvinhu ekuti mumwe muenzaniso wava kupararira, unoona zvikamu zvakakwirira zvekuendesa," akadaro.</s>

en: Meanwhile in China, authorities continued to crack down on cities, including Beijing, where more than 10% of the subway system was shut down in an effort to curb the virus' spread, after authorities in the capital already closed down indoor dining, gyms and school classes.
sna: Zvichadaro kuChina, vakuru vakaenderera mberi kumhanikidzira matanho ekuderedza kupararira kwedenda zvine chisimba mumaguta, kusanganisira Beijing, umo zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvenjanji dzezvitima zvinofamba nepasi pezvivakwa nemigwagwa zvakavharwa mukuedza kuderedza kupararira kwedenda iri, mushure mekunge vakuru muguta guru vakange vatofanovharisa kudyiwa kwechikafu mudzimba dzinotengesa zvokudya, nzvimbo dzinotatatmurwa miviri nekudzidziswa kwevana vari muzvikoro.
mt0: <pad> Zvichakadaro, hurumende yeChina yakaramba ichidzikamisa maguta, kusanganisira Beijing, uko 10% yesubway system yakanga yakavharwa muedza rekurwisa kufamba kwechirwere, mushure mekunge hurumende yeBeijing yakavhara indoor dining, gyms uye makirasi emakoroche.</s>

en: In Shanghai, rigid and widely derided restrictions have led to shortages of food and medical aid along with a wider though likely temporary impact on the national economy.
sna: MuShanghai, matanho akaomarara asi achishoorwa nevanhu vazhinji ari kunzera kushaikwa kwezvekudya nerubetsero rwezvemishonga pamwe chete nekukanganisika kwezvehupfumi hwenyika kunyange hazvo izvi zvisingazogare kwenguva refu.
mt0: <pad> In Shanghai, rigid and widely derided restrictions have led to shortages of food and medical aid along with a wider though likely temporary impact on the national economy.</s>

en: Desperate, outraged citizens have confronted authorities at barricades and online, screamed out of their windows and banged pots and pans in a sign of frustration and anger.
sna: Vagari vemuguta vashayaiwa zano asi vakatsamwa chose, vakamisidzana nemapurisa akange akaisa zvinhu mumigwagwa zvinodzivisa vanhu kufamba, uyewo nepamadandemutande vachisheedzera kubva mumafafitera edzimba dzavo, nekurova mapoto senzira yekugumbuka nekushaya zvekuita.
mt0: <pad> Vanhu vakasuruvara, vakagumburwa vakaedza kuita hurumende pazvipatara uye online, vachichema kubva mumawindo uye vachirova mapoto nemapans sechiratidzo chekunyara uye kushungurudzika.</s>

en: Myanmar Supreme Court Rejects Aung San Suu Kyi Appeal on Corruption Charges
sna: Dare  Repamusoro remuMyanmar Rinokandira Kunze Chikumbiro Cha Aung San Suu Kyi Kuti Nyaya Dzaarikupomerwa Dzehuori Dzitarisiswezve
mt0: <pad> Myanmar Supreme Court Rejects Aung San Suu Kyi Appeal on Corruption Charges</s>

en: An appeal of a five-year jail sentence against ousted Myanmar leader Aung San Suu Kyi was rejected Wednesday by the country's supreme court.
sna: Chikumbiro chemutungamiriri we Myanmar uyo akabviswa pachigaro, Aung San Suu Kyi chekuongororwazve kwekutongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore mashanu chakarambwa neChitatu nedare repamuso remunyika iyi.
mt0: <pad> Aung San Suu Kyi's appeal of a five-year jail term was rejected Wednesday by the country's supreme court.</s>

en: The decision reportedly came as soon as the claim for an appeal was lodged, and the court didn't entertain arguments from either side in the case.
sna: Kutonga kwedare uku kunonzi kwakaturwa mapepa ekuti nyaya iyi iongororwe achangounzwa, uye dare iri rakaramba kunzwa zvachose zvaitaurwa nevachuchusi vehurumende nemagweta aSuu Kyi.
mt0: <pad> Mwari anonzi akaita chinhu ichi nenguva pfupi mushure mekunge chikumbiro chekuchema chiri lodged, uye nyaya yacho haina kuitwa kuti vanhu vaviri ava vaite izvi.</s>

en: Suu Kyi, 76, was sentenced last week after being found guilty of 11 counts of corruption, including taking a bribe of cash and gold bars worth $600,000.
sna: Amai Suu Kyi, vane makore makumi manomwe nematanhatu vakatongwa svondo rakapera mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva gumi neimwe dzehuori, kusanganisira kutambira mari yefufuro nemagodo egorodhe ane hukoshi hunodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu emadhora.
mt0: <pad> Suu Kyi, 76, akatongerwa vhiki rapfuura mushure mekuonekwa ari mhosva ye11 mabasa ecorruption, kusanganisira kubatana nemari uye zvimedu zvegoridhe zvinokosha $600,000.</s>

en: Her lawyer called the charge absurd.
sna: Gweta  ravo rakati kupomerwa uku hakuna musoro.
mt0: <pad> Mwari akataura kuti mhosva yacho yakashata.</s>

en: Suu Kyi had already been sentenced to six years for actions against the military, breaking COVID-19 rules and breaking a telecommunications law.
sna: Amai Suu Kyi vakange vatotongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore matanhatu nekuda kwezvakaita zvekudzivisa mauto, kutyora mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCOVID-19 uye nekutyora mitemo yezvekushandisa mishina yekutaura nevamwe yakaita sedzinhare, nharembozha nemapotonjere.
mt0: <pad> Suu Kyi aiva akatongerwa makore matanhatu nemapurisa, kutyora mitemo yeCOVID-19 uye kutyora mutemo wefoni.</s>

en: She faces many more charges, and if found guilty could be sentenced to more than 150 years in jail.
sna: Vachiri vakatarisana nedzimwe mhosva dzavari kupomerwa, uye kana vakawanikwa vaine mhosva vanogona kutongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore anodarika zana nemakumi mashanu.
mt0: <pad> She faces many more charges, and if found guilty could be sentenced to more than 150 years in jail.</s>

en: Suu Kyi has been under house arrest since a military coup took over the country last year.
sna: Amai Suu Kyi vanga vari musungwa anenge akachengetedzwa ari mumba make kubva mauto zvaakavabvutira masimba ekutonga gore rakapfuura.
mt0: <pad> Suu Kyi aiva pasi pekugara kwake kubva paakaitwa coup d'etat gore rakapera.</s>

en: Since the coup, on Feb. 1, 2021, there have been widespread protests against the military regime.
sna: Kubva mauto abvuta masimba ekutonga musi wa 1 Kukadzi 2021, kwese kwese munyika manga muune kuratidzira nekushora hurumende yechiuto iyi.
mt0: <pad> Kubva pakupurwa kwakaitika musi wa1 Feb. 2021, pane zviratidziro zvakawanda pamusoro pehurumende yehondo.</s>

en: The regime cracked down violently in many cases, leaving more than 1,800 civilians dead and more than 10,000 arrested, charged or sentenced, according to the Assistance Association for Political Prisoners (Burma).
sna: Hurumende iyi yakabva yatsikirira zvine chinya kuratidzira uku, izvo zvakasita magari vemunyika iyi vanopfuura chiuru nemazana masere vafa nemwe vanodarika zviuru gumi vasungwa, vachipomerwa mhosva kana kuti vawanikwa vaine mhosva, sekutaurwa kwazvakaitwa- nesangano rinobatsira vasungwa vezvematongerwo rekuBurma, Assistance Association for Political Prisoners (Burma).
mt0: <pad> The regime cracked down violently in many cases, leaving more than 1,800 civilians dead and more than 10,000 arrested, charged or sentenced, according to the Assistance Association for Political Prisoners (Burma).</s>

en: Some information in this report comes from Reuters and Agence France-Presse.
sna: Zvimwe zviri munhau idzi zvinobva kuReuters ne Agence France-Presse.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvaunofanira kutaura ndezvinobva Reuters uye Agence France-Presse.</s>

en: Foreign Tourists Begin Arriving in New Zealand After COVID Restrictions Lifted
sna: Vashanyi vekune dzimwe nyika vanotanga kusvika kuNew Zealand Mushure mekubviswa kwematanho ekurambidza kufamba nekuda kwedenda re Covid-19
mt0: <pad> Foreign Tourists Begin Arriving in New Zealand After COVID Restrictions Lifted</s>

en: For the first time in over two years, overseas tourists have been allowed to enter New Zealand starting Monday.
sna: Zvichiitika kekutanga munguva inodarika makore maviri, vashanyi vekumhiri kwemakungwa vava kutenderwa kupinda muNew Zealand kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro.
mt0: <pad> Kuti uwane izvi, edza kuti uone izvi.</s>

en: The island nation known for its natural beauty enacted some of the strictest lockdown measures during the COVID-19 pandemic, including very restrictive travel limitations.
sna: Chinyika iyi iri chitsuwa ine mbiri yehunaku hwemasikirwo ayakaitwa yakange iine mitemo yakaomesesa kudarika dzimwe nyika yekurambidza vanhu kufamba zvachose panguva yedenda reCOVID-19, zvichisanganisira mitemo yaiganhura kufamba kwevanhu.
mt0: <pad> The island nation known for its natural beauty adopted some of the strictest lockdown measures during the COVID-19 pandemic, including very restrictive travel limitations.</s>

en: The country had reopened for tourists from Australia weeks ago, but the new relaxation of restrictions now allows tourists from over 60 countries to visit, including most European countries and the U.S.
sna: The country had reopened for tourists from Australia weeks ago, but the new relaxation of restrictions now allows tourists from over 60 countries to visit, including most European countries and the U.S.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe nyika dzakavhurwa kune vashanyi kubva Australia maawa mashoma apfuura, asi nyaya itsva yekuderedza zvinorambidza vashanyi kubva kunyika dzinopfuura 60 kuti vapinde, kusanganisira nyika dzakawanda dzekuEurope neUnited States.</s>

en: Today is a day to celebrate and is a big moment in our reconnection with the world, said Tourism Minister Stuart Nash.
sna: Gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Stuart Nash akati, nhasi izuva rekupemberera uye mukana wedu mukuru wekubata zvakare tichifambidzana nepasi rose.
mt0: <pad> Dzino zuva rekupembera uye izwi guru mukuwirirana kwedu nenyika, akadaro Mukuru weTourism Stuart Nash.</s>

en: Tourists must show they are fully vaccinated and test negative for the virus.
sna: Vashanyi vanofanirwa kuratidza kuti vakabaiwa mishonga yose yekudzivirira denda uye pavanoongororwa muviri wavo vanofanirwa kuwanikwa vasina denda iri.
mt0: <pad> Vaenzi vanofanira kuratidza kuti vakabatwa zvakakwana uye vakaedza negative pamusoro pechirwere.</s>

en: Citizens of China, India and other countries not given a waiver Monday are still not allowed to visit.
sna: Vagari vekuChina, India nedzimwe nyika vasati vapihwa mvumo havasati votenderwa kushanya.
mt0: <pad> Citizens of China, India and other countries not given a waiver Monday are still not allowed to visit.</s>

en: Before the pandemic, tourism accounted for 5% of the countrys economic activity and 20% of its foreign income.
sna: Denda risati ravapo, kushanyirwa kwenyika kwayiunza zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvezvehupfumi hwenyika, uyewo ne zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzama zvemari inobva kune dzimwe nyika.
mt0: <pad> Pamberi pekutambudzwa kwechirwere, tourism yaiita 5% yenyika's economic activity uye 20% yemari yekunze.</s>

en: On Monday, 43 international flights carrying around 9,000 passengers were scheduled to leave or arrive at Auckland International Airport, Reuters reported.
sna: NeMuvhuro, ndege makumi mana nenhatu dzakange dzakatakura vafambi vangasvike zviuru zvipfumbamwe vakange vakatarisirwa kubhururuka dzichibuda kana mhara panhandare yendega yeAuckland International Airport, Reuters yakanyora nhau idzi ichidaro.
mt0: <pad> Kana uchitsvaga kuti ndiri kutaura chii, edzai kunyora shoko rakataurwa.</s>

en: Some information in this report comes from The Associated Press and Reuters.
sna: Zvimwe zvikamu zvenhau idzi zvabva kuThe Associated Press neReuters.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvaunofanira kutaura ndezvinoreva kuti unonyatsoziva.</s>

en: Report: Iran to Execute Swedish-Iranian National by May 36
sna: Nhau: Iran Ichauraya Mumwe Murumo Ari Chizvarwa CheSweden ne Iran Mweszi waChivabvu usati wapera
mt0: <pad> Report: Iran to Execute Swedish-Iranian National by May</s>

en: Iran will later this month execute a Swedish-Iranian national whom it has imprisoned since 2016 and convicted of spying for Israel, media reported.
sna: Iran nechepamberi wemwedzi uno ichauraya mumwe munhu ari chizvarwa che Sweden ne Iran uyo wayanga yakaisa mujeri kubva muna 2016 uye ikamuwana aine mhosva yekuvamusvori we Israel, masangano enhau akanyora achidaro.
mt0: <pad> Iran inofungidzira kuti iri kuuraya mugari weSweden-Iranian, uyo akachengetwa kubva 2016 uye akatongerwa kuti aiita zvesvibisa Israel, mamedia anotaura.</s>

en: Irans semiofficial ISNA news agency on Wednesday released a report in which Iranian officials stated that Tehran will implement the death penalty against Ahmad Reza Jalali by May 21.
sna: Sangano renhau riri pakati nepakati pekunge riri rehurumende yeIran rinonzi ISNA neChitatu rakaburitsa nhau umo vakuru vemu Iran vakati Iran yaizozadzisa kutongerwa rufu kwakatemerwa Ahmad Reza Jalali musi wa21 Chivabvu usati wapfuura.
mt0: <pad> Iran's semiofficial ISNA news agency on Wednesday released a report in which Iranian officials stated that Tehran will implement the death penalty against Ahmad Reza Jalali by May 21.</s>

en: Jalali, a researcher and physician who specializes in disaster relief, was arrested during a visit to Iran in April 2016.
sna: Jalali, uyo anoita zvekuita tsvakurudzo uye ari chiremba anonyanyoshandisa humhizha hwake mukubatsira vanhu vanenge vari pamatambudziko, akasungwa paakange ashanyira Iran muna Kubvumbi muna 2016.
mt0: <pad> Jalali, a researcher and doctor who specializes in disaster relief, was arrested during a visit to Iran in April 2016.</s>

en: In 2017, Jalali was sentenced to death in Iran after he had been found guilty of passing information about two Iranian nuclear scientists to Israel to help it assassinate several nuclear scientists.
sna: Muna 2017, Jalali akatongerwa kufa muIran mushure mekunge awanikwa aine mhosva yekufambisa mashoko kuIsraei ezvaanoziva pamusoro penyanzvi dzezveruzivo rwenuclear kuti abatsire Israel kuti iuraye nyanzvi dzeruzivo rwenuclear.
mt0: <pad> 2017 - Jalali akatongerwa kuti afe muIran mushure mekunge akawanikwa aine mhosva yekuendesa mashoko pamusoro pevanamazvikokota vaviri venuclear kuIsrael kuti avubatsire Israel kuparadza vanamazvikokota vanuclear vakawanda.</s>

en: Rights groups have condemned Jalalis detention, citing Irans pattern of detaining dual nationals and expatriates without due process.
sna: Mapoka anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akashora kusungwa kwaJalali, karatidzawo tsika yeIran yekusunga vanhu vari vakanyoresa kuti zvizvarwa zvenyika mbiri, uye nekusungawo zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika dzinoshandira muIran asi pasina kutevedzera gwara chairo remutemo.
mt0: <pad> Rights groups have condemned the detainment of Jalalis, citing Iran's pattern of detaining dual nationals and expatriates without due process.</s>

en: Iran does not recognize dual nationals.
sna: Iran haigamuchire kuti munhu anogona kuva chizvarwa chayo asi achiti chizvarwazve cheimwe nyika.
mt0: <pad> Iran hai recognize dual nationals.</s>

en: The announcement came as authorities in Stockholm wrapped up the trial of Hamid Nouri, a former Iranian prosecution official whom Swedish officials arrested in November 2019.
sna: Chiziviso ichi chakabuda panguva iyo vanobata basa muhurumende muStockholm vakange vopeta  kutongwa kwaHamid Nouri, uyo akamboshanda ari muchuchusi muhurumende yeIran uyo vakuru veSweden vakasunga munaMbudzi wa2019.
mt0: <pad> Zvirevo izvi zvakauya sezvo Swedish authorities in Stockholm vakapedza mutongo weHamid Nouri, a former Iranian prosecutor who was arrested in November 2019.</s>

en: Authorities say Nouri played a role in the deaths of political prisoners executed on Iranian government orders at Irans Gohardasht prison during the final phase of the Iran-Iraq war in 1988.
sna: Vakuru vanoti Nouri ane chikamu chaakaita mukufa kwevasungwa vezvematongerwo vakaurayiwa pasi pekurayirwa kwehurumende yeIran pachitirongo cheGohardasht panguva iyo hondo pakati pe Iran neIraq yakange yavakunopera muna 1988.
mt0: <pad> Authorities say Nouri played a role in the deaths of political prisoners executed on Iranian government orders at Iran's Gohardasht prison during the final phase of the Iran-Iraq war in 1988.</s>

en: Nouri has been held in custody in Sweden since his arrest.
sna: Nouri ari muhusungwa muSweden kubva paakasungwa.
mt0: <pad> Nouri achiri kugara muSweden kubva paakapihwa.</s>

en: On Wednesday, the final day of Nouri's trial, a Stockholm district court judge set the date of the verdict for July 14.
sna: NeChitatu, zuva rekupedzisera pakutongwa kwaNouri, mutongi wedare remhosva redunhu reStockholm akatema kuti vatongi vaizotura kutonga kwavo panyaya iyi musi wa14 Chikunguru July.
mt0: <pad> On Wednesday, the last day of Nouri's trial, a Stockholm district court judge set the date of the verdict for July 14.</s>

en: Amnesty International put the number of those executed at the prison at 5,000 but said in a 2018 report that the number could be higher.
sna: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevasungwa vezvematongerwo reAmnesty International rakati vanhu vakaurayiwa pajeri iri vaisvika zviuru zvishanu asi ndokuzozivisa muchinyorwa chetsvakurudzo dzaro kuti huwandu uhwu hwagona kunge hwakawandia kudarika apa.
mt0: <pad> Amnesty International yakaisa nhamba yevakaurayiwa mune imwe nzvimbo yacho pa5,000, asi ino 2018 report yakataura kuti nhamba yacho inogona kunge iri kupfuura.</s>

en: Human Rights Watch, in a recent report, said, "Iran continues to be one of the worlds leading implementers of the death penalty."
sna: Sangano rekodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights Watch, muchinyorwa charo chichangoburitswa pamusoro petsvakurudzo dzaro, chakati, "Iran inoramba iri mwe yenyika pasi rose dziri pamberi patongera vanhu chirango cherufu."
mt0: <pad> Human Rights Watch, in a recent report, said, "Iran continues to be one of the world's leading implementers of the death penalty."</s>

en: If Nouri is convicted, he will face a maximum life sentence on charges of international war crimes and human rights abuses.
sna: Kana Nouri akawanikwa aine mhosva, anogona kutongerwa kugara muchitirongo kwehupenyu hwese achipomerwa kupara mhosva dzinoitwa munguva yehondo dzenyika uye nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Iran yadeedza mumiririri weSwden kuti igunun'une pamusoro pekutongwa kwaNouri.
mt0: <pad> Kana Nouri akabatwa, achanobatwa nemusungo werufu pamusoro pezviito zvehondo uye kuedza kubatana kwevanhu.</s>

en: Iran recently summoned the Swedish envoy in protest over Nouris case.
sna: Iran yadeedza mumiririri weSwden kuti igunun'une pamusoro pekutongwa kwaNouri.
mt0: <pad> Iran recently summoned the Swedish ambassador in protest over Nouris case.</s>

en: Maja Aberg, senior policy adviser with Amnesty International Sweden, says it is no coincidence that Iran announced Jalalis pending execution just after Swedish prosecutors moved on Nouris trial.
sna: Maja Aberg, chipamazano mukuru pane zvegwara rekufambisa basa anoshanda neAmnesty International Sweden, anoti haasi masanga kuti Iran yakazivisa kuswedera kwekuurayiwa kwaJalali mushure mekunge vachuchusi veSweden vafambira mberi nekutongwa kwaNouri.
mt0: <pad> Maja Aberg, senior policy adviser with Amnesty International Sweden, says it is no coincidence that Iran announced Jalalis' pending execution just after Swedish prosecutors moved on Nouris trial.</s>

en: It indicates that (Iran) sees him as a kind of piece in the jigsaw puzzle, which is very worrying, Aberg told Sweden's TT news agency.
sna: Izvi zvinoratidza kuti Iran inomuona sechikamu chakakosha mumutambo wetsoro, chinova chinhu chinoshungurudza, akadaro Aberg achiudza sangano renhau muSweden re TT news agency.
mt0: <pad> Iyo inoratidza kuti (Iran) anoona iye sechinhu chinoumba mu jigsaw puzzle, izvo zvinonyadzisa zvikuru, Aberg akaudza Sweden's TT news agency.</s>

en: Swedish law allows for the prosecution of Swedish citizens and other nationals for crimes against international law committed abroad.
sna: Mutemo wemuSweden unobvumidza kutongwa kwezvizvarwa zvemuSweden nezvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika pamusoro pemhosva dzinotyora mitemo yedzimwe nyika kunyangwe mhosva idzi dzakaparirwa kunzw kweSweden.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe usamboziva</s>

en: Some information for this report came from The Associated Press, Reuters and Agence France-Presse.
sna: Zvimwe zvikamu zvenhau idzi zvakabva ku The Associated Press, Reuters ne Agence France-Presse.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvacho zvakabva kuThe Associated Press, Reuters uye Agence France-Presse.</s>

en: Erdogan Goes to Riyadh to Seal Rapprochement
sna: Erdogan Anoenda kuRiyadh Kunosunga Hukama Nekuwirirana
mt0: <pad> Erdogan Goes to Riyadh to Seal Rapprochement</s>

en: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan heads to Saudi Arabia Thursday for a two-day visit aimed at easing old tensions between Ankara and Riyadh.
sna: Mutungamiriri weTurkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan akananga kuSaudi Arabia nemusi weChina mukushanya kwemazuva maviri kwakanangiswa pakunyevenutsa kusawirirana kwakare pakati peTurkey neSaudi Arabia.
mt0: <pad> President weTurkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan anoenda kuSaudi Arabia Thursday achitsvaga kudzivirira hondo yakareba pakati pe Ankara ne Riyadh.</s>

en: The Turkish leaders visit with the Saudi king comes after years of rivalry between their once-close countries.
sna: Kushanya kwemutungamiriri we Turkey kuna mambo weSaudi Arabia kunouya mushure memakore ekuvengana pakati penyika dzaisimbowirirana munguva dzakare.
mt0: <pad> The Turkish leaders visit the Saudi king comes after years of rivalry between their once-close countries.</s>

en: Mehmet Ogutcu is the head of the London Energy Club, a grouping of government and energy sector leaders. Ogutcu says the visit is the culmination of intense international diplomacy.
sna: Mehmet Ogutcu ndiye mukuru we London Energy Club, chikwata chevatungamiriri zvikamu zvezvekoga nekugadzirwa kwemafuta ekufambisa nemagetsi. Ogutcu anoti kushanya uku kwakabuda mushure mekupindira kwevanyai vedzimwe nyika.
mt0: <pad> Mehmet Ogutcu ndiye mukuru weLondon Energy Club, a grouping of government and energy sector leaders. Ogutcu says the visit is the culmination of intense international diplomacy.</s>

en: President Erdogan has good relations with the king; with the crown prince Muhammad Bin Salman, we had serious difficulties, said Ogutcu.
sna: VaErdogan vane hukama hwakanaka namambou; asi nanevanji Muhammad Bin Salman, takange tiine matambudziko makuru, akadaro Ogutcu.
mt0: <pad> President Erdogan ane hukama hwakanaka nemambo; nekuti Prince Muhammad Bin Salman, takanga kuita matambudziko akakura, akadaro Ogutcu.</s>

en: "Now it looks that I believe the*(Britons), and Americans, and the Qataris of course played some role, even the Azeris might have done this.
sna: "Ikezvino, zvinoita sekuti ndavakutenda kuti vanhu vekuBritain nevekuAmerica nevekuQatar, kungwe vanhu vemudunhu ma Azeri ndivo vakaruka nyaya iyi yese.
mt0: <pad> "Zvinoita sekuti vanhu vakawanda, kunyanya Britain, America, Qatari, uye Azeris, vakaita chikamu.</s>

en: And things are changing and relaxing a bit more, and now at the presidential level, it's going to be sealed."
sna: Uye zvinhu zvavakushanduka nekunyevenuka zvishoma nezvishoma, uye iyezvino pahutungamiriri hwenyika zvichabva zvapeterwa nekurongedzwa."
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvinhu zviri kuchinja uye kunyatsoregerera, uye zvino pamberi pegurukota, ichava yakavharwa.</s>

en: Erdogan and the crown prince have been bitter rivals.
sna: Erdogan nemwanakomana wambo nevanji vagara havaonane zvachose.
mt0: <pad> Erdogan and the crown prince have been bitter rivals.</s>

en: The Turkish president led international condemnation over the murder of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi, who was killed inside Saudi Arabias consulate in Istanbul.
sna: Mukuru weTurkey vakange vari vapmberi pekushora kwakaitwa nenyika dzakawanda pamusoro pekupondwa kwemutori wenhau wekuSaudi Arabia Jamal Khashoggi, uyo akaurayiwa mukati memahofisi emumiririri weSaudi kuTurkey, muguta guru reTurkey, Istanbul.
mt0: <pad> Turkish president led international condemnation over the murder of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi, who was killed inside Saudi Arabias consulate in Istanbul.</s>

en: The killing was linked to the crown prince, a charge he denied.
sna: Kuuraya uku kwakanzi kwakange kuine ruoko rwaNevanji, kupomerwa kavavakaramba.
mt0: <pad> Mwari akapa mhosva yekuuraya mambo wemudzimai, uyo akaramba.</s>

en: But the decision earlier this month to move the Khashoggi murder trial from Istanbul to Riyadh is seen as a gesture by Ankara, opening the way for Erdogan's visit.
sna: Asi zvakaitwa mukutanga kwemwedzi uno kubvisa kutongwa kwemhosva yekupondwa kwaKhashoggi kubva kuIstanbul kuchiendeswa kuRiyadh kuri kuonekwa sezviri kuitwa neTurkey kuti zvizarure yekushanya kwavaErdogan.
mt0: <pad> Asi chiziviso chekuendesa mhosva yaKhashoggi kubva Istanbul kuRadhi ichinaona sechiratidzo che Ankara, ichigadzirira nzira yekushanyira Erdogan.</s>

en: Ogutcu says with presidential elections due next year, Erdogan is looking for Saudi help to bail out the ailing Turkish economy.
sna: Ogutcu anoti sezvo sarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika ariko gore rinouya, Erdogan ari kutsvaga rubetsero rweSaudi Arabia kuti rwupukunyutse hupfumi hweTurkey hwuri kutatarika.
mt0: <pad> Ogutcu says with presidential elections due next year, Erdogan is looking for Saudi help to bail out the ailing Turkish economy.</s>

en: Turkey has an interest in reviving relations with Riyadh because Turkey needs financial support, said Ogutcu.
sna: Turkey ine chishuvi chekumutsiridza hukama neSaudi Arabia nekuti Turkey iri kutsvaga kubatsirwa pane zvemari, akadaro Ogutcu.
mt0: <pad> Turkey ine nzvimbo yekugadzirisa hukama ne Riyadh nokuti Turkey inoda rubatsiro rwezvemari, akadaro Ogutcu.</s>

en: "The Turkish economy is not attracting any significant portfolio investments nor sovereign wealth funds coming to invest Turkey.
sna: "Hupfumi hweTurkey hausi kukwezva kudyara nekupfimbika kwemari muzvikamu zvakasiyana siyana zvenyika, kana kuuya kwemari dziri kubva kuvanhu nemakambani akazvimiririra vanoda kupfimbika mari dzavo mumakambani emuTurkey.
mt0: <pad> "Makombiyuta eTurkey haana kukwezva mari yakakura ye portfolio kana kuti mari dzemari dziri kuuya kuinvesta Turkey.</s>

en: But this will be a give-and-take package deal involving these countries.
sna: Asi iyi nyaya pakati penyika idzi inenge iri yekuti bata nekoko ini ndichikutambidzawo nepapa.
mt0: <pad> Asi izvi zvichava kutengesa-kuendesa package deal inosanganisira nyika idzi.</s>

en: So, there are real economic and political security interests involved."
sna: Saka, pane pane zvehupfumi nekuchengetedzeka panezvematongerwo zviri mukati menyaya iyi yese."
mt0: <pad> Saka, pane nyaya dzakawanda dzinobata zvematongerwo enyika uye kuchengetedzeka kwepasi rese.</s>

en: Shared concerns over Iran's growing influence in the region -- along with its nuclear energy program -- provide important common ground between Riyadh and Ankara, says international relations professor Soli Ozel of Istanbul's Kadir Has University, especially as American attention is expected to pivot away from the Middle East and toward China.
sna: Kuonera pamwe pakushushikana nepanyaya yekuti Iran iri kuwedzera kuva nenzwi rine mutsindo mudunhu reMiddle East -- pamwe chete nechirongwa chayo chekugadzira magetsi erudzi rwe nuclear -- zviri kupa hwaro hwakanaka hwewirirana pakati peSaudi Arabia neTurkeyprovide important common ground between Riyadh and Ankara, vanodaro muzvinadzidzo hwezvekudyidzana kwendudzi Soli Ozel wepa Kadir Has iri muInstabul, zvikuru sei apo America iri kutarisirwa kubvisa meso kubva kuMiddle East ichi anangisa kuChina.
mt0: <pad> Shared concerns over Iran's growing influence in the region -- along with its nuclear energy program -- provide important common ground between Riyadh and Ankara, says international relations professor Soli Ozel of Istanbul's Kadir Has University, especially as American attention is expected to pivot away from the Middle East and toward China.</s>

en: Turkey does propose itself as a counterweight to Iran.
sna: Turkey inozviona senyika ine huremu hwunokwidzana neIran.
mt0: <pad> Turkey inozviita sechinhu chinopesana neIran.</s>

en: Both countries have an interest along with all the western countries for Iran not to be as influential throughout the region as it is today, said Ozel.
sna: Idzi nyika dzese dziri mbiri pamwe chete nenyika dzese dzekumavirira dzine chishuvo chekuti Iran haifanirwe kuva neguhu nechikuriri mudunhu rese sezvairi nhasi uno, akadaro Ozel.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe nyika mbiri, pamwe chete nenyika dzemuWestern, zvine chinangwa chekuti Iran isaita masimba akawanda muGulf sezvairi kuita nhasi, akadaro Ozel.</s>

en: "And the Iranians are also constantly sending signals that they are not going to let others draw them away from those countries - Iraq, Lebanon and Syria - where they have quite a lot of influence."
sna: "Ukuwo vekuIran vari kuramba vachiratidza kuti havasi kuzorega dzimwe nyika dzichivatsaudza kubva kunyika dzinoti - Iraq, Lebanon neSyria - uko vaine simba neguhu zvakati kuti."
mt0: <pad> "Uye vanhu veIran vanotuma mashoko anoratidza kuti havasi kuzorega vamwe vachivabvisa kubva kunyika dzinoti Iraq, Lebanon uye Syria - uko kwavanoita kuti zvinhu zviite zvakanaka.</s>

en: Erdogan's Saudi visit is part of a wider policy of seeking to repair relations across the region in a bid to end its isolation.
sna: Rwendo rwavaErdogan kuSaudi chikamu chehurongwa hwakakura nekupamhamhama hwekutsvaga kugadzirisa hukama mudunhu iri rese mukuedza kubuda panzvimbo yekusiiwa nekusanwa nedzimwe nyika isolation.
mt0: <pad> Erdogan's Saudi visit is part of a wider policy of seek to repair relations across the region in an attempt to end its isolation.</s>

en: The Turkish president has recently visited the United Arab Emirates and earlier this month hosted the Israeli president, Isaac Herzog.
sna: Mutungamiriri weTurkey munguva ichangodarika akatoshanyira United Arab Emirates uye pakutanga kwemwedzi uno akachingamidza mutungamiriri weIsrael, vaIsaac Herzog.
mt0: <pad> Mukuru weTurkey akashanyira United Arab Emirates uye mwedzi wapera akagamuchira mukuru weIsrael, Isaac Herzog.</s>

en: But analyst Ozel warns Ankara is in a vulnerable position.
sna: Asi nyanzvi yekuongorora nekunzvera anoyambira kuti Turkey iri panzvimbo yehutera nekushaiwa simba.
mt0: <pad> But analyst Ozel warns Ankara is in a vulnerable position.</s>

en: Turkey alienated, insulted, offended a lot of countries with which it had at least decent relations.
sna: Turkey yakagura hukama, ikashoora nekutsamwisa nyika dzakawanda,  yayaiva nehukama nadzo.
mt0: <pad> Turkey yakavenga, yakashora, yakagumbura nyika dzakawanda dzakawanda neizvo zvaiita kuti zvinhu zviite sezvainge zvakanaka.</s>

en: But analysts say Ankara is banking on its importance as a potential bulwark to Iranian ambitions, a factor that may help overcome any remaining hostility among the neighbors it is trying to win back.
sna: Asi vanoongorora nekunzvera vanoti Turkey iri kuvimba nehukoshi hwayo senyika inesimba rekugona kumisa zvishuvo zvekutonga nekutyiwa zveIran, chinhu chinogona kubatsira kukunda kuvengwa kungangoramba kuri pakati penyika dzayakavakidzana nadzo dzairi kuyedza kumbundikira zvakare.
mt0: <pad> Asi ongorori vanoti Ankara inotenda kuti iri kunyanya kukosha sechinhu chinogona kudzivirira maambiro eIran, chikonzero chinogona kubvisa chero kushungurudzika kwairamba kuri pakati pehama dzayo izvo zviri kuramba kutsvaga kuzokunda.</s>

en: Executions, Detentions Hang Over Saudi Legal Reforms
sna: Kuchekwa Misoro, Kusungwa Korembera Kuchikanganisa Shanduko Dzezvemutemo YeSaudi Arabia
mt0: <pad> Zvinoreva kuti usambokwanisa kuita izvi, taura kuti hauzivi.</s>

en: Saudi Arabia is pushing to revamp its harsh justice system but reforms are overshadowed by executions and tough treatment of dissidents, raising questions about how much will change.
sna: Saudi Arabia iri kushanda kuti inatsiridze mashandisirwe ezvemutemo wayo uyo une hukasha, asi shanduko dziri kukanganiswa nekugurwa misoro nekubatwa zvine chisimba kwevapanduki, zvasiya pava nemibvunzo yekuti zvinhu zvingani zvichanyatsoshanduka.
mt0: <pad> Saudi Arabia iri kuedza kuchinja nzira dzaro dzedare, asi zvigadziriswa zvinopesana nekufa uye kuremekedza kwakaoma kwevanopikisana, zvichikurudzira mibvunzo pamusoro pekuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvichange zvachinja here.</s>

en: The kingdom is known for its strict interpretation of Islamic sharia law, which forms the basis of its judicial system.
sna: Nyika iri pasi pamambo iyi inozivikanwa nekurovedzera kunzisisa kwainoita mutemo wechi Islam unonzi sharia, uyo unova hwaro hwezvemitemo yemunyika iyi,
mt0: <pad> The kingdom is known for its strict interpretation of the Islamic sharia law, which forms the basis of its judicial system.</s>

en: But in recent months it has moved ahead with reforms that analysts say could make its courts function more like others in the Middle East.
sna: Asi mumwezi ichangodarika, yakaenderera mberi nekushanduro idzo vanonzvera nekuongorora vanoti zvinogona kuita kuti matare edzimhosva ayo ashande sezvinoita mamwe mudunhu reMiddle East.
mt0: <pad> Asi mumakore achangopfuura akaita magadziriro ekuti ongorori vanoti anokwanisa kuita kuti matare ake aite basa sezvinoitwa nematare ari muMiddle East.</s>

en: That effort hinges on a series of new laws for sensitive issues like women's divorce rights and judges' power to determine criminal sentences.
sna: Basa iri rese rakatsamhira pane mudungwe wemitemo mitsva inobata nyaya dzinozezesa kutaura nezvadzo dzakaita sekodzero dzemadzimayi mushure mekunge vambana nevarume vavo uyewo nemasimba evatongi vedzimhosva kuti vatare zvirango munyaya dzekunge vanhu vatyora mutemo.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinobva mukuedza kwakawanda kwekuisa mitemo itsva pamusoro penyaya dzakadzama dzakadai sekodzero dzevakadzi yekuroora uye masimba evatongi kutonga mhosva.</s>

en: Announced last year by de facto ruler Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, the measures, including the first written penal code, appear to align with Saudi Arabia's goal of opening up to the world and softening its extremist image.
sna: Matanho aya, akaziviswa gore rakapera munhu ari pachinzvimbo chemutungamiriri chaiye, Nevanji Mohammed bin Salman, anosanganisira zvinyorwa zvekutanga zvine nzira dzekuranga, anoita sekubatana nechinangwa cheSaudi Arabia chekumbundikira zviri kuitwa nedzimwe nyika uyewo nekunyevenutsa maonerwo ayinoitwa senyika inokakatira kurutivi.
mt0: <pad> Anotangazwa gore rakapera nemukuru wenyika Mohammed bin Salman, mazano aya, kusanganisira kodzero yekutanga yakanyorwa, anoenderana nechinangwa cheSaudi Arabia chekuvhurwa kwepasi rese uye kunyorera mbiri yaro yechiextremist.</s>

en: Even critics concede the changes could make Saudi courts more predictable, in some cases.
sna: Kunyangwe vatsoropodzi vari kubvuma kuti shanduko idzi dzinogona kuita kuti mune dzimwe nzvimbo matare edzimhosva emuSaudi azivikanwe mashandiro awo muneanenge vatyora mutemo.
mt0: <pad> Even critics concede the changes could make Saudi courts more predictable, in some cases.</s>

en: But there is no expectation that restrictions on free speech will ease, or that the legal system will treat more favorably perceived opponents of the government.
sna: Asi hapana kutarisira kuti kudziviswa kwevanhu kutaura zvavanoda kucharerutswa, kana kuti muchabata nenzira iri nani vanhu vanoonekwa sevavengi vehurumende.
mt0: <pad> Asi hapana fungidziro yekuti zvinorambidzwa pamusoro pehurukuro inokwanisa kuderera, kana kuti nyaya dzakawanda dzinonzi dzinopesana nehurumende dzinofanira kuitwa zvakanaka.</s>

en: And despite the reforms, authorities have simultaneously provided reminders of what gave Saudi Arabia its ruthless reputation in the first place, notably the mass execution of 81 men in a single day in March for offenses related to "terrorism."
sna: Uye kunyangwe paine shanduko idzi, vakuru venyika varikubva vapawo panguva imwe chete zviyeuchidzo zvekuti sei Saudi Arabia yagara iine mbiri yehutsinye, zvikuru sei kuurayiwa panguva immwe chete kwevarume makumi masere nemumwe pazuva rime chete muna Kurume nemhosva dzine chekuita ne "hugandanga."
mt0: <pad> Asi kunyange zvazvo gadziriro dzakaitwa, makurukota akabva akapa ruzivo rwekuti Saudi Arabia inozivikanwa senyika ine simba, kunyanya nekuuraya 81 varume mumazuva mashoma munaKurume pamusoro penyaya dzinoenderana ne "terrorism."</s>

en: Notorious' system
sna: Nzira Ine 'hun'an'a'
mt0: <pad> Kana usingakwanise kuita izvi, taura kuti hauzivi Notorious'.</s>

en: Two new laws have already been approved by the Saudi Cabinet.
sna: Mitemo mitsva iyi yakatopasiswa nedare remakurukota emuSaudi.
mt0: <pad> Two new laws have already been approved by the Saudi Cabinet.</s>

en: One governs the admissibility of evidence, previously at the judges' discretion.
sna: Mumwe mutemo unoona nezvekugamuchirika kwehwumboo, chinova chinhu chayiitwa nemaonero emumwe nemumwe wevatongi vedzimhosva.
mt0: <pad> Unobata kuti nyaya inofanirwa kuitwa sei, zviri pamusoro pekushandisa kwavo judges' discretion.</s>

en: The second, a family law, is to take effect in June.
sna: Wechipiri, mutemo wemhuri, uyo uchatanga kushanda  muna Chikumi.
mt0: <pad> The second, a family law, is to take effect in June.</s>

en: In a traditionally male-dominated system, it expands the rights of divorced women to alimony and custody of their children.
sna: Mutemo uyu uri mutsika inotongwa nekutungamirirwa nevanhurume, unowedzera kodzero dzemadzimayi akasiyana nevarume vavo kuti vawane mari yekuchengeta vana uye nekodzero dzekuti vagare nevana vavo.
mt0: <pad> Mugadziriro yainyanya kushandiswa nevanhu, inovandudza kodzero dzevakadzi vakaroora kuti vawane mari yekuroorwa uye kudzivirira vana vavo.</s>

en: Announcing the new law in March, Prince Mohammed said it represented "a major qualitative leap" for women's rights and "family stability."
sna: Vachizivisa mutemo mutsva uyu muna Kurume, Prince Mohammed akati mutemo uyu waimiririra "kusvetukira mberi kune hunaku" panyaya dzekodzero dzemadzimayi ne "kutsigisa mhuri".
mt0: <pad> Mambo Mohammed akataura pamusoro penyaya yacho munaKurume, achiti inoratidza "chinhu chikuru chaizvo" pamusoro pekodzero dzevakadzi uye "kuchengeteka kwemhuri."</s>

en: The reforms seem partly to cater to foreign firms whose investment the kingdom is courting, said Adel al-Saeed, vice president of the European Saudi Organization for Human Rights.
sna: Shanduko idzi dzinoita sekubatawo makambani ekunzi ayo humambo huri kuda kutsvetsva kuti auye aite mabhizimisi munyika, akadaro Adel al-Saeed, mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri  weEuropean Saudi Organization for Human Rights.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvigadziriswa izvi zvinoita kuti vanhu vakuru venyika dzekunze vawane mari, akadaro Adel al-Saeed, vice president of the European Saudi Organization for Human Rights.</s>

en: The owners of capital are afraid of investing in this country, which is notorious in the legal aspect, so these laws are intended to change the image, he said.
sna: Vanhu vane mari dzavo vanotya kuuya kuzoita mhindu munyika muno, mune mbiri yakashata mune zvemutemo, saka mitemo iyi iri kuda kushandura maonerwo aya, akadaro.
mt0: <pad> Vanotenga mari vanotya kuisa mari munyika ino, izvo zvinozivikanwa senyika ine nyaya dzakawanda, saka mitemo iyi yakagadzirirwa kuchinja maonero, akadaro.</s>

en: The new penal code, yet to be unveiled, could bring further dramatic changes.
sna: Gwaro rine nzira dzekuranga, iro risati raburitswa pachena, rinogona kuunza dzimwe shanduko huru.
mt0: <pad> Mitemo itsva yedare, isina kuiswa, inogona kubvisa zvimwe zvinhu zvinokosha.</s>

en: Under sharia, only apostasy, theft, revolt, armed robbery, adultery, drinking alcohol and slander carry prescribed sentences. Judges are left to determine punishment in other cases.
sna: Pasi pemutemo we sharia, kurasa chitendero,kuba, kupanduka, kubira vanhu uchishandisa zvombo, hupombwe, kumwa doro nekureva nhema pamusoro pemumwe munhue zvese izvi zvine zvirango zvakatotemwa kare. Vatongi vakasiiwa kuti vatare zvirango pamusoro pedzimwewo mhosva.
mt0: <pad> Under sharia, apostasy, theft, revolt, armed robbery, adultery, drinking alcohol and slander carry prescribed sentences. Judges are left to determine punishment in other cases.</s>

en: With a penal code in place, "the state will expect judges to rely not on their own training in sharia but instead on the legal rules (based on sharia) approved by the state," said Nathan Brown, an academic at George Washington University.
sna: Gwaro rezvirango ravapo kudai, "hurumende ichatarisira vatongi kuzembera kwete pane zvavakadzidziswa kumutemo we sharia asi pane gwara remutemo (asi wakamira pahwaro hwe sharia) rakatenderwa nehurumende," akadaro Nathan Brown, nyanzvi yezveruzivo yepa George Washington University.
mt0: <pad> With a penal code in place, "the state will expect judges to rely not on their own training in sharia but instead on the legal rules (based on sharia) approved by the state," said Nathan Brown, an academic at George Washington University.</s>

en: As a result, Saudi Arabia will look much more like a civil law system, much like most states in the region, said Brown, who has studied the Saudi reforms.
sna: Naizvozvo, Saudi Arabia ichazongoita senyika inoshandisa mutemo wekuti vanhu vagarisane zvakanaka, sezvakangoita nyika zhinji dzemudunhu iri, akataura achidaro Brown, uyo anga achinzvera shanduko dziri kuitwa neSaudi Arabia.
mt0: <pad> Saka Saudi Arabia ichange ita sekuti ine system yecivil law, sezvinoita mamwe marudzi enyika muGulf, akadaro Brown, uyo aongorora shanduko dzemuSaudi.</s>

en: The result should be more "predictability," said Abdullah Alaoudh, a U.S.-based legal expert and government critic, as new rules "take away from the leeway ... that the judges used to have."
sna: Zvichaitika ndezvekuti pachave ne"kugaroziva zvinoitika nenzira dzinishandiswa", akadaro Abdullah Alaoudh, nyanzvi yezvemutemo inogara kuU.S.uye ari mutsoropodzi wehurumende apo mitemo mitsva inenge  "yobvisa kubva pamikaha nemagwanza.... iyo vatongi vaisiva nayo kare."
mt0: <pad> Saka izvi zvinofanira kuva ne "predictability," according to Abdullah Alaoudh, a U.S.-based legal expert and government critic, as the new rules "take away the leeway... that the judges used to have."</s>

en: But tighter regulation by the monarchy also "creates a larger problem: lack of independence," he added.
sna: Asi mitemo yekubata nayo basa yakaitwa neimba yehumambo  "inotanga dambudziko guru: kushaikwa kwekusununguka nekuzvimiririra," akadaro.
mt0: <pad> Asi kurangarira kwakanyanya kwevakuru vakuru "kuumba dambudziko rakakura: kushaiwa kwerusununguko," akawedzera.</s>

en: The king is the head of the Saudi judiciary and acts as the final court of appeal.
sna: Mambo ndiye musoro wezvemutemo wemu Saudi ari iyewo mukuru kuru anokumbirwa neuyo anenge achida kuti nyaya yake atariswezve.
mt0: <pad> King ndiye mukuru wedare renyaya yeSaudi uye anoita sedare rekupedzisira rekuchema.</s>

en: Alaoudh's own father, prominent cleric Salman al-Awdah, has been held since 2017, seemingly in retaliation for a Twitter post that clashed with Saudi Arabia's policy at the time of isolating Qatar.
sna: Baba vaAlaoudh, mukuru wezvechinamato ane mukurumbira Salman al-Awdah, vanga vakasungwa pasina kutongwa kubva muna 2017, zvichiita sekutsiva zvavakanyora padandemutande reTwitter zvaikonana nezvaidiwa neSaudi Arabia panguva iyi pamusoro peQatar.
mt0: <pad> Alaoudh's father, a prominent cleric Salman al-Awdah, has been held since 2017, seemingly in revenge for a Twitter post that clashed with Saudi Arabia's policy at the time of isolating Qatar.</s>

en: He is one of many detained in an apparent crackdown on dissent and those who could challenge Prince Mohammed's power.
sna: Ndivo mumwe wevazhinji vakabatwa ichiita senzira yekutsikirira pasi manzwi anopikisa neavo vanogona kumisidzana nemasimba a Prince Mohammed.
mt0: <pad> He is one of many detained in an apparent crackdown on dissent and those who could challenge Prince Mohammed's power.</s>

en: One of the most prominent examples is former crown prince Mohammed bin Nayef, the CIA ally respected in the West for his efforts to counter violent extremism, but who King Salman ousted from the line of succession.
sna: Mumwe muyenzaniso mukuru ndewa vaimbova nevanji Mohammed bin Nayef, shamwari yebazi rezvevasoro rekuAmerica rinonzi CIA uye vachiremekedzwa kunyika dzekumavirira nebasa ravo rekurwisana nekukakatira kurutivi kuchishandisa ganyavhu, asi Mambo Salman vakamubvisa kubva pamutsetse  wekuva mambo mumashure avo.
mt0: <pad> Mumwe wemienzaniso yakakurumbira ndeye former crown prince Mohammed bin Nayef, CIA ally inozivikanwa muWest nekuedza kwake kurwisa extremism, asi uyo King Salman akabvisa kubva panyaya yekutsvedza.</s>

en: Prince Nayef has not been seen in public since reports of his arrest in March 2020. His detention was never officially confirmed.
sna: Prince Nayef havasati vamboonekwa vari mune veruzhinji kubva mashoko akatanga kufamba kuti vakange vasungwa muna Kurume 2020. Asi kusungwa kwavo hakuna kumbobvira kwabvumiwa zviri pamutemo vevakuru venyika.
mt0: <pad> Prince Nayef haana kuonekwa vanhu vakawanda kubva panyaya dzakabuda pamusoro pekugara kwake muna March 2020. Kutongwa kwake hakuna kumbozivikanwa zvakakwana.</s>

en: Shadow of Khashoggi
sna: Mumvuri waKhashoggi
mt0: <pad> Shadow of Khashoggi</s>

en: For government opponents, such cases reinforce questions about what difference the ongoing justice reforms will make.
sna: Kune vanokwikwidza hurumende, nyaya dzakadai dzinobva dzasimbisa mibvunzo yekuti koo shanduko ichaunzwa nekuvandudzwa kwemutemo kuri kuitwa ndeipi.
mt0: <pad> Kuti vanhu vakuru vehurumende, zvakaita izvi zvinokonzera mibvunzo pamusoro pekusiyana kwachaiita magadziriro enyaya dzemitemo ari kuitwa.</s>

en: In my view, this is all window-dressing, said Madawi al-Rasheed, a U.K.-based academic and spokesperson for the opposition National Assembly Party founded by exiles.
sna: Mumaonero angu, izvi zvose ndezvekungoratidzira nekufadza vanhu, akadaro Madawi al-Rasheed, munzver anogara kuU.K. ari mutauriri weboka rinopikisa reNational Assembly Party rakatangwa nezvizvarwa zveSaudi zviri muhupoteri.
mt0: <pad> In my view, this is all window-dressing, said Madawi al-Rasheed, a U.K.-based academic and spokesperson for the National Assembly Party founded by exiles.</s>

en: It's very, very difficult to see what the meaning is of these reforms apart from the project of portraying (Prince Mohammed) as a reformer.
sna: nyika zvakaomesasa kuona chirevo chekuvandudzwa kwese uku kunze kwekuda kuratidza nevanji Prince Mohammed semuvandudzi.
mt0: <pad> It's very, very difficult to see what the meaning is of these reforms apart from the project of portraying (Prince Mohammed) as a reformer.</s>

en: Hanging over any discussion of justice and legal reform in Saudi Arabia is the 2018 murder and dismemberment of critic and columnist Jamal Khashoggi in the kingdom's Istanbul consulate.
sna: Chinorembera pamusoro pehurukuro pekuvandudzwa kwezvekururamisira nezvemutemo muSaudi Arabia kupondwa muna 2018 nekuxchekwa chekwa kwemitezo yemutsoropodzi nemunyori wemumapepanhau Jamal Khashoggi ari mumuzinda une mahofisi emumiririri weSaudi kuTurkey muguta reIstanbul.
mt0: <pad> Mwari anofanira kuita kuti nyaya yedare uye hurumende inogadziriswa muSaudi Arabia ive pamusoro penyaya yekuuraya uye kuurayiwa kwecritic uye columnist Jamal Khashoggi mukonsulata yenyika yeIstanbul.</s>

en: A U.S. intelligence assessment found Prince Mohammed himself "approved" an operation to capture or kill Khashoggi, though Saudi officials deny this and say it was a "rogue" operation.
sna: Ongororo yakaitwa nevasvori veU.S. yakaona kuti Prince Mohammed pachavo "vakapa mvumo" basa rekupamba kana kuuraya Khashoggi, kunyangwe hazvo vakuru vachiramba izvi, vachiti ichi chaiva chirongwa "chekupenga".
mt0: <pad> U.S. intelligence assessment found Prince Mohammed "approved" an operation to capture or kill Khashoggi, though Saudi officials deny this and say it was a "rogue" operation.</s>

en: In April, before Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan visited Riyadh on Thursday and embraced Prince Mohammed, Turkey transferred the trial in absentia of 26 suspects in the Khashoggi case to Saudi Arabia.
sna: Muna Kubvumbi, mutungamiriri weTurkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan asati ashanyira Saudi Arabia neChina ndokumbundikira Prince Mohammed, Turkey yabvisa kutongwa vasipo kwevanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane chavakaita pakupondwa kwaKhashoggi vatongerwe kuSaudi Arabia.
mt0: <pad> In April, before Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan visited Riyadh on Thursday and hugged Prince Mohammed, Turkey transferred the trial in absentia of 26 suspects in the Khashoggi case to Saudi Arabia.</s>

en: Turkey's decision drew anguished protest from lawyers and Khashoggi's fiance, who insisted Saudi courts couldn't possibly hold a credible trial.
sna: Zvakaitwa neTurkey izvi zvadenha kushora kuzere kurwadziwa kubva kumagweta nemudiwa waKhashoggi, avo vakati matare edzimhosva emu Saudi Arabia haagone zvachose kutonga nyaya nenzira inoyemurika.
mt0: <pad> Turkey's decision drew anguished protest from lawyers and Khashoggi's fiance, who insisted Saudi courts couldn't possibly hold a credible trial.</s>

en: For the loved ones of those locked away, Khashoggi's killing fuels a uniform fear of speaking out.
sna: Kuhama nevadikani veavo vakavharirwa mumajeri,kupondwa kwa Khashoggi kunovesera kutya kwakafana pamusoro pekutaura vachitsoropodza nekushora
mt0: <pad> Kuti mhuri dzakachengetwa, rufu rwaKhashoggi runokurudzira kutya kukuru kutaura.</s>

en: I want to, many do, but we're scared, said a friend of Prince Salman bin Abdulaziz, who has been detained along with his father since 2018.
sna: Ndinoda, vazhinji vanoda, asi tinotya, yakadaro shamwari yaPrince Salman bin Abdulaziz, uyo anga ari muhusungwa pamwe chete nababa vake kubva muna 2018.
mt0: <pad> I want to, many do, but we're scared, said a friend of Prince Salman bin Abdulaziz, who has been detained along with his father since 2018.</s>

en: Everyone knows what happened to Khashoggi.
sna: Munhu wese anoziva zvakaitika kunaKhashoggi.
mt0: <pad> Everyone knows what happened to Khashoggi.</s>

en: Moroccan Prison Program Sets Out to De-Radicalize IS Veterans
sna: Chirongwa chemajeri emuMorocco Chinotanga Kutuvidza Nekubvisa Kukakatira Kurutivi Magamba  eIS
mt0: <pad> Moroccan Prison Program Sets Out to De-Radicalize IS Veterans</s>

en: As a combatant for the Islamic State group who left his native Morocco to join what he felt was a holy fight in Syria, Mohsin says he saw all the horrors of war.
sna: Semurwiri wechikwata cheIslamic State akabva kunyika yechizvarirwe, Morocco, achinopinda mune zvaaifungidzira kuti ihondo tsvene. Mohsin anoti muSyria akaona zvose zvinovhundutsa nekutyisa zvinoitika muhondo.
mt0: <pad> As a combatant for the Islamic State group, Mohsin says he saw all the horrors of war.</s>

en: "A terrifying experience," he says.
sna: Anoti, "Zvandakasangana nazvo zvinoita kuti muviri wangu umerere."
mt0: <pad> "Zvakaitika zvinotyisa," anodaro.</s>

en: Now a prisoner, the 38-year-old claims he is no longer the fanatic he was then, enraged with a murderous hatred for non-Muslims.
sna: Murume uyu, ave musungwa, aine nemakore ekuberekwa makumi matatu nemasere, anoti haasisiri mutevedzeri anoviravira nechidakadaka seezvaasiita kareko, achitsamwiswa neruvingo rwaisvitsa pakuurayavanhu vasiri vatenderi vechi Islam.
mt0: <pad> Now a prisoner, the 38-year-old claims he is no longer the fanatic he was then, enraged with a murderous hatred for non-Muslims.</s>

en: Captured in Turkey and extradited to Morocco, he is serving a 10-year prison term on terrorism charges.
sna: Mushure mekunge abatwa ari muTurkey akadzoserwa kuMorocco ari musungwa, uko akasvikotongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore gumi abatwa aine mhosva yekukonzeresa kusagadzikana munyika nenzira achishandisa nzira dzehugandanga.
mt0: <pad> Yakabatwa muTurkey uye akaendeswa kuMorocco, ari kurara makore gumi mujeri pamusoro penyaya yekurwisana nehama.</s>

en: Now the former fighter has graduated with 14 other prisoners convicted of terror offenses from a Morocco de-radicalization program that might make them more eligible for an early release.
sna: Murume aimbova murwi uyu, pamwe chete nevamwe vasungwa gumi vakasungirwawo mhosva dzehugandanga vakapedza zvidzidzo zvekuvabatsira kuti vasiyane nepfungwa dzinokakatira kurutivi muchirongwa chinogona kuti vagone kuburitswa mujeri nekukurumidza.
mt0: <pad> Zvino aimbova mubatsiri akapedza kudzidza pamwe chete ne 14 vamwe vakuru vemusungwa vakatongwa nemhosva yehondo kubva kuMorocco de-radicalization program inogona kuvaita kuti avo vanofanirwa kuwana mukana wekubudiswa nenguva.</s>

en: The Associated Press and other media were invited to observe their graduation ceremony Thursday in a prison in Sale near the Moroccan capital, Rabat, and to interview some prisoners under monitored and controlled conditions.
sna: Sangano reAssociated Press nemamwe masangano enhau akakokwa pachiitiko chikupihwa mapepa avo ekupedza zvidzidzo izvi nemusi weChina pajeri riri muSale pedyo neguta guru reMorocco, Rabat, apo masangano enhau aya akawana mukana wekubvunza mibvunzo kuvasungwa asi vari munzvimbo yavaionekwa nevatariri vemujeri. Vakuru vejeri vakasarudza vasungwa vatatu avo vakati vakange vakasununguka kuti vataure nevatapi venhau.
mt0: <pad> The Associated Press and other media were invited to observe their graduation ceremony Thursday in a prison in Sale near the Moroccan capital, Rabat, and to interview some prisoners under monitored and controlled conditions.</s>

en: Prison administration officials picked out three men they said were willing to be interviewed.
sna: Vakuru vejeri vakasarudza vasungwa vatatu avo vakati vakange vakasununguka kuti vataure nevatapi venhau.
mt0: <pad> Prison administration officials picked out three men they said were willing to be interviewed.</s>

en: Officials stipulated that the inmates shouldn't be identified by their full names and that their faces mustn't be shown, citing privacy reasons.
sna: Vakuru ava vakati vasungwa ava vakange vasingafanirwe kudomwa nemazita avo chaiwo, uye kuti zviso zvavo zvakange zvisingafanirwe kuratidzwa pamifananidzo kuitira kuti zvimiro zvavo zvichengetedza kune veruzhinji.
mt0: <pad> Vanoona nezvenyaya vakataura kuti vanhu vanenge vari mujeri havafaniri kuzivikanwa nezita ravo rese uye kuti mavara avo haafaniri kuonekwa, vachitsanangura zvikonzero zvekuchengeteka.</s>

en: But prison officials didn't listen to the interviews or intervene to shut down media lines of questioning or inmates' answers.
sna: Asi vakuru ava havana kunge vachiteerera nhaurirano dzaiitwa pakati pevatori venhau nevasungwa, kana kuedza kuvhara mimwe mibvunzo yaibvunzwa nevatapi venhau kana mhinduro dzaibva kuvasungwa.
mt0: <pad> Asi vakuru vemutorongo vakaramba kuteerera mabvunzo kana kuti vakapindira mukuvhara nzira dzekubvunza kana kuti mauto akabata nyaya.</s>

en: The 15 inmates in crisp shirts and trousers stood solemnly for Morocco's national anthem and were handed certificates.
sna: Vasungmawa gumi nevashanu ava vakange vakapfeka hanzu dzakachiswa dziine miponi, vakamira vakati twi vachiremekedza kuimbwa kwerwiyo rwenyika yeMorocco, pedzezvo kwava kuzogamuchidzwa mapepa ekupedza zvidzidzo.
mt0: <pad> 15 prisoners in crisp shirts and trousers vakamira zvakanaka paMorocco's national anthem uye vakapiwa macertificates.</s>

en: Prison officials said the de-radicalization program consisted of three months of classes in prison on religion, law and economics, and that inmates also received training on how to start a business.
sna: Vakuru vejeri vakati zvidzidzo zvekutuvidza pfungwa dzehugandanga dzinokakatira kurutivi zvayiitwa kwemwedzi mitatu zvichibata dzidziso dzechinamati, mutemo, nezvehupfumi, uyewo kurairidzwa kwevasungwa pamusoro pekutanga mabasa amaoko avo ezvemabhindauko.
mt0: <pad> Mukuru wedare akati chirongwa chekuderedza kuita kuti vanhu vapandukire ipapo chinosanganisira masvondo matatu ekuridza makirasi pamusoro pechitendero, mutemo uye zvehupfumi, uye kuti vanenge vari mujeri vakadzidziswa kutanga bhizimisi.</s>

en: These most recent graduates were the ninth batch since the program started in 2017.
sna: Chikwata chichangopedza zvidzidzo ichi ndicho chechipfumbamwe kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi muna 2017.
mt0: <pad> Vana ava ipapo ipapo vakapedza chikoro chechisere kubva pakavambwa kwechikoro ichi mugore ra2017.</s>

en: Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, the director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."
sna: Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, mukuru anoona nezvehurongwa hwunobata tsika nemagariro uye kugamuchirwa kwevaimbova vasungwa mudzimhuri nemunharaunda dzavagere, uye achishandira ari kumahofisi makuru ezve majeri muMorocco, vakati chirongwa ichi chinoitwa nevasungwa vanenge vachida  pasina kumanikidzwa, chiine chinangwa "chekushandura hunhu hwavo nekuwedzera mikana inogona kusimudzira hupenyu hwavo."
mt0: <pad> Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."</s>

en: It enables prisoners to form an awareness of the gravity of their mistakes, he said.
sna: Akati chirongwa ichi chinobatsira vasungwa kuti vaone hudzamu hwekukanganisa kwavo.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinobatsira vanhu vakachengetwa kuti vaone kukuru kwezvikanganiso zvavo, akadaro.</s>

en: Graduating from the program doesn't make inmates automatically eligible for early release, but does increase their chances of getting a royal pardon or a reduced sentence.
sna: Chikamu chinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemajeri chinoti kupedza zvidzo izvi hakubve kwapa vasungwa kodzero yekuti vabude mujeri nekukasira, asi zvinowedzera mukana wavo wekupihwa ruregerero rwaMambo weMorocco, kana kudokopeswa kwezvirango zvavakatemerwa.
mt0: <pad> Kuti ugraduate kubva mupurogiramu hai kuita kuti vagari vemo vakwanise kuwana mvumo yekubuda kumba, asi inovandudza mikana yavo yekuwana mvumo yechimambo kana kuti kurangwa.</s>

en: That's been the case for just over half the program's 222 graduates so far, the prison administration says.
sna: Izvi ndizvo zvanga zvichiitika kune nechidimbu chiri pakati nepakati chevasungwa mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevaviri.
mt0: <pad> Saka izvi zvaitika kune vanhu vanodarika hafu ye 222 vadzidzi vepurogiramu yacho, mabasa emusungwa anotaura.</s>

en: Ten women have graduated so far all of them since released, including eight with pardons.
sna: Kubva muna 2019 zvidzidzo izvi zvakapihwawo kune vanhukadzi vakange vawanikwa vaine mhosva pasi pemutemo wemuMorocco unorwisana nehugandanga unonzi Anti-Terrorism Act.
mt0: <pad> 10 vakadzi vakapedza kudzidza uye vose vakabva vambobudiswa, kusanganisira 8 avo vakabviswa.</s>

en: Since 2019, the training has also been offered to women convicted under Morocco's Anti-Terrorism Act.
sna: Madzimai gumi akapedza zvidzidzo izvi, vese vakabva vaburitswa mujeri, kusanganisira vasere vakaregererwa.
mt0: <pad> Kubvira 2019, ruzivo rwacho rwakapihwawo kuvakadzi vakatongwa pasi peMorocco's Anti-Terrorism Act.</s>

en: Called "Moussalaha," meaning "reconciliation" in Arabic, the program is offered to prisoners who have demonstrated a readiness to disavow extremism.
sna: "Moussalaha" zvinoreva mururimi rwechiArabic kuti "kuyananiswa" chinopihwa kuvasungwa vanenge varatidza kuti vagadzirira kusiyana zvachose nepfungwa dzinokakatira kurutivi.
mt0: <pad> Kuti "Moussalaha," izvo zvinoreva "kuwirirana" muArabic, chirongwa chinopihwa kuvagari varatidza kuti vakagadzirira kuvenga extremism.</s>

en: Mohsin said he left to fight in Syria in 2012. A school dropout as a teen, he said he "was virtually illiterate and couldn't discern good from bad."
sna: Mohsin akati akaenda kunorwa kuSyria muna 2012. Semunhu akasiya chikoro panzira achiri chikomana chidoko , akati akange "asati ogona kupatsanura zvakanaka kubva pane zvakaipa".
mt0: <pad> Mohsin akati akaenda kuSyria muna2012, aimbova mudzidzisi wekirasi, akati "aiva asina kudzidza uye haana kunzwisisa zvakanaka kubva pane zvakaipa."</s>

en: He said he was radicalized by people who showed him extremist videos "about the divine obligation to battle those who don't follow Islamic principles and to murder non-Muslims."
sna: Akati akazokwezverwa kupfungwa dzinokakatira kurutivi nevanhu vakamuratidza mifananidzo yemuzvivhitivhiti zvinoratidza nzira nezviito zvehugandanga zvaiitwa zvichinzi "ndizvo zvakarairwa naMwari kuti varwisane nevose vasingatevere mirairo yechi Islam nekuuraya vanhu vasiri maMuslim."
mt0: <pad> He said he was radicalized by people who showed him videos "about the divine obligation to battle those who don't follow Islamic principles and to murder non-Muslims."</s>

en: In Syria, "I saw massacres, rapes, and thefts," he said.
sna: Akati, 'KuSyria ndakaona kupondwa kwevanhu vazhinji panguva imwe chete, kubata chibharo nehumbavha.
mt0: <pad> In Syria, "I saw massacres, rapes, and thefts," he said.</s>

en: "I concluded after a time that the fight being conducted in the name of Islam had nothing to do with our religion."
sna: Pakupedzesera ndakazoona kuti hondo yaiitwa muzita rechi Islam yakange isineyi nechekuita nechinamato chedu."
mt0: <pad> "Ndakazofunga pashure pekuedza kuti hondo inoitwa nezita reIslam haina chokuita nedini redu.</s>

en: He escaped to Turkey in 2018 and was detained for a year there before being extradited to Morocco.
sna: Akatizira kuTurkey muna 2018 asi akabatwa akaiswa mujeri ikoko kwegore kwava kuzodzoserwa kuMorocco semusungwa.
mt0: <pad> He escaped to Turkey in 2018 and was detained there for a year before being extradited to Morocco.</s>

en: He says he has now disavowed extremism.
sna: Anoti ikezvino akagura hukama zvachose nepfungwa dzinokakatira kurutivi.
mt0: <pad> He says he has now disavowed extremism.</s>

en: That period of my life has passed, he said.
sna: Akati, 'Chikamu ichi chehupenyu hwangu chakapfuura."
mt0: <pad> Saka ndava kuedza kuti ndiite izvi, akati.</s>

en: Numerous Moroccans have traveled to Syria, Iraq and elsewhere to join extremist groups.
sna: Vanhu vekuMorocco vazhinjisa vanoenda kuSyria, Iraq nedzimwe nyika kuti vave nhengo dzezvikwata zvinokakatira kurutivi .
mt0: <pad> Vanhu vakawanda vekuMorocco vakaenda kuSyria, Iraq uye kunzvimbo dzekunze kuti vabatane nehama dzakasiyana-siyana.</s>

en: Morocco has also experienced multiple attacks itself.
sna: Morocco pachezvayo inosimborwiswawo ruzhinji nezvikwata izvi.
mt0: <pad> Morocco yakaona zvakare mashambulio akawanda.</s>

en: Five suicide attacks in Casablanca in 2003 killed 33 people.
sna: Panguva dzinoita shanu vanhu vakazviisungurira mabhambhu pamiviri yavo , vakaaputitsa muCasablanca muna 2003. , ndookuraya vanhu makumi matatu nevatau.
mt0: <pad> Five suicide attacks in Casablanca in 2003 killed 33 people.</s>

en: In 2011, an explosion destroyed a cafe in Marrakech, killing 17 people, most of them foreign tourists.
sna: Muna 2011, bhambu rakaputika rikaparadza imba yekudyira muMarrakech, ndookuraya vanhu gumi nevanomwe, vazhinji vavcho vainge vari vashanyi vainge vabva kume dzimwe nyika.
mt0: <pad> In 2011, a bomb destroyed a cafe in Marrakech, killing 17 people, most of them foreign tourists.</s>

en: Al Mustapaha Razrazi, a clinical psychologist and member of the program's scientific committee, said among 156 people who have been released after attending the courses, just one has been caught committing a crime again.
sna: Al Mustapaha, anoona nezvehutano hwepfungwa, uyo ari nhengo yechikamu chechorongwa ichi chinoona nezveruzivo rwesainzi, akati pakati pevanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu vakaregerrewa mushure mekuita zvidzidzo izvi, munhu mumwe chete ndiye oga akabatwa achopara mhosva zvakare.
mt0: <pad> Al Mustapaha Razrazi, a clinical psychologist and member of the program's scientific committee, said among 156 people who have been released after attending the courses, just one has been caught committing a crime again.</s>

en: That person was convicted of a non-terrorism-related offense, he said.
sna: Akati munhu uyu akabatwa nemhosva isineyi nezvehugandanga
mt0: <pad> Akanga akatongerwa mhosva yenyaya isina kubatanidzwa nekurwisana, akati.</s>

en: Iran Gets Opportunity to Sell Auto Parts to Russian Carmaker
sna: Iran Inowana Mukana Wekutengesa Midziyo Inoshandiswa Pakugadzira Padzimotokari Kukambani Yemotokari YekuRussia
mt0: <pad> Iran Gets Opportunity to Sell Auto Parts to Russian Carmaker</s>

en: A member of Iran's syndicate of car parts manufacturers says Iranian producers have an opportunity to export their wares to a Russian carmaker, state media reported.
sna: Msangano ezvenhau anoshanda ari pasi pehurumende anoti nhengo yemushandira pamwe wemakambani anogadzira zvinodiwa padzimotokari chemuIran inoti vagadziri vemuIran nemukana wekutengesa zvigadzirwa zvavo kune imwekambani yekuRussia inogadzira motokari
mt0: <pad> Mumwe weIran's syndicate of car parts manufacturers says Iranian producers have an opportunity to export their wares to a Russian carmaker, state media reported.</s>

en: The late Monday report quoted Hossein Bahrainian as saying "a prominent Russian car maker" requested parts from Iran.
sna: Nhau idzi dzakabuda manheru emusi weMuvhuro akapa mashoko ava Hossein Bahrainian vachinzi vaiti "imwe kambani ine mbiri yekuRussia inogadzira motokari" yakakumbira twumapazi twedzimotokari kubva kuIran.
mt0: <pad> The late Monday report quoted Hossein Bahrainian as saying "a prominent Russian car maker" requested parts from Iran.</s>

en: He did not name the manufacturer. He said it requested brake parts, airbags, air-conditioner parts and other components.
sna: Haana kuzodoma kambai inogadzira motokari iyi nezita. Akati yakakumbira mapazi anoita kuti motokari ideredza kumhanya kwayo kana kuoti imire, zvitsapo zvinozara mweya kuti vanhu vasarovere misoro pamasimbi kana motokari yapinda munjodzi (  airbags),  mishina inoderedza kana kuwedzera kudziya kana kutonhorera mukati memotokari (air-conditioner parts) netwumwewo twumapazi twunadiwa mudzimotokari.
mt0: <pad> He did not name the manufacturer. He said it requested brake parts, airbags, air-conditioner parts and other components.</s>

en: Both Iran and Russia are under U.S. sanctions but the export of Iranian cars and car parts is not subject to sanctions.
sna: Russia neIran dziri pasi pezvirango zvehupfumi zveAmerica asi kutengeswa kwe motokari netwumapazi twemotokari hazvisi pasi pezvirango izvi.
mt0: <pad> Iran uye Russia ndevepasi pezvirango zveUnited States asi export of Iranian cars and car parts hairi pasi pezvirango.</s>

en: The import of automobiles to Iran is also not subject to sanctions.
sna: Kutengwa kwedzimotokorai kubva kune dzimwe nyika hakusi pasi pezvirango izvo.
mt0: <pad> Importing cars to Iran is also not subject to sanctions.</s>

en: However, Tehran has not imported cars since 2018, after the U.S. withdrew from a nuclear deal between Iran and world powers and imposed oil and banking sanctions on Iran.
sna: Kunyangwe zvakadaro, Iran haina kuzombotenga motokari kubva kune dzimwe nyika kubva muna 2018, mushure mekunge America yamuba muzvisungo zvine chekuita nesimba renuclear pakati peIran nenyika dzine simba dzepasi rose, pedzezvo kwava kutema Iran nezvirango pane zvemafuta emishina nedzinmotokari uyewo pane zvemabhanga.
mt0: <pad> Zvisinei, Tehran haana kutenga mota kubva 2018, mushure mekunge United States ichibuda munuclear deal between Iran and world powers and imposed oil and banking sanctions on Iran.</s>

en: Western nations stopped exporting to Russia after the invasion of Ukraine.
sna: Nyika dzekumavirira dzakamira kutengesera midziyo nezviwanikwa zvadzo kuRussia mushure mekunge yapinda zvine hisimba repfuti muUkraine.
mt0: <pad> Manyika ekumadokero akamira kuendesa zvinhu kuRussia mushure mekupinda kweUkraine.</s>

en: Iran in recent years has exported car radiators and suspension systems to Russia. In the past it exported cars to Iraq, Syria and Venezuela.
sna: Mumakore achangodarika Iran yanga ichitengesera Russia mapazi edzimotokari anoita anopomodza kupisa kweinjini dzemotokari painenge ichifamba (radiators), uye zvinota kuti motokari igone kutakura zvinhu isingarerekere kurutivi  yakarembera (suspension systems) kuIraq, Syria neVenezuela.
mt0: <pad> Iran inobva kuIran yakatengesa ma radiators uye suspension systems kuRussia mumakore achangobva kupera. Kare akatengesa motokari kuIraq, Syria uye Venezuela.</s>

en: Tehran and Moscow have had close relations in recent years, especially after Iran's sole nuclear power plant went online in 2011 with help from Russia.
sna: Iran neRussia dzakava nehukama hwepedyo mumakore achangodarika, zvikuru mushure mekunge nzvimbo imwe chete inogadzira simba renuclear yaburitswa pamasayisayi emadandemutande ichiwana rubatsiro kubva kuRussia.
mt0: <pad> Tehran naMoscow vakaita hukama hwepedyo mumakore achangopfuura, kunyanya mushure mekunge Iran's sole nuclear power plant yakatanga kushanda muna 2011 nekubatsira kweRussia.</s>

en: Separately on Tuesday, Iran said it has played a mediatory role in the war in Ukraine.
sna: Ichitaura yakazvimiririra nemusi weChipiri, Iran yakati yaita basa rekuti pave nenhaurirano pamusoro pehondo iri muUkraine.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwechetezvo, Iran yakataura nemusi weChipiri kuti yakanga iri kuita basa rekuratidza zvinhu muhondo yeUkraine.</s>

en: So far twice I have conveyed messages from the foreign minister of Ukraine to my Russian counterpart, said Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian in a phone conversation with his Irish counterpart.
sna: vaHossein Amir Abdollahian gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana kwe Iran nedzimwe nyika, vachitaura gurukota rezvekunze kweIreland, vakati, "Kusvikira pari nhasi ndakatura mashoko kubva gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika reku Ukraine achienda kune gurukota rinoita basa rimwe chetero rekuRussia."
mt0: <pad> Zvino twice ndakaendesa mashoko kubva kuUkraine minister wehurumende yeUkraine kuna Russian counterpart, akadaro Minister of Foreign Affairs Hossein Amir Abdollahian during a phone conversation with his Irish counterpart.</s>

en: He said Iran supports diplomatic solutions for restoring peace and stability.
