sna: Vakati Iran inotsigira basa rinounza mhinduro kuburikidzana nekutaurirana kwakanaka pakati penyika dzakasiyana kuti kuti pane nekudzoredzaniswa kwerugare nekugadzikana.
mt0: <pad> He said Iran inotenda mazano ediplomacy ekudzorera rugare uye kugadzikana.</s>

en: Abdollahian did not elaborate but said Iran "opposes war and displacement of human beings in Ukraine," and other paces like Yemen, the Palestinian lands and Afghanistan.
sna: Abdollahian havana kuzotsanangura zvavaireva, asi vakati Iran "haiwirirane nehondo nekubviswa kwe vanhu kubva mumisha nedzimba dzavo zviri kuitika muUkraine," nedzimwe nzvimbo dzakaita seYemen, the nyika nzvimbo dzemuPalestine nekuAfghanistan.
mt0: <pad> Abdollahian haana kutaura zvakawanda asi akati Iran "inoramba hondo uye kudzivisa vanhu kubva muUkraine," uye dzimwe nzvimbo seYemen, the Palestinian lands and Afghanistan.</s>

en: Diversity, New Perspectives Are Applied to Middle East Coverage
sna: Kushandisa Nzira Dzakawanda, Maonero Matsva, Zvoshandiswa Pamanyorerwo Enhau Dzeku Middle East
mt0: <pad> Diversity, New Perspectives Are Applied to Middle East Coverage</s>

en: Natalia Sancha has always adopted a collaborative approach to journalism.
sna: Muzvare Natalia Sancha vakagara aine maonero ekuti vatapi venhau vanofanirwa kushanda nekuonera pamwe nevamwe pakutapa nhau.
mt0: <pad> Natalia Sancha always adopted a collaborative approach to journalism.</s>

en: When out on assignment, she speaks to others covering the same story about their perspectives.
sna: Kana vabuda kunotora nhau, vanotaura nevabiyavo vanenge vachishanda panyaya imwe chete naye vachivabvunza pamusoro pemaonero avanoita nyaya iyi.
mt0: <pad> When she is out on assignment, she speaks to others covering the same story about their perspectives.</s>

en: This partly stems from an interest in telling underreported stories, but as a female journalist in a male-dominated region, she says collaboration and supporting the women she works with have always been important.
sna: Chikamu chezvizvi chinobva pachishuvo chekutapa nhau pamusoro penyaya dzisina anonyora pamusoro padzo, asiwo semutapi wenhau wechidzimayi vanoshanda mudunhu rinotongwa nevanhurume, vanoti  she kushanda vanhu vachibatsirana nekutsigira vanhukadzi vavanoshanda navo zvimwe zvagara zvakakosha kuita.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinobva mukuda kutaura nyaya dzakawanda dzisina kumbozivikanwa, asi sezvo ari mutori wenhau akadzi mune imwe nzvimbo yakazara varume, anoti kushandira pamwe uye kubatsira vakadzi vanoshanda navo zvakakosha.</s>

en: I would talk to male and female journalists, and I always realized that women had a similar perspective, because we had similar experiences while covering the story, the 42-year-old journalist said.
sna: Mutapi wenhau uyu, ane makore makumi mana nemaviri, anoti, "Mushure mekutaura nevatore venhau vechirume nevechikadzi, ndakachizoona kuti vanhukadzi vne maonero mamwe chete, nekuti tinosangana nezvinhu zvakafanana patinenge tichitapa nhau.".
mt0: <pad> I would talk to male and female journalists, and I always realized that women had a similar perspective, because we had similar experiences while covering the story, the 42-year-old journalist said.</s>

en: That collaborative approach came into play in 2020 when a publisher asked Sancha if she was interested in writing a book about Syria.
sna: Nzira iyi yekushanda pamwe chete nevamwe yakazobuda pachena muna 2020 apo mumwe munhu anodhinda nekutengesa mabhuku yakabvunza Sanchez kuti aingada here kunyora bhuku pamusoro peSyria.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinoita kuti vanhu vakurudze nhaurirano yacho, uye nzvimbo yepasi rese, zvakatanga kuitwa muna 2020 pamwechete neSancha, paakataurwa kuti anoda kunyora bhuku pamusoro peSyria.</s>

en: She countered with a better offer.
sna: Akabva apawo zano raive nani.
mt0: <pad> She countered with a better offer.</s>

en: I told him that a collective narrative by women journalists about the broader region would have a different effect, she said.
sna: Anoti, ' Ndakamuudza kuti rungano rwakanyorwa nevatori venhau vechidzimayi pamusoro pedunhu iri rose rwaizove nemutsindo wakasiyana.
mt0: <pad> I told him that a collective narrative by women journalists about the broader region would have a different effect, she said.</s>

en: "I could have written the book myself, but it would not have the same sense."
sna: Ndingadayi ndakanyora bhuku iri ndiri ndoga ndimene, asi haraizove nechirevo chimwe chete sezvakabuda ndarinyora nevabiyangu."
mt0: <pad> "Ndangariro yangu yainge iri kuti ndinyore bhuku racho ndiri, asi haingazoita musoro wenyaya.</s>

en: Originally from Andalusia in southern Spain, Sancha spent the past 14 years in the Middle East covering conflicts in Iraq, Syria and Yemen, and reporting from Egypt, Lebanon and Tunisia.
sna: Sancha akaberekerwa nekukura kuAndalusia kuchamhembe kweSpain, asi ndokuzopedza makore guymi nemana ari mudunhu reMiddle East achinyora nhau dzehondo muIraq, Syria neYemen, achinyora nhau dzacho ari kuEgypt, Lebanon Tunisia.
mt0: <pad> Originally from Andalusia in southern Spain, Sancha has spent the past 14 years in the Middle East covering conflicts in Iraq, Syria and Yemen, and reporting from Egypt, Lebanon and Tunisia.</s>

en: She has been working more recently with the European Union communications department, after leaving Beirut for health reasons following a mass explosion that rocked the city in 2020.
sna: Munguva ichangodarika anga achishanda nebazi rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko nekutaurirana reEuropean Union, mushure mekubva muBeirut nekuda kwezvikonzero zvine chekuita nehutano hwake, mushure mekuputika kwemabhambhu akawanda panguva imwechete akaitika muguta iri muna2020.
mt0: <pad> She has been working more recently with the European Union communications department, after leaving Beirut for health reasons following a mass explosion that rocked the city in 2020</s>

en: Women "have a different experience because we would go to places that our male colleagues were not used to.
sna: Sancha akaudza VOA kuti,  "Madzimayi anezvaanoona nekusangana nazvo zvakasiyana nekuti taiseinda kunzvimbo idzo vanhurume vataishanda navo vakange vasina kujaira kuendako.
mt0: <pad> Vanhukadzi "vanoita ruzivo rwekusiyana nokuti tinogona kuenda kunzvimbo dzakawanda dzaisingazivikanwe nehama dzedu.</s>

en: Not because we're smarter, but just because the majority of the region is still Arab, Muslim and gender-segregated," Sancha told VOA.
sna: Kwete nekuti takangwara kuvadarika, asi nekuti nzvimbo zhinjisa dzedunhu iri dziri pasi pechitsika dzechiArab, chinamato chechiMuslim uye zvinhu zvose zvinotsaurwa, kusanwa nekuonekwa maringe nekuti zvinobatsira vanhurume here zvisingatarisewo rutivi rwevanhukadzi."
mt0: <pad> "Hazvinai kuti tiri smarter, asi nokuti the majority of the region is still Arab, Muslim and gender-segregated," Sancha told VOA.</s>

en: Having women reporters has an impact, she noted.
sna: Akazotizve kuva nevatapi venhau vechidzimayi kunemutsindo mukuru.
mt0: <pad> Kuti vanhukadzi vabudise mashoko anoita kuti zvinhu zviite zvakanaka, akadaro.</s>

en: If I put myself in the position of the reader, I would prefer to have a woman telling me the story because it is going to be about 100 percent of the population, which means you are going to have a more inclusive narrative on the conflict.
sna: Kuri kunzi ndazviisa pachinzvimbo chemuverengi wenhau, ndingada chose kuti munhukadzi andiudze nyaya nekuti inenge ichibata vanhu vese vemunzvimbo yakaitikira nyaya, zvichireve kuti unozove nenyaye inotarisa nekuratidza zviri kuitika nemativi oset.
mt0: <pad> Kana ndakagara ndiri muranda wenyaya, ndingadai ndakada kuti munhukadzi anondivudza nyaya yacho nokuti anenge 100 percent yevanhu vese vanozoita izvi, zvinoreva kuti unofanira kuva nenyaya inosanganisira vanhu vose pamusoro pehondo.</s>

en: For her book, Sancha reached out to other women who cover the Middle East, to ensure diverse perspectives from foreign and local reporters.
sna: Pakunyora bhuku rake, Sancha akabatana nemamwe madzimayi anonyora nhau pamusoro peMiddle East, kuti pave nemaonero akasiyana siyana kubva kuvatapi venhau vekune dzimwe nyika neavo vari zvizvarwa zvemudunhu iri.
mt0: <pad> Kuti aite bhuku rake, Sancha akakurukura nevamwe vakadzi vanotaura pamusoro peMiddle East, kuitira kuti maonero akasiyana-siyana kubva kune vanhu vakawanda uye vatorwa.</s>

en: The result of the nearly two-year collaboration is Bullets for All, released in Spanish in April.
sna: Zvakazobuda mubaa rekushandira pamwechete nevamwe kwemakore akapotsa aita maviri, ibhuku rinonzi Mabara Kune Vose (Bullets for All) iro rakanyorwa mumutauro wechiSpanish munaKubvumbi.
mt0: <pad> Saka zvaibuda kubva mukushanda kwemakore maviri ndeye Bullets for All, yakaburitswa muSpanish munaKurume.</s>

en: In the book, "we tell one story with different voices that represent all the women" from the region, Sancha said.
sna: Asanchez akati, " Mubhuku iri, tinotaura nyaya imwe chete asi tichishandisa manzwi akasiyana siyana ayo anomiririra madzimayi ose emudunhu iri."
mt0: <pad> In the book, "we tell one story with different voices that represent all the women" from the region, Sancha said.</s>

en: Each offers a personal perspective on covering historic moments, including the collapse of autocratic governments, popular protest movements and war.
sna: Rungano rwega rwega rwunopa maonero emunhukadzi sedungamunhu pakunyora nhau pamusoro penguva dzinokosha dzenhorondo yenzvimbo nevanhu vageremo, kusanganisira uwa kwehurumende dzinotonga nedemo, kuratidzira pamusoro pezvisina kumira  zvakanaka kunoitwa nevanhu vazhinji uyewo nehondo.
mt0: <pad> Each one offers a personal perspective on covering historic moments, including the fall of autocratic governments, popular protest movements and war.</s>

en: It also examines the discrimination and harassment women face in the newsroom and on assignment.
sna: Bhuku iri rinoongororawo kusanwa nekushungurudzwa kwevanhukadzi mumahofisi anonyorerwa nhau uye kana vari pabasa vachitapa nhau munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana.
mt0: <pad> It also examines the discrimination and harassment women face in the newsroom and on assignment.</s>

en: Making connections
sna: Kubatanidza Hukama
mt0: <pad> Make a cake</s>

en: Understanding language and culture goes a long way toward making progress in the region, says Maya Gebeily.
sna: Maya Gebeiily anoti kunzwisisa mutauro netsika dzevanhu kunobatsira zvikuru mukuunza budiriro mudunhu.
mt0: <pad> Kunyatsoteerera nendimi uye tsika kunoenda nenzira yakareba mukuvandudza nyika, anodaro Maya Gebeily.</s>

en: The Reuters bureau chief for Lebanon, Syria and Jordan is one of the contributors to the book.
sna: Mutapi mukuru wenhau anomiririra Reuters muLebanon, Syria neJordan ndiye mumwe weavo vane zvavakanyora mubhuku iri.
mt0: <pad> The Reuters bureau chief for Lebanon, Syria and Jordan is one of the contributors to the book.</s>

en: There's a lot to say and show from the perspective of women reporters who were also then influenced by the women that they met as they were doing their reporting, she said.
sna: Akati pane zvakawanda zvekutaura nekuratidza takamira pamaonero evatapi venhau vechidzimayi vakabatwa pfungwa nemaonero nemadzimayi avaisangana navo apo vayitapa nhau.
mt0: <pad> Kune zvakawanda zvekutaura uye kuratidza kubva pane maonero evakadzi vakurukuri avo vakabva vauchinzwanana nevanhukadzi avo vaivewo vakaitawo basa rekuratidza, akadaro.</s>

en: Born in the U.S. to Lebanese parents, Gebeily started her journalism career in 2013 with a local news site in Beirut, Lebanon.
sna: Gebeily uyo vabereki vake vari vekuLebanon akatanga basa rake rekutapa nhau muna2013 ari pane rimwe dandemutande rezvenhau riri muBeirut, kuLebanon.
mt0: <pad> Born in the U.S. to Lebanese parents, Gebeily began her journalism career in 2013 with a local news site in Beirut, Lebanon.</s>

en: She went on to cover the region for Agence France-Presse before joining Reuters.
sna: Akachitanga kunyorera nhau dzake sangano renhau rinonzi Agence France-Presse asati tanga kushandira Reuters.
mt0: <pad> Zvino akazoenda kuAfrica kunoratidzira Agence France-Presse uye Reuters.</s>

en: Gebeily said her American and Lebanese background helped her understand the region better, which in turn has shaped her reporting.
sna: Gebeily akati nhaka yekuti mwana wekuLebanon akazvarirwa nekukurira muAmerica kwakamubatsira kuti anzwisise dunhu iri nenzira iri nani izvowo zvakazoshandura nekuveza manyorero aanoita nhau.
mt0: <pad> Gebeily akati kuti tsika dzake dzekuAmerica neLebanoni dzakaita kuti ave nechokwadi chekuti anonyatsoziva nzvimbo yacho, izvo zvakaumba maonero ake.</s>

en: Knowing the local language is an important part of that.
sna: Kuziva mutauro unoshandiswa nevagari vemunzvimbo yaunoshandira pairi chikamu chakakosha panyaya iyi yese.
mt0: <pad> Kuti ugone kutaura chirudzi chekwako, unofanira kunzwisisa chirudzi chacho.</s>

en: When interviewing a minister or a displaced person or an activist, the most important element is getting their trust, she said. "If you're able to speak the language and make them feel comfortable from the beginning, it changes everything.
sna: Akati, 'Kana uchibvunza mibvunzo gurukota rehurumende kana munhu akabviswa kunzvimbo kwaaigara kana munhu anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, chinhu chakanyanya kukosha kuti ndiye munhu anooneka semunhu akavimbika. Kana uchigona kutaura mutauro wavo wobva wavaita kuti vasununguke kubva muchitanga, zvinoshandira zvinhu zvose.
mt0: <pad> Kana uri kubvunza mubatiri kana munhu akatama kana mudzidzisi, chikamu chinokosha ndechekuwana ukama hwavo, akati. "Kana iwe unogona kutaura chirudzi uye kuvaita kuti vaoneke vakasununguka kubva pakutanga, izvi zvinochinja zvese.</s>

en: It grants you a very beautiful kind of access."
sna: Zvinokupa mukana wakaisvonakisa"
mt0: <pad> It gives you a very beautiful kind of access.</s>

en: In addition to Iraq and Lebanon, Gebeily, 30, has also traveled to Syria to cover the war against the Islamic State (IS) militant group.
sna: Kunze kwekuenda kuIraq nekuLebanon, Gebeily uyo ava nemakore ekuzvarwa makumi matatu, akaenda kuSyria kunonyora nhau pamusoro pehondo yekurwisana nechikwata chechigandanga cheIslamic State (IS).
mt0: <pad> In addition to Iraq and Lebanon, Gebeily, 30, has also traveled to Syria to cover the war against the Islamic State (IS) militant group.</s>

en: Ive been very privileged to access some communities directly without having to work with a translator or a fixer, which also shapes the way that the stories come out, she said.
sna: Akati '"Ndakawana mukana mukuru kwazvo kuti ndigone kupinda mukati mevanhu munzvimbo dzavagere ndisina muturikiri kana munhu anondirongera kuti ndigamuchirike izvo zvinoveza nekukwenenzvera mabudiro anozoita nhau idzi."
mt0: <pad> Ive gone very privileged to access some communities directly without having to work with a translator or a fixer, which also shapes the way that the stories come out, she said.</s>

en: Syrian-Kurdish journalist Khabat Abbas, who has covered the war in Syria, attests to the importance of that.
sna: Khabat Abbas mutapi wenhau aneropa rekuSyria neKurdistan maari,akasimbisawo kukosha kwezvizvi.
mt0: <pad> Khabat Abbas, a Syrian-Kurdish journalist, who has been covering the war in Syria, attests to the importance of that.</s>

en: Its knowing the language and the culture that gives people a sense of comfort to open up to you, she told VOA from Qamishli, Syria.
sna: Achitaura ari kuQamishli, muSyria, akaudza VOA, "Kuziva mutauro netsika dzevanhu kunovapa kugadzikana kuti vasununguke kwutaura newe vachiburitsa zviri mavari."
mt0: <pad> It's knowing the language and the culture that gives people a sense of comfort to open up to you, she told VOA from Qamishli, Syria.</s>

en: That knowledge helped when Abbas, 34, was on assignment with Sancha in March 2021.
sna: Ruzivo nehuchenjeri uhwu hwakabatsira apo Abbas, uyo ane makore makumi matatu nemana ainge ari pabasa rekutapa nhau pamwechete naSancha munaKurume wa2021.
mt0: <pad> Saka ruzivo urwo rwakabatsira Abbas, 34, paakaenda kubasa neSancha munaKurume 2021.</s>

en: They traveled to a Kurdish-run detention camp in northeast Syria and interviewed female jihadists affiliated with IS, for a story in El Pais.
sna: Vakaenda kukune imwe kamba yaichengetwa vanhu vanenge vasungwa yaitungamirirwa nevanhu verudzi rwechiKurd kumaodzanyemba akadziva kumavirira emuSyria vakabvunza mibvunzo kumagandanga echidzimayi anofambidzana neIS, vachinyora nhau dzaizobuda mubepanhau reEl Pais.
mt0: <pad> Vanoenda kuimba inochengetwa neKurdish muNorth Syria uye vanobvunza vakadzi jihadist vakabatana neIS, kuti vaite nyaya muEl Pais.</s>

en: While in Qamishli [in northeast Syria], I ran into two British journalists, very good colleagues of mine, who were disappointed after Shamima Begum and other women at the camp refused to talk to them, Sancha said, referring to a young woman who left her home in Britain aged 15 to join IS.
sna: Ndiri kuQamishli [kumaodzanyemba akadziva kumabvazuva ekuSyria], ndakasangana nevatapi venhau vaviri vekuBritain, vavo andishanda navo zvakanaka, vakange vagumbuka mushure mekunge Shamima Begum nemamwe madzimayi pakamba iyi vakaramba kutaura navo, akadaro Sancha achitauta pamusoro pemumwe mudzimayi wechidiki akabva kumusha kwake kuBritain aine makore gumi nemashanu kuti ave nhengo yeIS.
mt0: <pad> Ndiri muQamishli [muNorth Syria], ndakasangana nevakuru vaviri veBritain, vavengi vangu vakawanda, avo vakasuruvara kuti Shamima Begum uye vamwe vakadzi muimba yacho havana kuedza kutaura navo, Sancha akadaro.</s>

en: Their fixer was a man, so the jihadist women didnt talk to them because they are radical, and they dont talk to men.
sna: Sancha akati, "Gwevedzi ravo rakavarongera kutaura nevakadzi ava aiva munhurume, asi vakaramba kutaura nevatapi venhau ava, uye nekuti magandangakadzi aya vanokakatira kurutivi zvachose uye havataure nevanhurume.
mt0: <pad> Aiva murume, saka vakadzi vejihadist havana kutaura navo nokuti ivo vane mafungiro akaoma, uye havataure nevanhu.</s>

en: But then I was able to sit with Shamima and other women, who gave fantastic interviews from inside their tents, Sancha said.
sna: Asi ndakagona kugara pasi ndikataura naShamima nemamwe madzimayi,  avo vakapindura mibvunzo yedu nenzira inoyemurika tiri mumatende avo mavanogara."
mt0: <pad> Asi ndakakwanisa kugara Shamima uye vamwe vakadzi, avo vakaita mabvunzurudzo akazonaka kubva mukati memahombekombe avo, Sancha akataura.</s>

en: Abbas had a role in getting to talk to those women, she added.
sna: Akatzve Abbas akaita chikamu ckikuru mukuita kuti madzimayi aya abvume kutaura navo.
mt0: <pad> Abbas aiva nebasa rekumboonana naMai Vakadzi ava, akawedzera.</s>

en: Unlike Sancha and Gebeily, Abbas grew up in the marginalized Kurdish region of Syria, where until the war began in 2011, journalism effectively didnt exist.
sna: Zvisina kuita kunge Sancha and Gebeily, Abbas akakurira mudundu rinosemwa rinogara rudzi rwemaKurd muSyria, umo makange musina chinhu chinonzi kutapa nhau kusvikira pakazotanga hondo mu2011.
mt0: <pad> Unlike Sancha and Gebeily, Abbas grew up in the marginalized Kurdish region of Syria, where until the war began in 2011, journalism effectively didnt exist.</s>

en: Ordinary people in our region were used to seeing women pick up arms and fight, but they werent used to seeing a woman hold a camera on the streets and on front lines, Abbas said.
sna: Vanhuwo zvavo mudunhu medu vakange vajaira kuona vanhukadzi vachitora zvombo kuti vanorwa uye vakange vasina kujaira kuona munhukadzi akabata chinotora mifananidzo ari mumigwagwa arikumberi kwezvirikuitika, Abbas akadaro.
mt0: <pad> Vanhu vekunyika yedu vakajaira kuona vakadzi vachibata maoko uye kurwa, asi havana kuzojaira kuona mukadzi akabata kamera mumaguta uye pamberi pehondo, Abbas said.</s>

en: "It took a lot of sacrificing for me to convince my family and society that Im as good, if not better, as my male colleagues."
sna: "Zvakatora kuzvipira kuzhinji kuti ndipwise mhuri yangu nevanhu vemunzvimbo yedu kuti ndinogona kana kutokunda vanhurume vandinoshanda navo."
mt0: <pad> "Zvinotora nguva yakawanda kuti nditendese mhuri yangu uye vanhu kuti ndiri sezvakanaka, kana kuti zvakanaka kupfuura shamwari dzangu dzevarume."</s>

en: Journalism appealed to her because the story of the Middle East has often been told by male journalists, both local and foreign.
sna: Kutapa nhau kwakamukwezva nekuti nyaya nerungano rwemuMiddle East rwunositaugwa nevatapi venhau vanhurume, vari vekunedzimwe nyika nezvizvarwa zvemo.
mt0: <pad> Nyaya yeMiddle East yainge yakanyanya kutaura nevanhu vakuru, uye nyaya yacho inonyanya kutaura nevanhu vakuru, uye nyaya yacho inonyanya kutaura nevanhu vakuru, uye nyaya yacho inonyanya kutaura nevanhu vakuru, uye nyaya yacho inonyanya kutaura nevanhu vakuru.</s>

en: The narrative hasnt changed because of that, but if local and international women journalists get a real chance to tell the story of the Middle East, that narrative could change, which would affect the way others see this region, Abbas said.
sna: Rungano urwu harwusati rwashanduka bodo nekuda kwaizvozvo, asi kana madzimayi anotapa nhau vari zvizvarwa zvemo nevekunedzimwe nyika vakawana muka chaiwo wekuti vataure nyayayezviri kuitika muMiddle East, rungano urwu rwunoshanduka rwozoshandurawo maonerwo anoitwa dunhu rino nevamwe vanhu, Abbas akadaro.
mt0: <pad> The narrative hasn't changed because of that, but if local and international women journalists get a real chance to tell the story of the Middle East, that narrative could change, which would affect the way others see this region, Abbas said.</s>

en: Sancha also believes women in journalism have an impact on the way issues are viewed in the region, including post-traumatic stress disorder and the effect it has on female health, and subjects such as violence and alcohol.
sna: Sancha anofungawo kuti madzimayi ari mune zvekutapwa kwenhau vane mutsindo pamusoro pekuti zvinhu zvinoonekwa sei mudunhu iri, zvinosanganisira kuvhiringikana kupfungwa nezvinzwo zvinobata munhu mushure mekunge apfuura nenguva yekurwadziswa nekutyiswa kukuru uye zvazvinoita muhutano hwemunhukadzi, zvichibatawo nyaya dzakaita sekumbunyikidzwa nedoro.
mt0: <pad> Sancha anotenda kuti vakadzi munhau dzakawanda vane simba rekuona zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana munyika, kusanganisira post-traumatic stress disorder uye zvinoitika kwayo pamusoro pehutano hwevakadzi, uye nyaya dzakadai sekushungurudzwa uye mhangura.</s>

en: We talk about all these issues that men normally wouldnt not speak about, she said.
sna: Akati, "Tinotaura pamusoro penyaya dzese idzo vanhurume vasingawanzotaura nezvadzo.
mt0: <pad> We talk about all these issues that men normally wouldnt talk about, she said.</s>

en: Iran's Guards Commander Says Israel Creating Conditions for Own Destruction
sna: Mukuru Wemauto Emu Iran Anoti Israel Iri Kuzvicherera Guva Rayo
mt0: <pad> Iran's Guards Commander Says Israel Creating Conditions for Own Destruction</s>

en: Israel's actions are creating conditions for its own destruction, Irans Revolutionary Guards commander on Friday told a Jerusalem Day rally at which the countrys new domestically-made Kheibar Buster missile was displayed.
sna: Zvirikuitwa neIsrael zviri kusika mamiriro ezvinhu ekuti ichazviparadza, izvi zvakataurwa nemukuru wemasoja emuIran eRevolutionary Guards nemusi weChishanu  pagungano rinonzi Jerusalem Rally apo bhomba rinopfurwa sebara rakagadzirwa munyika umu rinonzi Kheibar Buster rakaratidzwa kune veruzhinji.
mt0: <pad> Israel's actions are creating conditions for its own destruction, Irans Revolutionary Guards commander on Friday told a Jerusalem Day rally at which the countrys new domestically-made Kheibar Buster missile was displayed.</s>

en: State television said millions of Iranians joined rallies marking Quds Day, the Arabic name for Jerusalem, in state-organized marches across the country.
sna: Nhepfenyuro yezvivhitivhiti yehurumende yakati mamiriyoni evanhu vemuIran vakaenda kumisangano ekurangarira zuva reQuds, zita rechiArabic rinoreva kuti Jerusalem, mukufora kwakange kuchiitwa munyika yese.
mt0: <pad> Mazana eIranians vakapinda maratidziro aChiedza cheQuds, chiArabic chinonzi Jerusalem, mumabasa akaitwa nehurumende enyika yese.</s>

en: It showed the Israeli flag being set on fire and groups of people around the country shouting choreographed "Death to America, Death to Israel" slogans.
sna: Nhepfenyuro iyi yakaratidza mureza weIsrael uchipiswa uye nemapoka evanhu munyika yese vachideedzera pamwechete mashoko ezvematongerwo nenzira yairatidza kuti vakaudzwa zvekuita vachiti, "Rufu kuAmerica, Rufu kuIsrael".
mt0: <pad> It showed the Israeli flag being set on fire and groups of people around the country shouting choreographed "Death to America, Death to Israel" slogans.</s>

en: Supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said in a televised speech that anti-Israeli protests and attacks showed that Palestinians rejected compromises by Arab authorities with Israel.
sna: Mutungamiriri Mukurukuru weIran Ayatollah Ali Khamenei mumashoko avo akaburitswa pazvivhitivhiti vakati kuratidzira pamusoro pekuvenga Israel nekuituka kwairatidza kuti vanhu vekuPalestine vakaramba kuwirirana kwezinyekenyeke nekudya kwese kwakaitwa nevakuru venyika dzechiArab nenyika yeIsrael.
mt0: <pad> Ayatollah Ali Khamenei a Supreme leader in a televised speech said that anti-Israeli protests and attacks showed that Palestinians rejected compromises by Arab authorities with Israel.</s>

en: Opposition to Israel is a touchstone of belief for Iran, which backs Palestinian and Lebanese Islamist militant groups opposed to peace with Israel, which Tehran does not recognize.
sna: Kukwikwidza Israel ndihwo hwaro hwezvinotendwa neIran, iyo inotsigira mapoka echipanduki nehugandanga emuPalestine neLebanon ayo anoramba zvachose kuti pave nerugare nekudyidzana nenyika yeIsrael, iyo isingagamuchirwe zvachose neIran kuti kune nyika inonzi Israel.
mt0: <pad> Kupanduka Israel ndiko kutenda kweIran, iyo inotsigira mapoka eIslamist militant ePalestine neLebanon ari kuramba rugare neIsrael, izvo Tehran haizivikanwe.</s>

en: What has happened in Palestine in recent years annuls all plans for compromise with the Zionist enemy (Israel) because no plan for Palestine can be implemented in the absence or contrary to the opinions of its owners, the Palestinians, Khamenei said, speaking in Arabic and addressing Palestinians and other Arabs.
sna: Vachitaura nechi Arabic kuvanhu vekuPalestine nevamwe vagari vemunyika dzechiAraba vaKhamenei vakati, "Zvakaitika muPalestine mumakore achangopfuura zvinodzima nekushaisa basa hurongwa hwese hwebvuma nekakuzeza kudyidzana nemuvengi wechiZion kana kuti Israel nekuti hapana hurongwa pamusoro pePalestine hwunogona kuitwa pasina kana kuti paine zvinokwikwidza maonero nezvido zvevaridzi venyika iyi.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvaitika muPalestine mumakore achangopfuura zvinobvisa zvese zvipikirwa zvekuita nzvimbo yeIsrael, nokuti hapana chirongwa chePalestine chinokwanisika kuitwa pasina kana kunze kwevagari vawo, vanhu vePalestine, Khamenei akataura.</s>

en: Thus, Khamenei said, all previous peace agreements -- such as the 1993 Oslo Accords, the two-state solution to resolve the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, and former U.S. President Donald Trump's plan dubbed the Deal of the Century "are null and void".
sna: Khamenei vakati naizvozvo kuwirirana kwese kwekuti pave nerugare semhiko dzakaitwa kuOslo muna 1993, mhinduro inobva pakugamuchira kuti pane nyika mbiri kuti zviunze he two-state solution to kuti zvipedze hondo iri pakati peIsrael nePalestine, uye hurongwa hwakaitwa neaimbove mutungamiriri weAmerica va Donald Trump hwakange kwapihwa zita rekuti Kuwirirana Kukuru Kwemakore Zana Achangodarika "hauna basa zvachose".
mt0: <pad> Khamenei akapa zano rekuti mahoro ose akaitwa kare, sezvinotsanangurwa neOslo Accords ye1993, nzira yekugadzirisa Israel-Palestine conflict, uye Donald Trump's Deal of the Century "havasi chinhu uye havarwi."</s>

en: President Ebrahim Raisi, Irans military commanders and senior officials also attended the rallies in which people were allowed to march through the streets, the first time since the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic two years ago.
sna: Mutungamiri weIran, vaEbrahim Raisi, vakuru vemauto emuIran nevakuru murumende vakange vari pamagungano aya uko vanhu vakatenderwa kufora mumigwagwa, zvichiitika kekutanga kubva pakapararira denda redzihwamupengo recoronavirus makore maviri apfuura.
mt0: <pad> President Ebrahim Raisi, Iran's military commanders and senior officials also attended the rallies in which people were allowed to march through the streets, the first time since the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic two years ago.</s>

en: Iran's Jerusalem Day rallies are held annually in support of Palestinians, who want East Jerusalem as the capital of a future state in territories captured by Israel in a 1967 war, on the last Friday of the Muslim fasting month of Ramadan.
sna: Magungano eZuva reJerusalem anoitwa gore rega rega mukuratidza rutsigiro kuvanhu vemuePalestine, avo vanoda kuti chikamu chakadziva kumabvazuva e Jerusalem kana kuti East Jerusalem chive chinonzi ndicho chinemahofisi ehurumende nekuva gutu guru munzvimbo dzakapambwa neIsrael kubva muhondo yegore ra1967 war, paChishanu chekupedzesera mumwedzi wekutsanya wemaMuslim weRamadan.
mt0: <pad> Iran's Jerusalem Day rallies are held annually in support of Palestinians, who want East Jerusalem as the capital of a future state in territories captured by Israel in a 1967 war, on the last Friday of the Muslim fasting month of Ramadan, on the last Friday of the Muslim fasting month of Ramadan.</s>

en: Stop your vicious deeds. You know well that we are people of action and reaction, Revolutionary Guards commander Hossein Salami, addressing Israel, told demonstrators in Tehran.
sna: Achitaura kune vakange vauya kuzoratidzira muTehran mukuru wemauto eRevolutionary Guards commander Hossein Salami, akaudza Israel kuti,  "Regai mabasa enyu ehutsinye nechinya. Munonyatsoziva kuti tiri vanhu vane zvavanogona kuita tiri tega uye zvatinogona kuita kuti ppanenge paitwa zvatisingade".
mt0: <pad> Stop your vicious deeds. You know well that we are people of action and reaction, Revolutionary Guards commander Hossein Salami, addressing Israel, told demonstrators in Tehran.</s>

en: Our responses are painful.
sna: Kutsiva kwedu kunorwadza.
mt0: <pad> Our responses are painful.</s>

en: You create conditions for your own destruction.
sna: Muri kuzvicherera guva renyu.
mt0: <pad> Unoita zvinhu zvinokonzera urombo wako.</s>

en: We will not leave you alone .
sna: Hatizokusiyeyi muchiita zvamunoda.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe usamboziva kuti hatizokusiyai.</s>

en: You know better than me what will befall you if you take evil action.
sna: Munoziva kutondidarika kuti chii chichakuwirayi kana mukaenderera mberi nehurongwa hwenyu hwakashata.
mt0: <pad> Uye iwe unonyatsoziva kuti chii chinofanira kukuitika kana ukaita mabasa akaipa.</s>

en: Iran's military has vowed to retaliate harshly against any attack by Israel, which has often voiced concern over the Iranian nuclear program.
sna: Mauto emuIran akapika kuti aizotsiva zvine hukasha huzhinji kurwiswa kwese kungaitwe nenIsrael, iyo inosigunun'una pamusoro pehurongwa hwe Iran hwekugadzira simba rinobva panuclear.
mt0: <pad> Iran's military has vowed to retaliate harshly against any attack by Israel, which has often voiced concern over the Iranian nuclear program.</s>

en: Tehran says the program is for peaceful purposes only.
sna: Iran inotiwo hwurongwa uhwu nndehwe mabasa erugare, hauzati hwuri hwehondo.
mt0: <pad> Tehran inoti chirongwa ichi ndechekuchengetedza chete.</s>

en: Israel, whose existence the Islamic Republic does not recognize, has long threatened military action against Iran if talks between Tehran and world powers fail to curb Iranian nuclear activity.
sna: Israel, iyo inonzi nenyika yechi Islam iyi kuti haiko zvachose, inosigara ichivimbisa kurwisa nesimba rechiuto nyika yeIran kana nhaurirano pakati peIran nenyika dzinesimba dzepasi rose dzikakonewa kumisa zvirikuitwa neIran zvekugadzira mabhombu erudzi rwenuclear.
mt0: <pad> Israel, uyo Islamic Republic haizivikane, yave nguva refu yakataura kuti ichaita chiito chehondo pamusoro peIran kana mazungumzo ari kuitwa neTehran uye masimba epasi rese akakundikana kudzivirira Iran's nuclear activities.</s>

en: Iran says its nuclear ambitions are peaceful.
sna: Iran inoti zvainoda kuita nenuclear ndezverugare nerunyararo.
mt0: <pad> Iran inoti aida kuita nuclear ndeyekuchengetedza.</s>

en: In February, the Islamic Republic unveiled its "Kheibar Buster" missile with a range of 1,450 km (900 miles).
sna: Muna Kukadzi, nyika iyi yechiIslami yakaratidza kune nyika dzose bhambhu raro rinopfurwa sebara rinonzi "Kheibar Buster" iro rinogona kufamba mumhepo makiromita chiuru nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu, kana kuti mamaira mazana mapfumbamwe.
mt0: <pad> In February, the Islamic Republic unveiled its "Kheibar Buster" missile with a range of 1,450 km (900 miles).</s>

en: Iran, which has one of the biggest missile programs in the Middle East, says its ballistic missiles have a range of up to 2,000 km (1,200 miles) and are capable of reaching its arch-foe Israel and U.S. bases in the region.
sna: Iran, iyo ine humwe hwehurongwa hwakakura dzimwe dzose hwenuclear mudunhu remuMiddle East, inoti mabhambu ayo anofamba muchadenga anogona kufamba makiromita zviuri zviviri kana kuti mamaira chiuru nemazana maviri, uye anogona kusvika kumakamba kune kunezvombo zvemuvengi wayo mukuru, Israel uyewo neeAmerica mudunhu rese iri.
mt0: <pad> Iran, iri neimwe yezvigadzirwa zvekushandisa mabhomba muMiddle East, inoti mabhomba ayo ane kureba kwekusvika ku2,000 km (1,200 miles) uye anogona kusvika nzvimbo dzakawanda dzeIsrael uye U.S. mumaguta ari munyika.</s>

en: Kheibar refers to an ancient Jewish oasis in the Arabian Peninsula's Hijaz region that was overrun by Muslim warriors in the 7th century.
sna: Kheibar anotaura pamusoro penzvimbo inehunyoro nezvitubu zvemvura mugwenga zvaive zvevaJudah vemakare kare aive munyika yevaArab mudunhu reHijaz iyo yakasvikirwa zvechisimba ikabvutwa nevarwi vechiMuslim mumakore ekuma600 AD.
mt0: <pad> Kheibar inotaura pamusoro peimwe nzvimbo yechiJudha yakareba muArabia Peninsula's Hijaz region izvo zvakavambwa nehondo yeMuslem mumakore e7th century.</s>

en: Tehran regards its ballistic missile program as an important deterrent against the United States, Israel and other adversaries, and has rejected Western demands to halt it.
sna: Iran inoona hwurongwa hwayo hwekugadzira mabhambhu anopfurwa semabara aya, senzira yakakosha yekumisa nekudzivisa zvingadakuitwa neUnited States, Israel nevamwe vavengi, uye inoramba kurayira kwenyika dzekumavirira kuri Iran imise hurongwa hwayo.
mt0: <pad> Tehran inoona chirongwa chayo chekushandisa mabhomba epasi rese sechinhu chinokosha panyaya yekurwisana neUnited States, Israel nedzimwewo vavengi, uye yakaramba zvinodiwa zvekumadokero kuti ichimira.</s>

en: Over the past year, Iran and the United States have engaged in fitful, indirect talks in Vienna to revive a 2015 nuclear deal that then-President Donald Trump reneged on in 2018 and that Iran, in turn, began violating in 2019.
sna: Mugore richangopfuura, Iran neUnited States dzakapinda munhaurirano kuViennadziine vanyai pakati dzaimbomiswa nekuramwa kuedza kumutsiridza kuwirirana pamusoro pezvenuclear kwegore ra2015 uko akange ari mutungamiriri we America panguva iyoyo vaDonald Trump aakazorega kuremekedza muna2018, uko Iran yakazotangawo kutyora muna2019.
mt0: <pad> Mwaka wapera, Iran neUnited States vakapinda mumibvunzo inodhura, isina kunyatsozivikanwa muVienna kuti vagadzirise nzvimbo yeNuke yemu2015 iri kuregererwa naTrump muna2018 uye izvo Iranian yakabva yatanga kutyora muna2019.</s>

en: Under the 2015 deal, Iran agreed to limit its nuclear program in return for relief from economic sanctions.
sna: Pasi pechibvumirano ichi chgore ra2015l, Iran yakabvuma kuderedza hwurongwa hwayo hwekugadzira nuclear, ichinzi inoderedzerwawo zvitarafu nezvirango pane zvekutenga nekutengeserana neAmerica.
mt0: <pad> Under the 2015 deal, Iran agreed to limit its nuclear program in exchange for relief from economic sanctions.</s>

en: While they appeared close to resurrecting the deal in March, talks stalled over last-minute Russian demands and whether Washington might drop Iran's Revolutionary Guards from its Foreign Terrorist Organization list.
sna: Zvavakuita sekuti vava pedyo nekumutsiridza chibvumirano ichi muna Kurume, nhaurirano dzabva dzamiswa nekuda kwezvakazongotemwa neRussia kuti zvinofanirwa kuitwa uye kuti America yaizobvisa here mauto eIran anonzi Revolutionary Guards kuti vaiswe pakati pemasangano ekune dzimwe nyika anoita mabasa echigandanga.
mt0: <pad> Kana kuti usamboziva</s>

en: As Fewer Americans Attend Church, Can Coffee Shops Fill the Void?
sna: Sezvo Vanhu VekuAmerica Vashoma Voenda Kukereke, Zvitoro Zvinotengesa Kofi Zvingazadze Mukaha Uyu Here?
mt0: <pad> As More Americans Go to Church, Can Coffee Shops Fill the Void?</s>

en: Churches and other houses of worship have historically played critical social and political functions in American society.
sna: Makereke nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekunamatira dzakagara dziine basa guru munezvekugarisana kwevanhu nezvematongorwo muhugaro hwekuAmerica. Asi vanhu vashomanana vava kuenda kushumiro, uye kuderera uku mudzikereke nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekunamatira dzavakusiya mukaha waiogona kungozadziswa koga nezvitoro zvinotengesa svutugadzike yerudzi rwekofi.
mt0: <pad> Mwari anoda kuti vanhu vawane makereke uye mamwe maguta ekunamata aite basa rakakosha mumagariro uye matongerwo enyika yeAmerica.</s>

en: But fewer people are attending religious services, and the decline of churches and other houses of worship threatens to leave a void that could potentially be filled by coffee shops.
sna: Asi vanhu vashomanana vava kuenda kushumiro, uye kuderera uku mudzikereke nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekunamatira dzavakusiya mukaha waiogona kungozadziswa koga nezvitoro zvinotengesa svutugadzike yerudzi rwekofi.

en: For so much of American history, the church has really been or their congregations have really been essential, providing an unheralded role in providing cohesion and connectedness in communities encouraging civic engagement and political participation, says Daniel Cox, director of the Survey Center on American Life and a senior fellow at the American Enterprise Institute.
sna: Munhorondo zhinji yeAmerica, kereke kana kuti zvaunga zvemakereke, zvakange zvakakosha zviita basa risina vamwe vakamboriita rekuunza kubatana nemidzi yehukama munzvimbo dzigere vanhu, kukurudzira kuti vagari vemunzvimbo vapinzwa muhurongwa hwunobata hupenyu hwavo uye nekuridzira vagri kuti kuti vave nechekuita mune zvematongerwo, anodaro Daniel Cox, mukuru we Survey Center on American Life nemunzveri mukuru weAmerican Enterprise Institute.
mt0: <pad> Kune mbiri yakawanda yeAmerica, chitendero kana kuti makereke avo vakakosha, vachiita basa risina kuzivikanwa rekuendesa vanhu pamwechete uye kusimudzira hurumende.</s>

en: It was not happenstance or luck that the civil rights movement emerged out of the church, Cox says.
sna: Zvakange zvisiri zvemasanga kana zverombo rakanaka kuti boka rairwira kodzero dzevagari vemuAmerica rakasimuka richibva mukereke, anodaroCox.
mt0: <pad> It was not by chance or luck that the civil rights movement emerged out of the church, Cox says.</s>

en: And you see that cross-culturally whether it's in predominantly white rural communities, in the suburbs, wherever, churches have historically been really, really important.
sna: Uye unozoona kuti zvakatariswa mutsika nemagariro evanhu vakasiyana siyana, zvisineyi kuti hugaro hwevachena chete vari kumaruma here, mumisha yevapfumi mumadhorobha, kupi nekupi zvako, makereke munhorondo yevanhu, agara achikosha zvikurusa.
mt0: <pad> And you see that cross-culturally whether it's in predominantly white rural communities, in the suburbs, wherever, churches have historically been really, really important.</s>

en: Churches and other houses of worship have also played a role in helping immigrants assimilate once they arrive in America, Cox says.
sna: Cox anoti, 'Makereke nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekunamatira akaita basa kubatsira vanhu vanenge vatama vachibva kune dzimwe nyika kuti vakwane mutsika nemagariro matsva avanenge vapinda maari pavanosvika muAmerica."
mt0: <pad> Mwari anoda kuti vanhu vakuru vanoenda kukereke uye kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana dzekunamata vawedzere kutenda mune izvi, Cox says.</s>

en: In 1999, 70% of Americans said they belonged to a church, mosque or synagogue.
sna: Muna 1999, vanhu zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana vemuAmerica vakati inhengo yekerek, mosque kana synagogue.
mt0: <pad> In 1999, 70% yeAmericans vakataura kuti vanopinda chitendero chechitendero, mosque kana synagogue.</s>

en: By 2020, that number had dropped to 47%. A 2019 survey found that only about three in 10 Americans say they attend weekly religious services.
sna: Pakazosvika 2020, huwandu uhwu hwakange hwaderera kusvika pavanhu zvikamu makumi mana nevanomwe kubva muzana. Imwe tsvakurudzo muna 2019 yakaona kuti vanhu vemuAmerica vatatu kubva mugumi ndivo voga vayienda kushumiro yechinamato yesvondo nesvondo.
mt0: <pad> In 2020, izvozvo zvainge zvisati zvaitika. A 2019 survey found that only about three in 10 Americans say they attend weekly religious services.</s>

en: Third places  Lack of involvement and affiliation with churches, mosques and synagogues means people might be missing out on what urban sociologist Ray Oldenburg dubbed as "third places" public gathering spots that offer something that home, the "first place," and work, the "second place," might not.
sna: Nzvimbo Dzechitatu Kusabatana kana kuva nenhengo yemakereke, ma mosques nema synagogue zvinoreva kuti vanhu vanenge vachirasikirwa neizvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi inoongorora magariro netsika dzemumadhorobha,Ray Oldenburg, akadaidza kuti "nzvimbo dzechitatu" nzvimbo dziendwa neveruzhinji dzinopa munhu chimwe chinhu chekuti chaasingapihwe kumba inova "nzvimbo yekutanga" nekubasa inova "nzvimbo yechipiri".
mt0: <pad> Mhuri dzechina</s>

en: Oldenburg argued that third places are critical to a communitys social vitality.
sna: Oldenburg anoti nzvimbo dzechitatu idzi dzakakosha pakuunza hutano kumagariro anoita vanhu munzvimbo yavanenge vagere.
mt0: <pad> Oldenburg argued that third places are crucial to a community's social vitality.</s>

en: An October 2021 survey conducted by the American Survey Center found that commercial spaces like coffee houses foster trust and connection in American communities and could help fill the void left by churches.
sna: Tsvakurudzo yakaitwa muna 2021 nesangano rezvetsvakurudzo muAmerica re American Survey Center rakaona kuti  nzvimbo dzinoitwa zvekutengesera vanhu dzakaita sezvitoro zvinotengesa svutugadzike dzinovaka kuvimbikana nekubatana munzvimbo dzinogara vanhu vemuAmerica, uye dzaigona kuzadza mukaha wakasiiwa nemakereke.
mt0: <pad> An October 2021 survey conducted by the American Survey Center found that commercial spaces like coffee houses foster trust and connection in American communities and could help fill the void left by churches.</s>

en: If you're a regular at a cafe, the barista may know what you usually order, and they can make it for you, and that feels good, says clinical psychologist Dr. Maria Espinola, an assistant professor in the Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Neuroscience at the University of Cincinnati College of Medicine.
sna: Kana uri munhu anosienda panzvimbo inotengeswa svutugadzike, mubuki wesvutugadzike anogona kunge ava kutoziva kuti unotenga rudzi ipi yacho, uye izvi zvinoita kuti munhu anzwe zvakanaka, anodaro anoona chiremba nezvehutano hwemanzwiro nekufunga kwevanhu, Dr. Maria Espinola, uyo ari muzvinafundo mubazi rinodzidzisa zvehutano hwepfungwa nehunhu nemaitiro evanhu reDepartment of Psychiatry and Behavioral Neuroscience paUniversity of Cincinnati College of Medicine.
mt0: <pad> Kana uri mutengesi wekafete, barista anogona kuziva zvaunotenga, uye vanokwanisa kugadzirira iwe, uye izvi zvinonzwirwa zvakanaka, anotaura Dr. Maria Espinola, nyanzvi yepfungwa dzemunhu uye nyanzvi yekuongorora nyaya dzekunamata.</s>

en: It feels good to be recognized, to know that people are expecting you, to know that people care about you, to know that you belong, because the need for belonging and human connection is a fundamental need that we all have, and it's important to have that fulfilled in different ways, Espinola says.
sna: Espinola anoti, "Zvinoita kuti munhu anzwe zvakanaka maari kana vanhu vakamuziva kuti ndiani, kuziva kuti vanhu vakakutarisira kuti usvike,  kuziva kuti vanhu vane hanya newe, kuziva kuti unkowo kwaunoti ndekwangu, nekuti chishuvo chekuva nekunonzi nemunhu ndiko kwake kune nekwake vaanoyanana nekudyidzana navo chinhu chakakosha chinodiwa nesu tese zvaedu, uye zvakakosha kuti chazadzikiswa nenzira dzakasiya."
mt0: <pad> It feels good to be recognized, to know that people are expecting you, to know that people care about you, to know that you belong, because the need for belonging and human connection is a fundamental need that we all have, and it's important to have that fulfilled in different ways, Espinola says.</s>

en: So, places like third places can allow us to do that.
sna: Saka nzvimbo dzakaita dzechitatu dzinotipa mukana wekuita izvi.
mt0: <pad> Saka, nzvimbo sezvitatu zvinogona kutibvumirai kuti tiite izvi.</s>

en: In the past, churches and other houses of worship have been a third place for many Americans.
sna: Munguva dzakadarika, makereke nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekunamatira, dzakange dziri idzo nzvombo dzechitatu kevanhu vazhinji vekuAmerica.
mt0: <pad> In the past, churches and other houses of worship have been a third place for many Americans.</s>

en: In 2019, 67% of people surveyed said they have a third place a coffee shop, bar, restaurant, park or other place in their community that they visit regularly.
sna: Muna 2019, zvikamu zvevanhu makuma matanhatu nevanomwe kubva muzana yevanhu vakataurwa navo mutsvakurudzo vakati vane nzvimbo yechitatu ” iri chitoro chinotengeswa svutugadzike bhawa, nzvimbo inotengeswa chikafu chakabikwa, nzvimbo yeekutandararira ine maruva miti nesora rakachekererwa kana imwewo nzvimbo iri munzvimbo dzavagere dzavanogona kushanyira nguva nenguva..
mt0: <pad> In 2019, 67% of people surveyed said they have a third place a coffee shop, bar, restaurant, park or other place in their community that they visit regularly.</s>

en: That number dropped to 56% in 2021 a number that could have been affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.
sna: Hwuwandu uhwu hwakadonha kusvika pavanhu zvikamu makumi mashanu nevatanhu kubva muzana izvo zvaigona kunge zvakonzereswa nedenda redzihwamupengo reCOVID-19.
mt0: <pad> Zvikamu izvi zvakaderera kusvikira 56% muna 2021, chikamu chinogona kunge chakanga chakatsikwa neCOVID-19 pandemic.</s>

en: What we found was that people who had a third place were much more connected to their community, says Cox.
sna: Cox anoti, ' Zvatakaona ndezvekuti vanhu vane nzvimbo yechitatu vakange vaine hukama nekudyidyana munzvimbo dzavanogara. Vane mukana mukuru wekuti vane zvimwewo zvinhu zvavanogona kuita nevamwe munzvimbo idzodzo."
mt0: <pad> Zvino, zvatakaona ndechekuti vanhu vane chikamu chechitatu vakabatana zvakanyanya nemhuri yavo, anodaro Cox.</s>

en: "They're much more likely to engage in other activities there.
sna: Vane mukana mukuru wekuti vane zvimwewo zvinhu zvavanogona kuita nevamwe munzvimbo idzodzo."
mt0: <pad> "Vanonyanya kuita zvinhu zvimwechete ikoko.</s>

en: They are much more trusting of their neighbors.
sna: Vanonyanya kuvimba nevavakidzani vavo.
mt0: <pad> Vanotenda vavengi vavo zvakanyanya.</s>

en: There's a whole great array of positive social outcomes that were connected to having a third place and for a lot of Americans, it's a coffee shop or a cafe."
sna: Pane zvakanaka zvakawanda zvekugarisana nevamwe kunobuda zvakabuda mukuva nenzvimbo yechitatu, uye kuvanhu vazhinji vekuAmerica, inzvimbo inotengeswa svutigadzike yekofi kana yetii"
mt0: <pad> Kune a whole great array of positive social outcomes that were connected to having a third place and for a lot of Americans, it's a coffee shop or a cafe.</s>

en: What coffee shops have in their favor is that they can be found almost everywhere, all over the country, and anyone who wants to can stop by regularly.
sna: Chakanakira nzvimbo dzesvutugadzike idzi ndechekuti dzinowakwa kwese kwese munyika yese, uye wese anenge achiida anogona kupfuura nepo paanenge adira nguva nengua.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvinhu zvinobatsira macoffee shop ndechekuti anogona kuwanikwa almost everywhere, all over the country, uye munhu wose anoda kunoshanyira kazhinji.</s>

en: And many are open most days of the week.
sna: Nzvimbo zhinji idzi dzinenge dzakavhura mazuva mazhinji esvondo rese.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvizhinji zvinovhurwa mazuva ose ekupedzisira kwevhiki.</s>

en: Cox says even brief coffee shop encounters can increase a sense of belonging.
sna: Cox anoti kunyangwe kusangana kwechinguva chidoko nevamwe muuzvitoro zvesvutugadzike izvi kunowedzera pakuti munhu anzwe kuti ndine vekwangu nenzvimbo yandinogamuchirika.
mt0: <pad> Cox says even short encounters in coffee shops can increase a sense of belonging.</s>

en: I think there's a lot of potential here, and a lot of it is unrealized potential, Cox says.
sna: Cox anoti, '' Ndinofunga kuti pane mukana wekuita zvakawanda, mukana wekuita zvakawanda usiri kuonekwa nekushandiswa."
mt0: <pad> I think there's a lot of potential here, and a lot of it is unrealized potential, Cox says.</s>

en: But in terms of what they could do, there's a lot there.
sna: Asi panyaya yekuti chii chinogona kuitwa, pane zvakawanda zvinogona kuitwa ipapo.
mt0: <pad> Asi panyaya dzeivanokwanisa kuita, pane zvakawanda zviripo.</s>

en: I've been in places where the same group of folks come in there to play chess.
sna: Ndinosipinda munzvimbo dzekuti chikwata chimwe chetecho chevanhu chinouya kuzotamba tsoro dze chess.
mt0: <pad> I've been in places where the same group of people come in there to play chess.</s>

en: Or they have their informal bunch of retirees.
sna: Kana kuti vane boka vega revanhu vakasiya mabasa nekukura.
mt0: <pad> Kana kuti ivo vane vamwe vakuru vevanhu vakashanya.</s>

en: They just got together, and they talked and chatted and caught up with each other.
sna: Vakangosangana ndokutanga kuraura nekukurukura, vanike votowirirana.
mt0: <pad> Vanobva vasangana, uye vakataura uye vachitsanangura uye vakatevera nhau.</s>

en: I don't know where else they would have gone maybe a church, but maybe not to share information, to encourage each other to maybe get involved in an activity.
sna: Handizive imwe nzvimbo yavaigona kuenda, zvichida kukereke, asi vasingagoverane ruzivo nezviri kuitika, kukurudzirana, pamwe kuri kuti vane zvanoita vari pamwe chete.
mt0: <pad> I don't know where else they would have gone, maybe a church, but maybe not to share information, to encourage each other to maybe get involved in an activity.</s>

en: And I think that is what is so powerful about coffee shops.
sna: Uye ndinofunga kuti izvi ndizvo zvinoita kuti nzvimbo dzesvutugadzike idzi dzive nemutsindo wakadai.
mt0: <pad> Ndinofunga ndicho chikonzero chekuti macoffee shop anonyanya kushandiswa.</s>

en: What US Mayors Are Most Worried About After the Pandemic
sna: Chiri  kushungurudza vakuru vemaguta ekuAmerica mushure medenda
mt0: <pad> What US Mayors Are Most Worried About After the Pandemic</s>

en: Americas mayors are most concerned about the lingering mental health effects of the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a nationwide survey of 126 mayors conducted during the summer of 2021.
sna: Vakuru vemaguta emuAmerica varikunetsekana zvikuru nemusarirwa hwezvinetswa zvehutano hwepfungwa mushure medenda redzihwamupengo reCOVID-19, ndizvo zvakabuda mutsvakurudzo yenyika yose yakaitwa nevakuru vemaguta zana nemakumi maviri nematanhatu muzhizha ra2021.
mt0: <pad> Americas mayors are most concerned about the lingering mental health effects of the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a nationwide survey of 126 mayors conducted during the summer of 2021.</s>

en: The respondents headed cities with at least 75,000 residents.
sna: Vakapinda mutsvakurudzo idzi vaitungamirira maguta ane vanhu vasiri pasi pezviuru makumi masere nevashanu.
mt0: <pad> Vanhu vakabvunzwa vaigara mumaguta ane vanhu vanodarika 75,000.</s>

en: The local leaders are still focused on traditional issues such as violent crime, the economy and infrastructure, but they are most concerned about the pandemics long-term impact on the mental health of their constituents.
sna: Vakuru venzvimbo ava vachiri vakanangisa panyaya dzaisida kugadziriswa dzakaita sekuparwa kwemhosva nechisimba zvinosiya dzakuvadza vanhu, zvehupfumi nezvivakwa zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji, asiwo vachiri kushushikana zvikuru nezvakasiiwa zvaitwa nedenda iri zvicharamba zvichinetsa vanhu kwenguva refu ichateverazvikuru seyi pane zvehutano hwepfungwa dzevanhu vanogara mumaguta avanotungamirira.
mt0: <pad> Vanotungamira nzvimbo vanoramba vachifunga nezvenyaya dzakajairika dzakadai sekuuraya vanhu, mari, uye zvinhu zvekuvaka, asi ivo vanonyanya kunetseka pamusoro pezviito zveCOVID-19 zviri kuramba zvichiitika pamusoro pehutano hwemweya hwevagari vavo.</s>

en: Mental health was top of mind for Michael Udine when he was sworn in as mayor of Broward County, Florida, in November 2021.
sna: Hutano hwepfungwa ndicho chinhu chaive pamusoro pezvinhu zvese mupfungwa dzaMichael Udine apo akagadzwa kuva mutungamiriri weBroward County, iri muFlorida, muna Mbudzi wa2021.
mt0: <pad> Mwari anofanira kuita kuti vanhu vawedzere kunzwa zvakanaka, uye vanhu vanofanira kunzwa zvakanaka.</s>

en: Everything that was a potential issue pre-pandemic has pretty much been exacerbated by the pandemic, he says.
sna: Zvese zvaigoina kuva zvinhu zvainetsa ndednda risati rauya, zvakabva zvatowedzerwa nekuuya kwakaita denda, anodaro.
mt0: <pad> Everything that was a potential issue pre-pandemic has pretty much been exacerbated by the pandemic, he says.</s>

en: "There were issues going into the pandemic, and it was becoming more and more important on everyone's radar screen about the mental health of people of all ages.
sna: "Tisati tapinda mudenda paive nezvinhu zvakawanda, uye zvakange zvavakukosha mumeso emunhu wese panyaya yehutano hwepfungwa dzevanhu vemazera ose zvawo.
mt0: <pad> "Paiva nemisoro iri kuenda ku pandemic, uye yava kuva yakanyanya kukosha pamusoro pehutano hwepfungwa hwevanhu vese vakuru.</s>

en: And I think the pandemic pretty much supercharged those issues."
sna: Uye ndinofunga kuti denda rakabva rawedzera moto panyaya idzodzi dzoseu."
mt0: <pad> And I think the pandemic pretty much supercharged those issues.</s>

en: It is not unusual for large outbreaks of disease to have a negative impact on mental health, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, which reports that rates of anxiety and depressive disorders among adults increased during the pandemic.
sna: Sangano rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere nekupararira kwazvo re Center for Disease Control and Prevention rinoti hachisi chinhu chiinoshamisa kuti kuputika kukuru kwematenda kuve nezvinetswa zvakunosiya muhutano hwepfungwa dzevanhu. Sangano iri rinotiwo kuwedzera kwekushushikana nezvirwere zvinokonzerswa nekusagadzikana kwepfungwa pakati pevanhu vakuru kwakawedzera munguva yedenda iri.
mt0: <pad> Zvinonzi hazvina kunyanya kuti chirwere chikuru chinokonzera njodzi yehutano hwepfungwa, maererano neCenters for Disease Control and Prevention, izvo zvinotaura kuti huwandu hwekunyadzisa uye kushungurudzika pakati pevakuru vakawedzera panguva yepandemic.</s>

en: The pandemic has also adversely influenced the emotional and mental health of about one-third of Americas youth.
sna: Dwenda iri rakakanganisawo hutano hwepfungwa nemanzwiro endangariro echikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu zvevechidiki vekuAmerica.
mt0: <pad> Pandemic inonyanya kuita kuti vanhu vakuru uye vana vadiki veAmerica vawedzere kunetseka uye kushungurudzika.</s>

en: What we've seen is just such anxiety, kids who wouldn't ordinarily have a meltdown, because it's so much change and difficulty adjusting to transitions, Maryland psychologist Mary Karapetian Alvord told VOA last month.
sna: Chiremba anoona nezvepfungwa mudunhu reMaryland, Mary Karapetian Alvord, akaudza VOA mwedzi wakapera kuti, "Zvatichangobva mukuona kunongova kushushikana kwepfungwa uku kwekuti hakwaigona kubva kwashungurudza pfungwa dzevechidiki meltdown, nekuti pakave neshandu zhinji uye kuomerwa nekujairirana nekuyambukira munzira itsva dzekurarama nadzo.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvatakaona i anxiety, vana vakasafanira kuita meltdown, nekuti kuchinjwa kwacho uye kunetseka kwekugadzirira kuchinja, akadaro Mary Karapetian Alvord, nyanzvi yepfungwa muMaryland.</s>

en: "We've also seen a lot more sadness and depression."
sna: Takaonawo kusurikirwa nekutsimbirirwa muzvinzwo zvepfungwa kwakanyaya"
mt0: <pad> "Takaona zvakare moyo wakarasika uye kutambura.</s>

en: Early on in the pandemic, mayors were more focused on city operations, budget shortfalls and the threat the pandemic posed to small businesses, according to David Glick, an associate professor of political science at Boston University and a co-author of the 2021 Menino Survey of Mayors.
sna: David Glick, muzvinafundo wezvematongerwo paBoston University uye ari mumwe wevaviri vakanyora tsakurudzo pausoro pevakuru vemaguta iyi inonzi 2021 Menino Survey of Mayors, akati, "Denda iri richangotanga, vakuru vemaguta vakange vakanangisana nekufambiswa kwebasa remazuva ose remumaguta avo, kusakwana kwemari yakatemerwa mabasa akasiyana siyana,uye nenjodzi yaigona kuunzwa nedenda kunemabhizimisi madiki.
mt0: <pad> Mukuru mukuru ainge akanyanya kufunga nezvemaitiro eguta, mari yacho yakasara uye njodzi yechirwere cheCOVID-19 kune mabasamadiki, David Glick, an associate professor of politics at Boston University and co-author of the 2021 Menino Survey of Mayors.</s>

en: Some of those concerns still remain, but what we saw more of in 2021 is concern about some of the long-term impacts on individual residents, Glick says.
sna: Zvimwe zvezvinetso izvi zvichiripo, asi chatakanyanya kuona muna 2021 zvaive zvinoshungurudza zvinozoitika mumakore anouya zvicharamba zvichishungurudza vagari, Glick anodaro.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvacho zvinoramba zviripo, asi izvozvo zvakanyanya kuonekwa muna 2021 ikuremekedza zvimwe zvinhu zvekuita kwaizoita pamusoro pevanhu vakawanda, Glick anoti.</s>

en: "Concerns about polarization over vaccines and just people being pushed to their limits and certainly less on their city budgets and revenues and having to cut programs and some of those types of things that were probably more top of mind earlier in the pandemic."
sna: "Zvinetswa pamusoro pekuiswa kwevanhu mumapoka anokwikwidzana pamaonero panyaya yemishonga yekudzivirira denda uye nekungoti vanhu vari kusundwa kusvikira kumawere pakuti chii chavanogona kutakura muprungwa dzavo, uye hapasisina kunetsekana nezvekushandiswa kwemari muguta, kupunda kwemari kana kumisa humwe hurongwa uyewo zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita saizvozvi izvo zvaigona kunge zvaive zviri zvinhu zvaikosheswa mupfungwa pakatanga denda iri."
mt0: <pad> "Kunyanya kunetseka pamusoro pekupararira pamusoro pemajekiseni uye vanhu vachimanikidzwa kusvikira zvavari uye ndicho chikonzero chekuti havasi kuwana mari yakawanda yeguta ravo uye mari yavo yekubhadhara uye ruzivo rwavo uye kuti vanofanira kubvisa mapuro ezvikamu zvebasa uye mamwe marudzi acho aiva pamusoro penyaya dzemhando yepamusoro panguva yekutanga yechirwere."</s>

en: Over half of mayors, 52%, are worried about "lingering mental health challenges and trauma," according to the survey.
sna: Chikamu chinodarika chepakati nepakati chevatungamiriri vemaguta ava chinosvika makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana zvichiri kunetsekana "nemusairirwa wemadambudziko muhutano hwepfungwa nezvinotyisa zvinoramba zvirimupfungwa nendangariro," zvinodaro zvakanyorwa mune zvakabuda mutsvakurudzo.
mt0: <pad> Over half of mayors, 52%, are worried about "lingering mental health challenges and trauma," according to the survey.</s>

en: Additionally, more than one-third of mayors, 37%, are worried about learning loss among young people.
sna: Pamusoro pazvo chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chevatungamiriri vemaguta aya, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matatu nevanomwe kubva muzana vainetsekana nekurasikirwa nenguva yekudzidza  kune vvediki..
mt0: <pad> Saka, 37% yemadzimai vanofunga kuti kudzivisa kudzidza kwavana vadiki kunogona kuita kuti vanhu vakuru varambe vachidzidza.</s>

en: Second only to mental health and trauma, and they're probably not totally independent concerns, Glick says.
sna: Izvi zvinotevera hutano hwepfungwa nezvinotyisa zvinosarira mupfungwa nendandangariro mushure mekunge munhu asangana netsaona inotyisa, uye hazvinganzi izvi zvinhu zvakatsaurwa kubva pane zvimwe zvinhu zvinoda kutariswa, anodaro Glick.
mt0: <pad> Zvino ipapo chete nehutano hwepfungwa uye kutambura, uye izvi zvinogona kunge zvisina kunyanya kunyanya kunetseka, Glick anoti.</s>

en: "It is part of that shift of mayors concerns from immediate threats to businesses closing and people getting sick, to some of these longer-term consequences that are going to persist in the future.
sna: "Chikamu chezvinofanirwa kuitwa zvichitangira panjodzi yekuti mabhizimisi anogona kunyura zvachose uye nekuti vanhu vanogona kurwara zvichizobatawo zvimwe zvinetswa zvinobva pamatambudziko ariko aya, asi zvichizooonekwa kwapera makore akati kuti.
mt0: <pad> "Ino ndeimwe yeizvi zvinopesana zvemayors kubva pangozi dzekuvhara mabasa uye kuita kuti vanhu vabereke, kusvika kune zvikonzero izvi zvekufamba kwenguva refu izvo zviri kuramba zvichienderana nenyika.</s>

en: And learning loss among their students, theyre worried it's going to persist for many, many, many years into the future. It's hard to make up for."
sna: Uye kusakirwa nenguva yekudzidza pakati pevadzidzi, vanotya kuti izvi zvicharamba zvichitika kwemakore nemakore akawanda mune ramangwana. Zvakaoma chose kuti izvi zvigadziriswe."
mt0: <pad> And learning loss among their students, they're worried it's going to persist for many, many, many years into the future. It's hard to make up for.</s>

en: According to the survey, other top concerns for Americas mayors include the financial insecurity of low-income residents (33%), the closing of small businesses (29%) and increased crime and violence (26%).
sna: Maringe netsvakurudzo iyi, zvimwe zvinhu zviri pamusoro pazvinhu zvishungurudza vatungamiriri vemaguta ekuAmerica, zvinosanganisira kusachengetedzeka pane zvemari pakati pevagari vanotambira mari shomanana, avo vane huwandu hunesvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nezvitatu kubva muzana, kunyura kwemabhizimisi madoko  izvo zvakaonekwa kuti zvinotora chinzvimbo che zvikamu makumi maviri nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana uyewo nekuwedzera kuparwa mhosva nehugeven'a  izvo zvakatora zvikamu makumi maviri nezvitanhatu kubva muzana.
mt0: <pad> Zvinoenderana nebvunzo, zvimwe zvinhu zvinonyanya kunetsa vakuru veAmerica ndeye nyaya dzekushaya kuchengeteka kwevanhu vane mari shoma (33%), kufunga kwemabasa mashomanana (29%), uye kuwedzera kwakaitwa upanduki uye upanduki (26%).</s>

en: Just 7% of mayors are worried about the shift to remote work and the long-term impact that could have on outmigration people moving away from their cities.
sna: Zvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana zvoga zvavatungamiriri vemaguta ava ndivo vanoshushikana nenyaya dzekuti vanhu vanenge voita mabasa avo vari kure nenzvimbo dzekushandira vachishandisa mapotonjere nemadandemutande uye zvakaipa zvinozobuda pazviri mushure memakore akati kuti apo vagare vachange votama vachienda kunogara mune mamwe maguta.
mt0: <pad> Just 7% of mayors are worried about the shift to remote work and the long-term impact that could have on outmigration people moving away from their cities.</s>

en: The $350 billion in funding from the American Rescue Plan to local and state governments could help mayors address some of their concerns.
sna: Mari yekushandisa inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu yakabva kuhurongwa hwekuyambutsa maguta nehurunmende dzemumatunhu ari parumananzombe inonzi American Rescue Plan yaigona kubatsira vatungamiriri vemaguta kuti vavagadzirise zvimwe zvezvinetswa zvavo.
mt0: <pad> The $350 billion in funding from the American Rescue Plan to local and state governments could help mayors address some of their concerns.</s>

en: The survey found that 78% of mayors believe the money will allow them to make meaningful change.
sna: Tsvakurudzo iyi yakaonawo zvakare kuti zvikamu makumi manimwe nezvisere zvevatungamiriri vemaguta zvine ruvimbo rwekuti mari iyi ichavatendera kuti vaunze shanduko inobatsira.
mt0: <pad> The survey found that 78% of mayors believe the money will allow them to make meaningful change.</s>

en: What we're seeing is a large majority are using it for things they consider to be transformative and will make major changes to their cities, Glick says, "instead of feeling obligated or feeling the necessity to use it to plug up over-budget gaps to keep the doors open and the lights on."
sna: Glick anoti, "Zvatiri kuona ndezvekuti vatungamiriri vakawanda vemaguta vari kushandisa mari iyi pane zvunhu zvavanofunga kuti zvinesimba rekuburitsa shanduko uye kuti zvichaunza shanduko huru mumaguta avo vasinganzwe kugombedzerwa kana kunzwa kufanira kuvhara maburi nemakomba pamari isiri kukwana kuita basa remuguta kuti guta rirambe richishanda semazuva ose uye riine magetsi."
mt0: <pad> Zvino, izvo zvatinoona ndechekuti vazhinji vavo vanoshandisa mari yacho zvinhu zvavanofunga kuti zvinochinja zvikuru maguta avo, Glick anoti, "kusiyana nekuita izvi kuitira kuti vanhu vaone sekuti ivo vanofanira kushandisa mari yacho kuti idzokere nyaya dzakawanda dzemari kuti kuchengetedza madoors akavhurika uye malights akaonekwa."</s>

en: Young Compete Against Old in Hottest US Rental Market in a Decade
sna: Vechidiki vokwikwidzana nevatana zvinotyisa kekutanga mumakore gumi pamusika unopa vanhu pekugara muAmerica
mt0: <pad> Young Compete Against Old in Hottest US Rental Market in a Decade</s>

en: Renting an apartment can be a challenge for new college graduates who are facing the hottest U.S. rental market in a decade, along with some unexpected competition from millennials people aged 24 to 40 and even baby boomers the over-57 club.
sna: Kuwana imba yekugara rinogona kuva dambudziko kune vechidiki achangopedza zvidzidzo zvake pavanenge votanga kushanda, avo vari kusangana nekumhanyidzirirana  mukuwana pekugara kusati kwaitika mumakore gumi apfuura, kuri kupindirwawo nekukwikwidzwa kusingatarisirwe kubva kune vakazvarwa kuma 1980 zvichienda mberi, neavo vane makore ari pakati pemakumi maviri nemana nemakumi mana, zvichitobatawo avo vari muchikwata chevava nemakore makumi mashanu nemanomwe neanoraudzira.
mt0: <pad> Renting an apartment can be a challenge for new college graduates who are facing the hottest U.S. rental market in a decade, along with some unexpected competition from millennials people aged 24 to 40 and even baby boomers the over-57 club.</s>

en: You have aging millennials who are creating families who should be moving from rental situations into ownership but, because of the lack of housing supply, that has been stopped in a lot of instances.
sna: Pane vakazvarwa mumakore ekuma 1990 zvichienda mberi vavakutangawo mhuri dzavo vanofanirwa kunge vachibva mudzimba dzekubhadhara mari yekugara mumba mwedzi nemwedzi vachivawo nedzimba dzavo vegani, asi nekuda kwekunetsa kwezvinoshandiswa pakuvaka, izvi zvakatombomiswa kunzvimbo dzakawanda.
mt0: <pad> Kune vanhu vanokura vechidiki uye vari kuumba mhuri dzakawanda, izvo zvinofanira kuva kubva pakubhadhara kusvika pakutenga, asi, nekuda kwekushaya nzvimbo yekugara, izvi zvakaramba zvichiitika munyaya dzakawanda.</s>

en: And so, what you see is the aging millennial population continues to rent, says Doug Ressler, manager of business intelligence at Yardi-Matrix, a commercial real estate data and research firm.
sna: Saka chaunoona ndechekuti vaya vakazvarwa muna 2000 zvichienda mberi vari kuramba vachigara mudzimba dzekubhadhara mwedzi nemwedzi, anodaro Doug Ressler, mukru anoona nezveruzivo rwekufambiswa kwebasa pa Yardi-Matrix, kambani inoongorora nekuita tsvakurudzo pane zvekutengeswa kwenvzimbo dzekuvaka mabhizimisi nedzimba dzekugara.
mt0: <pad> Saka, zvaunoona ndechekuti vanhu vanogara mumaguta eMillennials vari kuramba vachibhadhara, anodaro Doug Ressler, manager of business intelligence at Yardi-Matrix, a commercial real estate data and research firm.</s>

en: It's not just about millennials, it's not just about [Gen] Z [people under 24], we also see that boomers are making a transition, he added.
sna: Izvi hazvisi zve vaya vakabarwa kuma 1980 zvichienda mberi, uye hazvisi zvezera riya rinonzi Generation Z revanhu vari pasi pemakore makumi maviri nemana,tiri kuonawo vechikuru vachipinda mumutsetse wekutsvaga pekugara mudzimba dzemuturidzanwa wemumaguta.
mt0: <pad> "Hazvina kungori millennials, hazvina kungori [Gen] Z [vanhu vadiki], tinowanawo kuti boomers vari kuita shanduko," akawedzera.</s>

en: Their percentage of moving into rental properties is growing in the last five years."
sna: Huwandu hwavo hwekushandisa dzimba dzavanobhadhara mari yekugara mwedzi nemwedzi hwanga huchiwanda mumakore mashanu apfuura."
mt0: <pad> Zvikamu zvavo zvekugara mumaguta ekutengesa zvakakura mumakore mashanu apfuura.</s>

en: There are a variety of reasons older people are opting for rentals, according to Ressler.
sna: Ressler anoti pane zvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana zviri kuita kuti vanhu vati kureyi vasarudze kushandisa dzimba dzavanobhadhara mari yekugara mwedzi nemwedzi.
mt0: <pad> Kune zvikonzero zvakawanda zvevakuru vekugara mumisha, maererano naRessler.</s>

en: They've lived in a home for so long and they want to be able to reduce their expenses on a fixed income, he says.
sna: Vakagara mumba kwenguva yakareba uye vavakuda kuderedza mari yavanoshandisa kuti ingova imwe chete isingashunduke mwedzi nemwedzi, anodaro Ressler.
mt0: <pad> Vanogara muimba kwenguva refu uye vanoda kukwanisa kubvisa mari yavo pamari yakajairika, anodaro.</s>

en: "They want to live in a social cohort, like a retirement community, and things like that where it's much more socially amenable to them."
sna: "Vanoda kugara mukamusha kevhanhu vari panzvimbo imwe chete , zvakaita semusha unogara vakwegura vakasiya mabasa nedzimwe nzvimbo dzakadaro dzinoita kuti vanzwe kuti vari pakati pevamwe vavanodyidzana nekushamwaridzana navo sevanhu,"
mt0: <pad> "Vanoda kugara musocial cohort, sekugara mune vanhu vanobva kunze, uye zvinhu zvakadaro, kwavanokwanisa kugara zvakanaka pasocially.</s>

en: The asking price of apartment rentals was up 10.7% in September 2021 compared to last year at the same time, according to the National Association of Realtors (NAR).
sna: Musangano wemakambani anotengesa dzimba nekupa vanhu dzimba dzekugara vachibhadhara mwedzi nemwe ye National Association of Realtors (NAR) unoti mari inodiwa yekubhadhara dzimba dziri muzvivakwa zvemituridzanwa yakakwira nezvikamu gumi kubva muzana muna Gunyana 2021 zvichienzaniswa nenguva imwe cheteyo gore rakapera.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe usambokwanisa kuita izvi, taura kuti hauzivi</s>

en: It's a hot market.
sna: Musika wedu uri kubhebha.
mt0: <pad> Iyo nzvimbo inozivikanwa.</s>

en: We have never seen this market so hot in the last decade, says Gay Cororaton, NARs senior economist and director of housing and commercial research.
sna: Hatisati tambowuona uchipisa kudai mumakore gumi adarika, anodaro Gay Cororaton, nyanzvi munezveupfumi uye ari mukuru anoona nezvedzimba netsvakurudzo muNAR.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe mune zvimwe zvinhu, vanhu vanotengesa mari havasati vaona nzvimbo yacho yakasviba sezvaiita mumakore gumi apfuura, anodaro Gay Cororaton, NAR's senior economist and director of housing and commercial research.</s>

en: "The average rent growth, year-over-year, is about 3-to-5%. We're seeing 11% rent growth now, so, clearly, way above trends weve had in the past."
sna: "Kuwedzera kwemari yekubhadhara pekugara mwedzi nemwedzi tichitarisa zvinoitika mugore roga roga kuri pakati pezvikamu zvitatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. asi ikezvino takakuona mari yekubhadharira imba mwedzi nemwedzi ichikwira nezvikamu gumi nechimwe kubva muzana, saka zviri pachena kuti zvavakuitika zavnynya kukwira kudarika zvaisiitika makore akadarika."
mt0: <pad> "Kuwedzera kwerent, gore-nerore, ndiko kuita 3-5 %. Tiri kuona kuwedzera kwerent kwe11% iye zvino, saka, zviri pachena, zvakanyanya kupfuura zvatakaona mumakore apfuura."</s>

en: Renters are feeling the squeeze because the COVID-19 pandemic caused supply chain issues, slowing down home building in the United States.
sna: Vanhu vanogara mudzimba dzekubhadhara mwedzi nemwedzi vari panguva yakaoma nekuda kwedenda reCOVID-19 iro rakakanganisa kugadzirwa nekufambiswa kwezvinhu zvinoda kutengwa nevanhu mukurarama kwavo, izvo zvakanonotsa kuvakwa kwedzimba muUnited States.
mt0: <pad> Renters are feeling the squeeze because the COVID-19 pandemic caused supply chain issues, slowing down home building in the United States.</s>

en: Instead of the usual 5-to-6 month supply of available single-family homes, supply dropped below two months in January 2021.
sna: Pachinzvimbo chekuti zvinhu zvinodiwa kushandiswa zvainge zvichiwanikwa muzvitoro kwemwedzi mitanhatu zvisingashaikwe pakuvaka dzimba dzemhuri imwe neimwe, muna Ndira zvekuvakisa zvakange zvowanikwa kwemwedzi miviri chete.
mt0: <pad> Instead of the usual 5-to-6 month supply of available single-family homes, supply dropped below two months in January 2021.</s>

en: The lack of housing supply means millennials are having a harder time buying a single-family home, which has been the traditional trajectory in the past.
sna: Kushaikwa kwedzimba kunoreva kuti vanhu vakazvarwa kuma 1990 vava kuva nenguva yakaoma kuti vatenge dzimba dzevanhu vasati vava nevana, iyo yaive tsika yaitevedzerwa munguva yakapfuura.
mt0: <pad> Mhuri dzeMillennials dzine nguva yakaoma kutenga imba yemhuri imwe chete, izvo zvaive nzira yaishandiswa kare.</s>

en: The whole building industry was beset by supply chain issues, Cororaton says.
sna: Chikamu chese chezvekuvaka chakagariswa pasi nekukanganiswa kwakaitika mumakambani anogadzira zvinhu zvekushandisa uye kuzofambiswa kwazvo kuti zviwanikwe nevanozvida, anodaro Cororaton.
mt0: <pad> Misika yese yekuvaka yakabatwa nematambudziko esupply chain, anoti Cororaton.</s>

en: "Shipments couldn't come in, the price of lumber was rising, manufacturing slowed, workers could not come in [to work], so you have shortages of frames, appliances.
sna: "Zvinhu zvafanirwa kutakurwa nezvikepe zvakange zvisiri kusvika, mutengo wematanda akagadzirirwa kuti avakiswe dzimba wakange uchikwira, kugadzirwa kwezvinhu kwakabva kwaderera, vashandi vakange vasingakwanise kuuya kumabasa, saka kwakazove nekushaikwa zvinobata mikova nemafafitera nemomwe midziyo inoiswa panovakwa imba.
mt0: <pad> "Shipments couldn't come in, the price of lumber was rising, manufacturing slowed, workers could not come in [to work], so you have shortages of frames, appliances.</s>

en: So, essentially, just a short supply."
sna: Naizvozvo yaive nyaya yekushaikwa kwezvinhu"
mt0: <pad> Saka, izvozvo, zvakanyanya kudhura.</s>

en: The housing supply got even tighter during the pandemic as more investors put their money into housing, according to Cororaton, while existing homeowners looked for second homes.
sna: Cororaton anoti zvinhu zvekuvakisa zvakazonyanya kushaikwa nekuti mari zhinji yakange yoiswa mumakambani anovaka dzimba nekuti ndizvo zvaibhadhara, apawo vanhu vakange vatove nedzimba nechekare vakange votsvaga dzimba dzechipiri.
mt0: <pad> Mhuri dzinogara vanhu vakawanda dzakanyanya kudhura panguva yechirwere sezvo vatengesi vakawanda vakaisa mari yavo munyaya dzekubhadhara, maererano naCororaton, uye vatongi vemisha vakatsvaka mamwe makuva.</s>

en: With the pandemic, there was also a big demand for second homes, for vacation homes.
sna: Nekuda kwedenda kwakazove nevanoda kutenga dzimba dzepiri, nedzimba dzekunogara panguva yavanenge vakazorora.
mt0: <pad> Paiva ne pandemic, paivawo achitsvaga kwambiri kweimba yechipiri, yemhuri yekugara.</s>

en: Typically, vacation homes accounted for just about 5% [of the market], she says.
sna: Itsika yekuti dzimba dzekunogara vanhu vari pazororo dzaitora zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana yedzimba dzose dzaitengwa nekutengeswaanodaro.
mt0: <pad> Zvinonyanya, nzvimbo dzekugara mazuva ano dzinoumba chete 5% [yemari], anoti.</s>

en: "Early this summer they rose to about 8%.
sna: "Tichangopinda muzhizha wegore rino dzimba idzi dzakakwira kusvika pazvikamu zvisere kubva muzana .
mt0: <pad> "Kutanga kwezhizha rino, vakawedzera kuita 8%.</s>

en: So again, strong demand and strong imbalance of demand and supply caused home prices to rise, made them less affordable."
sna: Saka naizvozvo zvakare kuwanda kwevanhu vaida kutenga dzimba asi pasina kuenzana pakati pevanoda kutenga dzimba nedzimba dzacho dziri kutengeswa kwakaita kuti mitengo yedzimba ikwire, zvikaita kuti dzive dzisiri nyore kuti atenge."
mt0: <pad> Saka zvakare, kunyanya kutsvaga uye kusaenzanisa kwekutsvaga uye kupa kwakanyanya kwakabvisa mari yemisha, yaiita kuti ive isingawanzokwanisika.</s>

en: The hottest rental markets right now are in the West and South.
sna: Nzvimbo dzine nzvimbo dzirikupisa nekufarirwa nevanhu ike zvino dziri kumavirira nekuchemhembe.
mt0: <pad> Zvikuru zvikuru nzvimbo dzekubhadhara ikozvino dzinogara muWest uye South.</s>

en: More renters are moving to Dallas and Houston in Texas, followed by Atlanta, Georgia; New York; Los Angeles; Austin, Texas; Phoenix, Arizona; and Washington, D.C., according to NAR.
sna: Vanhu vari kuda dzimba dzekugara vari kutamira kuDallas nekuHouston mudunhu reTexas, zvhichiteverwa ne Atlanta kudunhu reGeorgia, kozotiwo New York; Los Angeles; Austin, Texas; Phoenix, Arizona; neWashington mudunhu reD.C., sekutaurwa kwazvakaitwa neNAR.
mt0: <pad> Mamwe vanhu vanogara muDallas neHouston muTexas, vachiteverwa neAtlanta, Georgia; New York; Los Angeles; Austin, Texas; Phoenix, Arizona; uye Washington, D.C.</s>

en: Cororaton expects the coming year to be a little better but says the housing shortage is likely to continue for the next few years.
sna: Cororaton anotarisira kuti gore rininouya rinenge riri nani zvishoma asi kushaikwa kwedzimba kuchaenderera mberi kwemakore akati kuti kumberi uko.
mt0: <pad> Cororaton achiri kutarisira gore rinouya kuti riite nani asi anoti nyaya yekushaikwa kweimba inofanirwa kuramba ichiripo kwemakore akawanda.</s>

en: You know, the old adage of moving from rentals into homeownership, that whole polemic may be changing, says Ressler.
sna: Munoziva zvaisitaurwa makare kuti vanhu vaibva mudzimba dzekubhadhara mwedzi nemwedzi tichipinda mune dzavo, gakava iroro ravakushanduka, anodaro Ressler.
mt0: <pad> Unoziva, nyaya yekare yekufamba kubva pakubhadhara kusvika kutenga kumba, nyaya yakazara inogona kuchinja, anodaro Ressler.</s>

en: "The sweet spot was always the millennials, and now the millennials are being replaced by the [Gen] Zs, but the millennials are staying longer and the Zs are coming on board, and now you've got the demographic of the boomers.
