sna: "Nzvimbo yaizipa yaive yevaya musika wekutengesa dzimba uchange uchiunza pundutso nekubhadhara  vakazvagwa mumakore ekuma 1980, asi ava vavakutorerwa chinzvimbo chavo veya vakazvagwa muma 1990 vanonzi maGeneration Z, asi vaya vekuma 1980 vari kugara nguva yakarebesa mudzimba dzekubhadharira mwedzi nemwedzi saka maGeneration Z apindawo mudariro, uye kwozoitawo chikwata chevatana vakazvagwa kuma 1940 kusvika 1965.
mt0: <pad> "The sweet spot always was the millennials, and now the millennials are being replaced by the [Gen] Zs, but the millennials are staying longer and the Zs are coming on board, and now you've got the demographic of the boomers.</s>

en: What it means is a very profitable and dynamic [rental] market that's going to continue to grow."
sna: Zvazvinoreva ndezvekuti pava nemusika wezvekutengeswa kwedzimba dzekubhadhara mwedzi nemwedzi ucharamba uchikura."
mt0: <pad> Zvinoreva kuti nzvimbo inodhura zvikuru uye ine simba [rental] market inozoramba ichishanda.</s>

en: Are COVID-19 Restrictions Stunting Children's Immune Systems?
sna: Kurambidzwa Kwekufamba Kwevanhu Kuri kumisa here kukura kwemasojaari mumiviri yevana kuchengetedza nekurwira hutano hwavo?
mt0: <pad> Are COVID-19 Restrictions Stunting Children's Immune Systems?</s>

en: Some medical experts have expressed concern that COVID-19 preventative measures, like masking and remote schooling, are potentially weakening childrens immune systems by shielding them from the usual childhood illnesses.
sna: Dzimwe nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzaratidza kushushikana zvikuru kuti matanho akatorwa ekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 zvakaita sekufukidza muromo nejira uye kudzidza kwevana vari kudzimba vachishandisa mapotonjere kunogona kunge kwava kuderedza simba nehuwandu hwemasoja ari mumiviri yevana kuti arwise zvirwere zvinogona kuvabata nekuti izvi zvose zvavakuita kuti vana vasabatwe nezvirwere zvinongosibata vana vechidiki pakukura kwavo.
mt0: <pad> Some medical experts have expressed concern that COVID-19 preventative measures, like masking and remote schooling, are potentially weakening children's immune systems by shielding them from the usual childhood illnesses.</s>

en: There are a lot of reasons to believe that kids need to be exposed to things to keep their immunity complex, so that should they encounter something very dangerous, they have aspects of their immunity that might cross over and help protect them against those things, says Sara Sawyer, a professor of molecular, cellular and developmental biology at the University of Colorado Boulder.
sna: Pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvekuti titende kuti vana vanofanirwa kuregwa vachisangana nezvirwere kuitira kuti masoja emumiviri yavo arambe akasimba achiita mabasa akawanda asingajairirwe nezvirwere, kuitira kuti kana vakasangana nechirwere chinenjodzi huru vane zviri mumasoja avo zvinogona kukurumidza kuyambukira kune chirwere ichi zvigomisidzana nacho zvichirwira vana ava anodaro Sara Sawyer, muzvinafundo munezvekunzvera kushanda nekukura kunoita twumamapazi twuri muropa yemumiviri yevanhu twunoita mitezo yavo ikure uye ichirwisana nezvirwere pa University of Colorado Boulder.
mt0: <pad> Kune zvikonzero zvakawanda zvekutenda kuti vana vanofanira kuiswa zvinhu kuti vachengete hutano hwavo, saka kana vachisangana nechinhu chinonyanya kuipa, vana ava vane zvikamu zvehutano hwavo zvinogona kushandira pamwechete uye kubatsira kudzivirira ivo pamusoro pechinhu chacho, anodaro Sara Sawyer, professor of molecular, cellular and developmental biology at the University of Colorado Boulder.</s>

en: At birth, vulnerable infants get antibodies from their mothers breast milk, which helps protect them until they can build their own immunity.
sna: Pavanozvagwa vana vari panjodzi yezvirwere vanowana masoja anodzivirira hutano hwavo kubva kuzvirwere mumukaka wanaamai vavo, zvinova ndizvo zvinovaxhengetedza kusvikira miviri yavo yava kugona kusikawo masoja anovadzivirira kubva kuzvirwere.
mt0: <pad> Mbereche, vana vadiki vanobva mune mimba yaamai vavo, inobatsira kudzivirira ivo kusvika mavaumba simba ravo rekurwisana.</s>

en: Its no accident that babies start putting things in their mouths as soon as they gain enough dexterity to pick things up.
sna: Haichisi chinhu chinongoitika nemasanga kuti vana vanotanga kuisa zvinhu mukanwa kubva panguva yanongokwanisa kufambisa maoko avo vachisimudza zvinhu.
mt0: <pad> Zvinonzi hazvina kunyanya kuti vana vabereki vanotanga kuisa zvinhu mumamwavo avo kana vatanga kuwana simba rekubata zvinhu.</s>

en: "They're doing that because they're sampling the environment and building their immunity. That's an evolutionary trait," Sawyer says.
sna: "Vanoita zvinhu izvi nekuti vanenge vachiri kuona kuti munharaunda yavari inechi uye vachivaka simba remauto emumiviri yavo. Ndizvo zvinoitika mukukura nekushanduka kunoita vanhu nemhuka kuti vagone kurarama maringe neshanduko iri kuitiia munharauda dzavanenge vachigara madziri" Sawyer anodaro.
mt0: <pad> "Vanozviita izvi nokuti vanoedza nzvimbo yacho uye vachivaka hutano hwavo. Iyo inemaitiro ekupedzisira," anodaro Sawyer.</s>

en: They are exposing their body to germs in a certain, level way to build their immunity.
sna: Ipapa vanenge vachitoita kuti miviri yavo isangane nehumwe hutachiona, izvi zvichizoita kuti neimwe nzira inoenzanisira miviri iyi igone kuva nemasoja anprwisana nezvoirwere.
mt0: <pad> Vanoratidza mhuka dzemuviri wavo nenzira yakasiyana-siyana kuti vagadzire simba rekurapa.</s>

en: So, some people would argue that childhood illnesses, like colds and stomach bugs, build our immunity so that when more dangerous things come along, we're prepared and we don't get as sick from those more dangerous things.
sna: Saka, vamwe vanogona kuzoti zvirwere zvevana vadiki, zvakaita sedzihwa nemudumbu, zvinovaka masoja anotidzivirira kuitira kuti kana zvimwe zvhinhu zvine njodzi zvikazouya, tinenge takagadzirira uye hatizonyanye kurwara nekuda kwezvinhu izvi zvine njodzi.
mt0: <pad> Saka, vamwe vanhu vanotaura kuti matenda evana, sekutonhora uye mhuka dzemuhuro, anoumba simba redu rekurapa kuitira kuti kana zvinhu zvakanyanya kuipa zvichidauya, isu tiri kugadzirira uye hatina kuita zvakawanda kubva kune zvinhu izvi zvinonyanya kuipa.</s>

en: Even before the pandemic, epidemiological evidence suggested that children in more developed countries, where handwashing and the use of sanitizer are more prevalent, might have less-developed immune systems compared to kids in developing nations who are routinely exposed to more bacteria, viruses and allergens.
sna: Kunyangwe denda redzihwamupengo iri risati ravapo, humbowo hwakabuda mukuongorora nzira dzinopararira nadzo zvirwere hwaiita sekuratidza kuti vana vari munyika dzakabudirira kudarika dzimwe, uko kuno nyanyoshandiswa sipo dzekugezesa maoko nemishonga inouraya hutachiona hwemumaoko, vanogona kuva nemasoja emumuviri asina kukura nekusimba zvichienzaniswa nevana vari munyika dzichiri kubudirira, avo vanosangana nehutachiona hunokonzera zvirwere, twumbuyu, matenda nezkusagadzikana kwehutano.
mt0: <pad> Even before the pandemic, epidemiological evidence suggested that children in more developed countries, where handwashing and the use of sanitizer are more prevalent, might have less-developed immune systems compared to kids in developing nations who are routinely exposed to more bacteria, viruses and allergens.</s>

en: This makes kids in more industrialized countries more vulnerable to developing autoimmune diseases, according to whats known as the "hygiene hypothesis."
sna: Izvi zvinoita kuti vana vari munyika vakabudirira kudarika dzimwe vave panjodzi yekubata zvirwere zvinobva pakuti miviri yavo inenge isisagone kuzvivakira masoja anodzivirira hutrano hwavo, zvichienderana nezvinodaidzwa zvichinzi "fungidziro inoshandiswa patsvakurudzo dzezvehutsanana."
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinoita kuti vana munyika dzine ruzivo rwakanyanya kutambura nechirwere cheautoimmune, maererano nezvinozivikanwa se "hygiene hypothesis," zvichienderana nezvinonzi "hygiene hypothesis."</s>

en: The hygiene hypothesis is actually quite controversial because it's thought that our exposure to microbes isn't the only factor, says Cody Warren, a virologist and immunologist who is a postdoctoral fellow at the University of Colorado Boulder.
sna: Fungidziro inoshandiswa patsvakurudzo dzezvehutsana a iyi ine vanhu vanoyiona nenzira dzakasiyana siyana pasina kuwirirana nekuti zvinofungidzirwa kuti kusangana kwatinoita nehutachiona hunokonzeresa zvirwere hachisiri chinhu chimwe choga chinokonzeresa zvirwere, anodaro Cody Warren, hutachiona hunokonzera zvirwere nekuongorora mashandiro anoita masoja emumuviri pakudzivirira zvirwere,  uyo ari kuita zvimwe zvidzidzo zvapamusoro munyaya idzi ari paUniversity of Colorado Boulder.
mt0: <pad> The hygiene hypothesis inonyanya kupesana nekuti inofungidzira kuti kusangana kwedu nemamicrobes hakusi chete chikonzero, anodaro Cody Warren, virologist uye immunologist uyo anogara ari post-doctoral fellow paUniversity of Colorado Boulder.</s>

en: A lot of this could also be dictated by genetics, diet, and the environment that we live in.
sna: Zvizhinji izvi zvinobva panhodzera dzezvatinowana kubva kuvabereki vedu, zvatinodya uye nharaunda dzatinogara madziri.
mt0: <pad> Muchikamu ichi chinogona kuitwa zvakare negenetics, diet, uye nzvimbo yatinogara.</s>

en: That also shapes our immune system's a real multifactorial thing that we can't fully account for just by wearing masks.
sna: Izviwo zvinoumba mashandiro anozoita miviri yedu pakuzvidzivirira kubva kune zvirwere. Iyi inyaya ine mativi mazhinji chose zvatisingagone kungotsanangura nekuti tawana zviputiro zvemachira zvemhino nemiromo kuti tisafeme mhepo ine hutachona.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinogadzirawo simba redu rekurapa, chinhu chaizvo chinoumba zvinhu zvakawanda zvekuti hatigone kuita izvi zvachose nekupfeka masiki.</s>

en: There are other things that go into that equation.
sna: Pane zvimwewo zvinhu zvinopinda munyaya iyi.
mt0: <pad> Kune zvimwe zvinhu zvinopinda mune izvozvo.</s>

en: Warren, the father of three young children, says spending lots of time outdoors is one way to balance the negatives of isolation.
sna: Warren, the father of three young children, says spending lots of time outdoors is one way to balance the negatives of isolation.
mt0: <pad> Warren, baba vavana vatatu, anoti kupedza nguva yakawanda panze ndeimwe nzira yekurwisa zvimwe zvinopesana nekuti uri kure.</s>

en: Just exploring microbes in the environment also is benefiting [and] training our immune system, Warren says. "Our immune systems get trained through the foods that we eat, which also have microorganisms on them.
sna: Warren anoti, "Kusangana kwatinoita nehutachiona huri munharaunda kunobatsira nekudziodzisa masoja emumuviri yedu. Masoja emumuviri yedu anodzidziswa mashandiro aanofanirwa kuita kuburikidza nechikafu chatinodya, icho chinenge chiine twuhutachiona machiri."
mt0: <pad> Just exploring microbes in the environment also is benefiting [and] training our immune system, Warren says. "Our immune systems get trained through the foods that we eat, which also have microorganisms on them."</s>

en: And so, despite the fact that we've kind of been hunkered down a little bit, I do feel that our immune systems will catch up."
sna: "Naizvizvo, kunyangwe zvichiita nekuti takakandirwa pasi zvishomanani, ndinofunga kuti masoja emumuviri yedu achamuruka agosimba pakare."
mt0: <pad> Saka, kunyange zvazvo tiri kunge takaita kuti tingogara pasi zvishoma, ndinofunga kuti masystem edu ekuchengetedza anofanira kutanga kubva.</s>

en: There are other things parents can do, he says, to boost their childrens immune systems during pandemic times.  "One of the most important things you can do is just to stay up to date on vaccines.
sna: Anoti, "Pane zvimwe zvinhu izvo vabereki vanogona kuita kuti vasimudzire nekusimbisa masoja anodzivirira miviri kubva pazvirwere panguva dzekunge paputika matenda anopararira nekukurumidza achiuraya vanhu. Chimwe chezvhinhu zvakanyanyokosha  kuita kuona kuti wagara uchiwana mishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere nenguva dzaunofanirwa kunge waiwana.
mt0: <pad> VanaMai vanogona kuita zvinhu zvimwe, iye anoti, kuti vawedzere mafungiro evana vavo panguva yechirwere. "Chinhu chikuru chaunogona kuita ndechekuti uchengete ruzivo pamusoro pezvicherwa zvako."</s>

en: That's one of the best ways that we have to train our immune systems," Warren says.
sna: Warren anoti, " Iyi ndiye yedzimwe nzira dzakaisvonaka dzekudzidzisa basa kumasoja emumiviri yedu kuti anoshanda seyi basa rawo."
mt0: <pad> "Iyo ndeimwe yenzira dzakawanda dzekudzidzisa masystem eimmune," anodaro Warren.</s>

en: But also, equally important is making sure our children have a good diet and they regulate stress.
sna: Asi zvakanyanyawo kukosha kuona kuti vana vedu vari kudya chikafu chakanaka chinovaka muviri uye nekuona kuti vane nzira dzavanadzo dzekubvisa zvingavashungurudze mupfungwa nendangariro.
mt0: <pad> Asi zvakakosha kuti vana vedu vawane chikafu chakanaka uye kuti vagadzirise kushungurudzika.</s>

en: It's been well documented that both of those having a good diet, a less stressful environment can have a positive impact on our immune system.
sna: Zvakaonekwa nekunyorwa kuti kuva nezvekudya zvakanaka, kugara munharaunda isina kushungurudzwa kwepfungwa zvinogona kuva nezvakanaka zvazvinoita kumasoja anochengetedza nekurwira miviri yedu kubva kuzvirwere.
mt0: <pad> Zvinozivikanwa kuti zvese zviripo - kuva nechikafu chakanaka, nzvimbo ine kurangarira zvishoma - zvinogona kuita zvakanaka kune simba redu rekurapa.</s>

en: Once public health officials say masks are no longer necessary, Sawyer thinks pointing out the positives of putting our masks away could reassure hesitant parents who worry about their children getting sick.
sna: Panongonzi nevanoona nezvekutano hweruzhinji zviputiro zvemhino nemuromo hazvisisina basa, -Sawyer anofunga kuti kuburitsa pachena zvinhu zvakanaka zvinobva pakusiyana nezviputiro zvemhino nemuromo zvinogona kudzikamisa hana dzevabereki vanoshungurudzika kuti vana vavo vanogona kurwara.
mt0: <pad> Kana vakuru vehutano hwevanhu vachiti masiki haana chinhu, Sawyer anofunga kuti kuratidza zvakanaka kwekuisa masiki edu kunogona kubatsira kunyaradza vabereki vanoshushikana kuti vana vavo vanenge varwere.</s>

en: Maybe we should have a public conversation about the possible reasons to take that mask off, if they are in school, and get back to the normal repertoire of relatively safe childhood illnesses, she says.
sna: Zvichida, tinofanirwa kuti tiite nhaurirano pajikerere neveruzhinji pamusoro pezvikonzero zvekuti sei tichifanirwa kuchibvisa zviputiro zvemhino nemiromo, kana zvichiri kushandiswa muzvikoro, tobva tadzokera hedu kutsika dzedu dzamazuva ose ezvatinoita nezvirwere zvevana zvisina njodzi yakanyanya kuhutano hwavo, anodaro.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe tinofanira kuita hurukuro pamusoro pezvikonzero zvacho kuti vabve mumask, kana vari kuchikoro, uye kudzokera kune nyaya dzakajairika dzechirwere chevana, anotaura.</s>

en: The plus side of childhood illnesses is that they can build up that hornet's nest of immunity that could protect kids against new things that then come along.
sna: Zvakanakira zvirwere zvevana vadiki ndezvekuti zvinobatsira kuvaka dende remamoga chaiwo yemasoja emumuviri anorwira vana kubva pazvirwere nehutachiona hutsva hunogona kungofuma hwavako.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvikonzero zvekurwara kwevana ndechekuti zvinokwanisa kuumba nzvimbo yehuropi inochengeta vana kubva kune zvinhu zvitsva zviri kuuya.</s>

en: US Quietly Expands Asylum Limits While Preparing to End Them
sna: US Inowedzera chinyararire hurebu hwenguva ingagara vapoteri asi ichigadzirira kuvarambidza kupotera
mt0: <pad> US Quietly Expands Asylum Limits While Preparing to End Them</s>

en: The Biden administration has begun expelling Cubans and Nicaraguans to Mexico under pandemic-related powers to deny migrants a chance to seek asylum, expanding use of the rule even as it publicly says it has been trying to unwind it, officials said Wednesday.
sna: Hurumende yavaBiden yatanga kudzinga zvizvarwa zvekuCuba nekuNicaragua ichavaendesa kuMexico ichishandisa masimba anezvekuita nekurwisana nedenda zvichibva zvashaisa vauyi ava mukana wekuti vatsvake hupoteri, ichibva yawedzera kushandisa kwayiri kuita mutemo uyu asi apa ichitaura pachena kuti yava kuda kupeta mutemo uyu, vakuru vehurumende vakadaro nemusi weChitatu.
mt0: <pad> The Biden administration has begun expelling Cubans and Nicaraguans to Mexico under pandemic-related powers to deny migrants the chance to seek asylum, expanding use of the rule even as it publicly says it has been trying to unwind it, officials said Wednesday.</s>

en: The U.S. struck agreement with Mexico to expel up to 100 Cubans and 20 Nicaraguans a day from three locations: San Diego; El Paso, Texas; and Rio Grande Valley, Texas, according to a U.S. official with direct knowledge of the effort.
sna: U.S. yakaita chibvumirano neMexico kuti idzinge zvizvarwa zana zvekuCuban nezvimwe makumi maviri zvekuNicaragua pazuva rega rega kubva panzvimbo nhatu, dzinoti: San Diego; El Paso, Texas; neRio Grande Valley, kuTexas, zvichienderana nezvakataurwa nemumwe mukuru weku U.S. anonyatsoziva zvirikuitika pabasa iri.
mt0: <pad> U.S. yakasaina chibvumirano neMexico yekubvisa kusvika 100 Cubans uye 20 Nicaraguans pazuva kubva kuzvitoro zvitatu: San Diego; El Paso, Texas; and Rio Grande Valley, Texas, maererano nemumwe mumiririri weU.S. ane ruzivo rwunobva mukuedza kwacho.</s>

en: The expulsions began April 27 and will end May 22, the official told The Associated Press on condition of anonymity because the agreement has not been made public.
sna: Kudzingwa uku kwakatanga musi wa27 Kubvumbi uye kuchapera musi wa27 Chivabvu, mukuru uyu akaudza Associated Press achiti aizviita izvi pachibvumirano chekuti zita rake harazotaurwe nekuti chibvumirano ichi hachisati chashambadzirwa kune veruzvinji.
mt0: <pad> The expulsions began April 27 and will end May 22, the official said, on condition of anonymity because the agreement has not been made public.</s>

en: They are carried out under Title 42 authority, a public health law that has been used to expel migrants on grounds of preventing spread of COVID-19. Title 42 is due to expire May 23, unless a judge intervenes.
sna: Izvi zvirikuitwa pasi pemutemo wehutano hweveruzhinji unonzi Title 42 authority, wanga uchishandiswa kudzinga zvizvarwa zvekunedzimwe nyika nezvikonzero zvekudzivirira kuapararira kwedenda reCOVID-19. Mutemo uyu, Title 42, uri kupera simba rekushanda musi wa23 Chivabvu, kunje kwekuti mutongi wemhosva apindira achishandisa masimba ake.
mt0: <pad> Vanoitwa pasi pesimba reChinyorwa 42, iro bumbiro remitemo yehutano rakashandiswa kuendesa vagari kunze kwenyika vachida kudzivirira kupararira kweCOVID-19. Chinyorwa 42 chinofanira kupera musi waMay 23, kunze kwekunge mutongo wedare unopindira.</s>

en: The U.S. and Mexico agreed April 26 to a very limited number of expulsions of Cubans and Nicaraguans, according to a high-level Mexican official who spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to comment publicly.
sna: U.S. neMexico zvakawirirana kuti pave nekudzingwa kwakaganhurwa kwezvizvarwa zvekuCuba nekuNicaragua, zvichibva kumukuru mukuru wekuMexico akataura paine kuwirirana kwekuti zita rake harizivikanwe nekuti havatenderwe kutaura nezvenyaya iyi pajikerere zvichinzwikwa neveruzhinji.
mt0: <pad> U.S. neMexico vakawirirana musi wa26 April kuti vatumire vanhu vanobva kuCuba neNicaragua, sezvakataurwa nemukuru weMexico akataura pasi pekuzivikanwa nokuti havana kodzero yekutaura pamusoro penyaya yacho pamberi penyika.</s>

en: It was prompted by higher numbers of migrants from those two countries coming to the U.S. border.
sna: Izvi zvakakonzereswa nekuwanda kkukuru kwevapoteri kubva kunyika mbiri idzi vachipinda mumiganhu yeU.S.
mt0: <pad> It was prompted by higher numbers of migrants from those two countries coming to the U.S. border</s>

en: Mexico also took into account that the U.S. government had started processing visas in Cuba again, the official said.
sna: Mexico yakatarisawo nyaya yekuti hurumende yeU.S. yakange yavhura zvakare muCuba hofisi yekupa mapepa anotendera vanhu vekunwe dzimwe nyika kupinda muAmerica, mukuru yu akadaro.
mt0: <pad> Mexico yakafungawo kuti U.S. yakanga yatanga kugadzirisa mavisa eCuba zvakare, akadaro mukuru wehurumende.</s>

en: Mexico had also begun processing visas for Cubans.
sna: Mexico yakange yatangawo kupa mapepa ekupinda munyika kuzvizvarwa zvekuCuba.
mt0: <pad> Mexico yainge yatanga kugadzirira visas yeCubans.</s>

en: Another Mexican official, also not authorized to comment publicly, confirmed that up to 100 Cubans and 20 Nicaraguans were being expelled from San Diego under Title 42.
sna: Mumwewo mukuru wekuMexico, uyowo asingatenderwe kutaura zvirikuitika pajikerer, akasimbisawo kuti zvizvarwa zana zvekuCuba ne zvizvarwa makumi maviri zveku Nicaragua vakange vachidzingwa kubva kuSan Diego pasi pemutemo unonzi Title 42.
mt0: <pad> Another Mexican official, also not authorized to comment publicly, confirmed that up to 100 Cubans and 20 Nicaraguans were being expelled from San Diego under Title 42 under the immigration law.</s>

en: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
sna: Bazi remuAmerica rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati menyika reDepartment of Homeland Security harina kudaira kuchikumbiro chekuti ritaurewo pamusoiro penyaya iyi.
mt0: <pad> U.S. Department of Homeland Security haina kupindura nyaya yacho nenguva yakajairika.</s>

en: Until last week, Mexico only agreed to take Guatemalans, Hondurans and El Salvadorans in addition to Mexicans under Title 42 authority.
sna: Kusvikira svondo rakapera, Mexico yakabvuma kutambira zvizvarwa zvekuGuatemala, Honduras neEl Salvador pamwe chete nezvizvarwa zvekuMexico ichishandisa masimba emutemo weTitle 42.
mt0: <pad> Until last week, Mexico only agreed to take Guatemalans, Hondurans and El Salvadorans in addition to Mexicans under Title 42 authority.</s>

en: Other nationalities are subject to Title 42 but costs, strained diplomatic ties and other considerations often make it difficult to send them back to their home countries.
sna: Zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri pasiwo peTitle 42 asi kudhura kwebasa iri, hukama hwakakanganisika nedzimwenyika kunobva vapoteri ava nezvimwewo zvinoita kuti zvizvarwa izvi zvidzoserwe kunyika dzadzo kwadzakabva.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe nyika dzinonzi ndedzekuAmerica, dzinofanira kushandisa Title 42 asi mari, hukama hwediplomatically hwakaoma uye zvimwe zvinhu zvinowanzoita kuti zvakaoma kuvaendesa kudzokera kunyika dzavo.</s>

en: It's next to impossible for the U.S. to expel migrants to Cuba or Nicaragua because of poor relations with those governments.
sna: Chinhu chiri pedo nekusaitika zvachose kuti U.S. idzosere vauyi vekuCuba kana kuNicaragua nekuda kwehukama husina kunaka pakati peU.S. nehurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi.
mt0: <pad> Zvinenge zvisingaite kuti United States ikwanise kuendesa vapoteri kuCuba kana Nicaragua nekuti havasati vamboita hukama nemahurumende iwayo.</s>

en: That has posed a challenge for the Biden administration as more people from those countries seek haven in the United States.
sna: Izvi zvasiya hurumende yavaBiden iine dambudziko sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutsvaga nzvimbo yekugara ine rudekero muUnited States.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinove zvaive chinhu chinotadza kuitwa neBiden administration sezvo vanhu vakawanda vanobva kunyika dzacho vachiedza kuwana rutsigiro muUnited States.</s>

en: Cubans were stopped by U.S. authorities more than 32,000 times on the Mexican border in March, double the number in February and more than five times October's count, according to U.S. Customs and Border Protection.
sna: Zvizvarwa zvekuCuba zvakadziviswa kuti zvisapinde nevakuru vekuUS. kanokwana zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri pamuganhu nenyika yeMexico munaKurume, huwandu uhwu hwuchiwedzerwa zvakapetwa kaviri huwandu hwemunaKukadzi, uye zvakapetwa rushanu huwandu hwemunaGumiguru, sekutaurwa kwazvakaitwa nebazi rinoona nezvemapindiro anoita vanhu nezvinhu uye nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemiganhu yemuAmerica rinonzi U.S. Customs and Border Protection. anhu yeU.S.
mt0: <pad> Cubans vakabatwa neU.S. authorities pamusoro pemakumi matatu nguva paMexico border munaKurume, kaviri kupfuura munaFebruary uye kashanu kupfuura munaOctober, maererano neUnited States Customs and Border Protection.</s>

en: Nicaragua eased travel restrictions from Cuba in November, making it easier for Cubans to continue by land to the U.S. border.
sna: Nicaragua yakarerutsa kupinda kwevanhu vanobva kuCuba muna Mbudzi, zvichibva zvaita kuti zvive nyore kuvanhu vekuCuba kuti vavafambe nemugwagwa kwete mumvura kuti vasvike kumug
mt0: <pad> Nicaragua yakaregerera zvinorambidzwa kubva kuCuba munaNovember, zvichiita kuti vanhu vekuCuba vakwanise kufamba nenyika vachienda kuUnited States.</s>

en: Most enter the U.S. in or near Yuma, Arizona, and Del Rio, Texas.
sna: Vazhinji vanopinda muU.S. vari kana pedyo neYuma, mu Arizona, nepaDel Rio, kuTexas.
mt0: <pad> Most immigrants enter the United States in or near Yuma, Arizona, and Del Rio, Texas.</s>

en: Nicaraguans were stopped more than 16,000 times in March, more than double September's level.
sna: Zvizvarwa zvekuNicaragua zvakadziviswa kupinda muU.S.runokwana zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu muna Kurume, zvichiwedzera zvakapetwa ruviri huawndu hwemuna Nyamavhuvhu.
mt0: <pad> Nicaraguans vakamira pamusoro pemakore 16,000 mwedzi waMarch, zvakapetwa kaviri kubva muna September.</s>

en: The vast majority enter in South Texas.
sna: Ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa izvi runopinda nekuSouth Texas.
mt0: <pad> The vast majority enter in South Texas.</s>

en: Lifting Title 42 has proved controversial as midterm elections near, even for Biden's Democratic Party, amid concerns that the U.S. is unprepared for an anticipated increase in migrants seeking asylum.
sna: Kubvisa mutemo unonzi Title 42 kwakonera kukakatirana pamaonero sezvo pava pedo nenguva yesarudzo dzinoitwa pakati nepakati penguva yebato riri kutonga, zvichitobatawo musangano wavaBiden, unonzi Democratic Party, paine kushushikana kwekuti US haina kugadzirira kuwedzerwa kwekupinda kwevanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika vari kutsvaga hupoteri.
mt0: <pad> Lifting Title 42 yava kuita nyaya inopesana sezvo midterm elections dzakaramba, kunyange kuBiden's Democratic Party, pamusoro pekunetseka kuti United States haina kugadzirira kuwedzera kwevanhu vanotsvaga asylum.</s>

en: Authorities stopped migrants more than 221,000 times in March, the highest mark in 22 years.
sna: Vakuru vakadzivisa vauyi vekune dzimwe nyika Authorities kanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nerimwe munaKurume, hwuwamdu wakandisisa zvisati zvamboitika mumakore makumi maviri nemaviri.
mt0: <pad> Authorities blocked migrants more than 221,000 times in March, the highest mark in 22 years.</s>

en: The White House and Homeland Security Department have publicly stood behind the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's decision to end the measure because it could no longer be justified on grounds of protecting public health.
sna: Muzinda we White House neHomeland Security Department vakabuda pachena vachitsigira zvakaitwa ne bazi rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa nekuparareira kwezvirwere reCenters for Disease Control and Prevention rekumisa mutemo wekudzivisa kupinda kwezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika nekuti pakange pasisina chikonzero chaicho chakati tsvikiti chekuti mutemo uyu uramba uchishandiswa pasi pechengeteedza hutano hweveruzhinji.
mt0: <pad> The White House and Homeland Security Department vakazvipira kuCenters for Disease Control and Prevention's decision to end the measure because it could no longer be justified on grounds of protecting public health.</s>

en: But the practice of expelling Cubans and Nicaraguans runs counter to the administration's public statements that it was phasing out use of the pandemic powers to prepare for May 23.
sna: Asi tsika yekudzinga zvizvarwa zvekuCuba nekuNicaragua haienderane nezvinotaurwa nehurumende kune veruzhinji kuti yavakupeta kushandisa masimba ekudzivirira kutapukira kwedendamupengo ichigadzirira musi wa23 Chivabvu apo mutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kupedza kuva nesima.
mt0: <pad> But the practice of expelling Cubans and Nicaraguans runs counter to the administration's public statements that it was phasing out use of the pandemic powers to prepare for May 23.</s>

en: The U.S. has expelled migrants more than 1.8 million times under Title 42 authority since March 2020, effectively overriding rights to seek asylum under U.S. law and international treaty.
sna: U.S. yakadzinga vanhu vanoda kupinda vanoda kuzogaramo kanodarika  miriyoni nemazana masere pasi pemutemo unonzi Title 42 kubva munaKurume 2020, ichibva yatsikirira pasi kodzero dzevanhu vanotsaga hupoteri pasi putemo wemuU.S. uye nezvibvumirano zvakaitwa neUS nedzimwe nyika.
mt0: <pad> U.S. yakadzinga vanhu vanopfuura 1,8 million nguva pasi pesimba reChinyorwa 42 kubva muna March 2020, zviri kuipa kuti vanhu ava vanoedza kutsvaga asylum pasi peU.S. mutemo uye zvipikirwa zvepasi rese.</s>

en: In doing so, migrants are not subject to immigration law, which include rights to seek protection from persecution at home.
sna: Vapototeri havasi pasi pemitemo inoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu vekune dzimwe nyika, zvinosanganisirawo kodzero yekutsvaga hupoteri kubva pakushungurudzwa kumusha kwavo.
mt0: <pad> Saka, vatorwa havabatsiri mitemo yekupinda munyika, inosanganisira kodzero dzekufuna kudzivirirwa kubva pakudzvinyirira kwavari kumusha.</s>

en: The administration said in court filings that it began processing more Central American adults under immigration laws after the CDC's announcement on April 1.
sna: Mumapepa ayaipawo divi rayo mumatare edzimhosva, hurumende yakati yakatanga kutarisa mapepa evanhu vakuru vaida kupinda muAmerica vachibva kuCentral America pasi pemutemo wezvekupinda munyika kwezvizvarwa zvinobva kune dzimwe nyika mushure memashoko akaturwa neCDC musi wa1 Kubvumbi.
mt0: <pad> The administration said in court filings that it began processing more Central American adults under immigration laws after the CDC's announcement on April 1.</s>

en: But a federal judge in Louisiana ruled last week that it couldn't start unwinding Title 42 while it was still in effect.
sna: Asi mutongi wematare edzimhosva  mudunhu reLouisiana akatonga svondo rakapera kuti CDC yaisagona kutanga kupeta mutemo weTitle 42 asi iwo uchiri kushana.
mt0: <pad> Asi a federal judge in Louisiana akatonga vhiki rapfuura kuti nyika yacho haina kukwanisa kubvisa Title 42 sezvo iri mubasa.</s>

en: U.S. District Judge Robert Summerhays strongly criticized the CDC's decision, suggesting he would try to keep Title 42 in effect after May 23.
sna: Mutongi wedare reU.S. District  Robert Summerhays vakatsoropodza zvikuru zvakaitwa neCDC, akati aozogona kuti mutemo unonzi Title 42 urambe uchishanda musi was 23 Cchivabvu wadarika.
mt0: <pad> Judge Robert Summerhays akakurudzira CDC kuti iite zvainge zviri kuitirwa, achiti aida kuedza kudzivirira Title 42 inoshanda kubva musi waMay 23.</s>

en: A hearing is scheduled May 13 for oral arguments.
sna: Dare rakapa musi was 13 Cchivabvu kuti mativi ari kukwikwidzana munyaya iyi ature nemashoko emuromo zvikonzero zvinotsigira divi ravo.
mt0: <pad> A hearing is scheduled for May 13 for oral arguments.</s>

en: Marisa Limon, senior director of advocacy and planning at the Hope Border Institute, said advocates began learning about expulsions of Cubans and Nicaraguans from El Paso on Monday and later confirmed the new practice with U.S. officials.
sna: Marisa Limon, mukuru anoona nezverwira kodzero nekuronga mafambisirwo ebasa pasangano rinonzi Hope Border Institute, akati vamiririri vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakatanga kuziva said advocates began nezvekudzinga kwezvizvarwa zvekuCuba nekuNicaragua kubva kuEl Paso nemusi weMuvhuro uye kwava kuzosimbisa nevakuru veUS kuti hurongwa hutsva uhwu ndewe chokwadi.
mt0: <pad> Marisa Limon, senior director of advocacy and planning at the Hope Border Institute, said advocates began learning about expulsions of Cubans and Nicaraguans from El Paso on Monday and later confirmed the new practice with U.S. officials.</s>

en: Limon said the administration is "trying to get every last bit out of Title 42" before it expires.
sna: Limon akati hurumende iri "kukokota musaririrwa wese kubva muTitle 42" mutemo uyu usati wapera simba rawo.
mt0: <pad> Limon akati hurumende "iri kuedza kuwana zvese zvaikwanisika kubva muChinyorwa 42" pamberi pekuguma kwayo.</s>

en: She called it "sobering" but consistent with the administration's efforts to have other countries in the Western hemisphere take more responsibility for hosting people fleeing their homes.
sna: Akati "zvinochangamutsa" asi zvinoenderana nezvirikuedzwa nehurumende kuti dzimwe nyika dziri kumavirira dziriite basa radzowo rekugamuchira vanhu vari kutiza misha yavo kune dzimwe nyiaka.
mt0: <pad> She called it "sobering" but consistent with the administration's efforts to have other countries in the Western hemisphere take more responsibility for hosting people fleeing their homes.</s>

en: Mexico Relocates Migrant Camp; Haitians Appear at Border
sna: Mexico Inoshandura nzvimbo ine kamba yevapoteri; Zvizvarwa zveku Haiti zvinoerekana zvava pamuganhu wenyika
mt0: <pad> Mexico Relocates Migrant Camp; Haitians Appear at Border</s>

en: Mexican authorities said Tuesday they have relocated a migrant camp that sprung up in a park in the border city of Reynosa, moving about 2,000 people from Central America and Haiti to a shelter in the city, across the border from McAllen, Texas.
sna: Vakuru vekuMexico vakati neChipiri kuti vakange vabvisa kamba yevapoteri yakange yangonyuka mubindu rekutandarira muguta re Reynosa iro riri pamuganhu wenyika iyi, ndokubvisa vanhu vangasvike zviuru zviviri vari zvizvarwa zvekuCentral America neHaiti kune mumwe musasa uri muguta iri, riri pamuganhu ennyika yeAmerica rakatarisana neguta reMcAllen, kuTexas.
mt0: <pad> Mexican authorities said Tuesday they have relocated a migrant camp that sprung up in a park in the border city of Reynosa, moving about 2,000 people from Central America and Haiti to a shelter in the city, across the border from McAllen, Texas.</s>

en: The camp of migrants mainly from Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras and Haiti sprung up after U.S. officials, citing the pandemic, invoked a health rule that denies migrants a chance to seek asylum.
sna: Musasa uyu wevapoteri vazhinji vavo vachibva kuGuatemala, El Salvador, Honduras and Haiti wakanyuka mushure mekunge vakuru vekuU.S., vachipa zvikonzero zvedendamupengo, vakashandisa mutemo wezvehutano uyo unorambidza vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika kuti vatsage hupoteri muAmerica.
mt0: <pad> Camp of migrants mainly from Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras and Haiti started after U.S. officials, citing the pandemic, invoked a health rule that denies migrants the chance to seek asylum.</s>

en: Mexico's National Immigration Institute said the migrants were taken around midnight Monday to the shelter, which it said will have better hygiene and food services.
sna: Asangano remu Mexico rinoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika reNational Immigration Institute rakati zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika idzi vakatorwa panguva dzepakati pehusiku musi weMuvhuro kune mumwe musasa unehutsanana nekudya kuri nani.
mt0: <pad> Mexico's National Immigration Institute said the migrants were taken to the shelter around midnight Monday, which it said will have better hygiene and food services.</s>

en: But on Monday, people in another border city, Nuevo Laredo, said hundreds of migrants, mainly Haitians, have streamed into that city, which is across the border from Laredo, Texas
sna: Asi nemusi weMuvhuro, vanhu mune guta riri pamuganhu reNuevo Laredo, vakati mazana ezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika, vazhinji vachibva kuHaiti, vakaita mudungwe vakananga muguta iri, iro rakatarisana which neguta reAmerica rinonzi Laredo riri muTexas.
mt0: <pad> But on Monday, residents in another border city, Nuevo Laredo, said hundreds of migrants, mainly Haitians, have streamed into that city, which is across the border from Laredo, Texas.</s>

en: The rush apparently started after the U.S. began processing some asylum-seekers there.
sna: Chipatata pata ichi chinenge chakatanga mushure mekunge U.S. yatanga kupa mapepa ehupoteri iri muguta iri.
mt0: <pad> Zvinoita sekuti vanhu vakawanda vakatanga kuenda kunharaunda iyi mushure mekunge United States yakatanga kugadzirisa vamwe vanotsvaga asylum-seekers ikoko.</s>

en: The Catholic bishop of Nuevo Laredo said Monday that migrant shelters there are overcrowded, with some migrants sleeping outside in tents.
sna: Bhishopu wekereke yeRoman Catholic  muguta reNuevo Laredo neMuvhuro vakati misasa vezvizvarwa zvekunze zvakange zvakawandirwa zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika dzichitorara kunze kwematende.
mt0: <pad> Mukuru wekereke yeCatholic muNuevo Laredo akati nemusi weChipiri kuti nzvimbo dzekuchengetera migrants dzakazara, uye vamwe vanhu vari kurara panze mumatende.</s>

en: Bishop Enrique Sanchez Martanez said migrants started streaming into Nuevo Laredo in late April, though the city isn't usually popular among migrants, in part because it is dominated by the violent Northeast drug cartel.
sna: Bhishopu Enrique Sanchez Martanez vakati zvizvarwa izvi zvakatanga kuita mudungwe zvichipinda muNuevo Laredo mkupera kwaKubvumbi, kunyangwe hazvo guta iri risinganyanyofarirwe nevanhu vekune dzimwe nyika, chimwe chikonzero chiri chekuti rinotongwa neboka rezvigeven'a rekumaodzanyemba kwakadziva kumabvazuva enyika uko zvinogadzira nekutengesa zvenodhaka nezvinokora kunze kwemutemo.
mt0: <pad> Bishop Enrique Sanchez Martanez said migrants began streaming into Nuevo Laredo in late April, though the city isn't usually popular among migrants, in part because it is dominated by the violent Northeast drug cartel.</s>

en: It is new for us because this is the last place they come, due to the conditions of our border, of our city, which are sometimes adverse for migrants, the bishop said.
sna: Izvi zvitsva kwatiri nekuti ino ndiyo nzvimbo yekupedzeseresa yavangada kuuya kwairi, nekuda kwemamiriro akaita muganhu wenyika yedu, guta redu, zvinoita kuti risaite kuti zvizvarwa zvekunze zvigadzikane mariri, vakadaro Bhishopu ava.
mt0: <pad> It's new for us, because this is the last place they come, due to the conditions of our border, of our city, which are sometimes adverse for migrants, the bishop said.</s>

en: "But since they opened the door in the United States to asylum requests, a lot of them came in large groups."
sna: "Asi nekuti America yazarura gonhi kune vari kutsvaga hupoteri , zvizvarwa zvekunze izvi zvakauya muhuwandu hwazvo zviri mumapoka."
mt0: <pad> "Asi kubva pavakavhura rimwe racho muUnited States kuti vakumbire asylum, vazhinji vavo vakauya mune zvikamu zvizhinji."</s>

en: Marvin Ajic, the director of the Casa Nazareth shelter, said that around April 16, Mexican authorities notified the shelters that the United States would resume processing asylum claims for humanitarian reasons.
sna: Marvin Ajic, mukuru wemusasa unochengeta vanhu unonzi, Casa Nazareth, akati musi 16 Kubvumbi vakuru veku Mexico vakaudza vmasangano anoita zvemisasa kune vapoteri kuti United States yaizozanga zvakare kutarisa zvikumbiro zvekutsvaga hupoteri nechikonzero chekunzwira ngoni kuvanhu vari vari kutambura.
mt0: <pad> Marvin Ajic, director of the Casa Nazareth shelter, said that around April 16, Mexican authorities notified the shelters that the United States would resume processing asylum claims for humanitarian reasons.</s>

en: The U.S. had begun allowing more people in, especially Central American adults, to prepare for lifting Title 42 a pandemic-era health rule that denies migrants a chance to enter the U.S. seek asylum on May 23.
sna: U.S. yakange yatanga kutendera vanhu vakawanda kuti vapinde munyika, zvikuru sei vanhu vabvezera vekuCentral America, ichigadzirira kubviswa kwemutemo unonzi Title 42 ”mutemo wakavambwa munguva dzedendamupengo unorambidza zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika mukana wekupinda mu U.S. dzichitsvaga hupoteri.
mt0: <pad> U.S. yainge yatanga kubvumira vanhu vakawanda kupinda, kunyanya vakuru veCentral America, kuti varambe vachigadzirira kubvisa Title 42, a pandemic-era health rule inorambidza migrants kuwana nzvimbo yekupinda muU.S. kutsvaga asylum musi waMay 23.</s>

en: But a federal judge in Louisiana ruled last week that the government could not unwind the rule before the end date.
sna: Asi mutongi wedare mudunhu reLouisiana akatonga kuti hurumende yakange isingagone kutanga kupeta mutemo uyu musi wekupera basa rawo usati wasvika.
mt0: <pad> Asi a federal judge in Louisiana akatonga vhiki rapfuura kuti hurumende haina kukwanisa kubvisa mutemo uyu pamberi pezuva rekupedzisira.</s>

en: The (Mexican) immigration officials organized things with the shelters, and the plan was to send people who had been waiting a long time, without any checks, basically anyone, Ajic said.
sna: Vakuru vezvekupinda nekubuda munyika yeMexico vakaronga kushanda nevanopa misasa kune vasina pekugara, uye hurongwa hwazovapo ndewekutumira vaya vakange vagara nguva yakarebesa pasina kunyatsoongorora kuti ndiani, zvichireva kuti ani naani zvake, akadaro Ajic.
mt0: <pad> (Mexican) immigration officials organized things with the shelters, and the plan was to send people who had been waiting a long time, without any checks, basically anyone, Ajic said.</s>

en: That apparently drew the attention of other migrants, including Haitians.
sna: Izvi ndizvo zvakakwezva zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekune dzime nyika, kusanganisira zveku Haitiu.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinonzi zvakakurudzira vamwe vatorwa, kusanganisira vaHaitian.</s>

en: In September, similar rumors sparked a rush by about 15,000 mostly Haitian refugees to the Texas border, where they camped under a bridge.
sna: Muna Chikunguru, guhwa rakafana neriri rakakonzera chipata pata chevapoteri vaisvika kuzviuru gumi nevashanu, vazhinji vavo vari vekuHaiti vakananga kumuganhu uri kuTexas, uko vakazvikoisa musasa wavo pasi pezambuko rerwizi.
mt0: <pad> In September, rumours similar to this sparked a rush by about 15,000 mostly Haitian refugees to the Texas border, where they camped under a bridge.</s>

en: U.S. officials began large scale deportations of Haitians while also allowing thousands to remain in the U.S.
sna: Vakuru veku U.S. vakatanga kudzorera vanhu vekuHaiti vazhinjisa kumusha asi ichitenderawo zviuru kuti zvirambe zviri muU.S.
mt0: <pad> U.S. officials began large scale deportations of Haitians while also allowing thousands to remain in the U.S.</s>

en: Ajic warned migrants against coming to the border, noting the risks.
sna: Ajic akayambira kuti zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika dzisauye kumuganhu wenyika, achiti zvine njodzi.
mt0: <pad> Ajic akachenjera migrants kuti vasapinda muganho, achitaura pamusoro pengozi.</s>

en: On Monday, Mexico's National Immigration Institute said that so far this year, it has pulled the bodies of 19 immigrants from the Rio Grande, also known as the Rio Bravo.
sna: NeMuvhuro bazi rezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu muMexico, reNational Immigration Institute rakati parizvino mugore rino, rakange ranyurura zvitunha gumi nezvipfumbamwe kubva murwizi rwunonzi Rio Grande, ruchizivikanwawo nekunzi Rio Bravo.
mt0: <pad> On Monday, Mexico's National Immigration Institute said that so far this year, it has pulled the bodies of 19 immigrants from the Rio Grande, also known as the Rio Bravo.</s>

en: New US Rule Grants Automatic Work Permit Extensions to Noncitizens
sna: Mutemo mutsva wemuUS Unotendera kuwedzerwa kwemvumo yekushanda kuvanhu vasiri vagari vemunyika iyi
mt0: <pad> New US Rule Grants Automatic Work Permit Extensions to Noncitizens</s>

en: U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) announced Tuesday that it would automatically extend for 360 days the work permits of immigrants who applied to renew their work authorization amid the current backlog in processing times.
sna: Bazi rinoona nezvekupinda, kubuda nekugara mu U.S. re U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) rakatura mashoko neChipiri ekuti rakange rawedzera nemazuva mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu  pasina kuongorora kuti munhu anokedzera here atsamaba anotendera vanhu kushanda muAmerica kuvanhu vese vakanyorera kuti vapihwe mvumo ipo paine dambudziko rekuti basa rekugadzirisa tsamba dzemvumo idzi rasarira kumashure saka pane mapepa akawanda asati atariswa.
mt0: <pad> USCIS yakataura nemusi weChipiri kuti ichaita kuti mapepa ebasa evanangwa kugara muUnited States avo vakashandisa mapepa ebasa aripo kwemazuva 360, zvichikonzerwa nekuti vanhu vanoedza kunyoresa kuti vawedzere mapepa ebasa avo.</s>

en: The new notice expands on the 180-day extension USCIS announced in November.
sna: Chiziviso chitsva ichi chiri kuwedzera pane mamwe mazuva zana nemakumi masere ekuwedzera akaziviswa neUSCIS miunaMbudzi.
mt0: <pad> Zvirevo izvi zvitsva zvinowedzera 180-day extension USCIS yakatangaza munaNovember.</s>

en: It is expected to prevent about 260,000 immigrants from losing their work permits in the next 18 months.
sna: Zviri kutarisirwa kudzivirira zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvinosvika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kuti zvisarasikirwe netsamba dzinozvitendera kushanda muAmerica kwemwedzi gumi nemisere inotevera.
mt0: <pad> Zvinofungidzirwa kuti izvozvo zvichengetedze 260,000 immigrants kubva pakuraswa kwezvimvumo zvavo zvebasa mumakore 18 anotevera.</s>

en: It will also give the agency extra time to clear applicants waiting in line, the agency said in a statement.
sna: Bazi iri rakati izvi zvinozoripawonguva yakawedzerwa yekuti rigone kupedzisa kugadzirisa mapepa evanhu vakanyorera avo vachakamirira vari pamutsetse.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinopawo nzvimbo yekuita mabasa ehurumende uye nguva yekugadzirisa vanhu vari kumirira, agency in a statement said.</s>

en: The extension, which takes effect Wednesday, aims to stabilize operations for U.S. employers and help people with pending employment authorizations who have a job and are working in the U.S.
sna: Kuwedzerwa kwenguva uku kuchatanga kusha neChitatu , kuchitarisirwa kudzikisa nekudzikamisa kuita basa kwevashandi vemuAmerica uye nekubatsira vachakamirira tsamba dzinovabvumuidza kushanda vakatowana mabasa uye vachitoshanda muU.S.
mt0: <pad> The extension, which comes into effect Wednesday, aims to stabilize operations for U.S. employers and help people with pending employment authorizations who have a job and are working in the U.S.</s>

en: USCIS is the agency in charge of handling the nation's immigration paperwork.
sna: USCIS ndiro bazi rine basa rekutarisa mapepa evanhu vekune dzimwe nyika vanopinda nekubuda munyika.
mt0: <pad> USCIS ihurumende inotungamira mapepa emapepa enyika yeUnited States.</s>

en: In recent years, it has struggled with backlogs, an issue made worse by the COVID-19 pandemic and budget shortfalls.
sna: Mumakore achangodarika bazi iri ranga richitatarika nekutarisa nebasa rakawandisa  remapepa aifanirwa kunge akaitwa kare, izvo zvakazowedzerwa nedenda reCOVID-19 uye nekushomeka kwemari yakange yaiswa parutivi kuti ibatsire pabasa iri.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe mumakore achangopfuura, yaiva nenyaya yekutadza kuita zvinhu, dambudziko rakakonzerwa neCOVID-19 pandemic uye mari shoma.</s>

en: In April, Jaddou told U.S. government officials during a congressional hearing that USCIS had 8.5 million pending immigration cases, including those seeking green cards and U.S. naturalization.
sna: Muna Kubvumbi, Jaddou akaudza hurumende yeU.S. achibvunzwa nevamiririri veparamende yemuAmerica kuti USCIS yakange iine mapepa evanhu vaida kupinda muAmerica aisvika mamiriyoni masere nezviuru mazana mashanu asati atariswa , kusanganisira avo varikuda tsamba yekuti vanzi vava vagari vemuAmerica neavo varikuda kuti vanzi vava vagari vemunyika iyi vaine kodzero sedzezvizvarwa zvemo.
mt0: <pad> April, Jaddou told U.S. government officials during a congressional hearing that USCIS had 8.5 million pending immigration cases, including those seeking green cards and U.S. naturalization.</s>

en: She said more than half of those pending cases were taking longer than the agency's normal processing times.
sna: Akati huwandu hunodarika zviri pakati nepakati hwemapepa anoda kutariswa aya ari kutora nguva yakareba kudarika inositorwa nebazi iri painogadzirisa mapepa emutowo uyu.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe izvozvo zvinoita kuti nyaya dzacho dzitore nguva yakareba kupfuura nguva yacho inoshandiswa nehurumende.</s>

en: Asylum-seekers, immigrants adjusting their status to permanent residence and other noncitizens going through the U.S. immigration process are among the noncitizens affected by the latest work authorization extension.
sna: Vanhu varikutsvaga hupoteri, zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika dziri kuda kushandura kuti dzive vanhu vanogara munyika zvachose vari pakati pevamwe vasati vava vagari vemunyika vari vaya vakakanganiswa nekuwedzerwa kuchangoitika kwenguva yekugadzirisa mapepa anotendera vanhu kushanda.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe usambokwanisa kuita izvi, taura kuti hauzivi</s>

en: The agency had reported that processing times for asylum applicants looking to renew work permits increased from seven months in 2017 to 11 months in 2021.
sna: Bazi iri rakange rataura kuti nguva yekugadzirisa mapepa evari kutsvaga hupoteri vari kuda kuvandudza mapepa anovatendera kushanda yakawedzera kubva pamwedzi minomwe muna 2017 kusvika kumwedzi gumi nemumwe muna 2021.
mt0: <pad> The agency had reported that processing times for asylum applicants looking to renew work permits increased from seven months in 2017 to 11 months in 2021.</s>

en: In March, USCIS announced a program to reduce backlogs, including the expansion of premium processing for certain applications where applicants could pay a higher fee to expedite paperwork processing.
sna: Muna Kurume, USCIS yakazivisa hurongwa hwekuderedza huwandu hwemapepa asati atariswa, zvaisanganisira kuwedzerwa kwekukoshesa kugadzirisa kwemamwe mapepa ayo varidzi vawo vakange vakagadzirira mubhadhara mari yakawanda kuitira kuti mapepa avo agadziriswe nekukasira.
mt0: <pad> In March, USCIS yakataura pamusoro pekuregeredza nzvimbo dzakawandisa, kusanganisira kuwedzera kwepremium processing yezvimwe zvikumbiro apo vanoshandisa vaigona kubhadhara mari yakawanda yekukasira mapepa avo kuti vakwanise kugadzirisa zvinhu zvavo.</s>

en: According to the USCIS, most of the announced changes simply restore options offered before the Trump administration's slowdown of USCIS processing and before the COVID-19 pandemic further slowed the agency's resources.
sna: Zvichibva mune zvakataurwa neUSCIS, shanduko zhinji dzakaziviswa dzinongodzorera mikana yekusarudza yaivepo hurumende yaitungamirirwa vanaTrump isati yatanga kunonotsa nekuderedza mashandiro eUSCIS ekugazirisa mapepa uyewo denda reCOVID-19 risati raderedza mashandiro nezvekushandisa zvebazi iri.
mt0: <pad> Zvinoenderana neUSCIS, vazhinji vezvigadziridzwa zvakaziviswa ikozvino vanodzokorora sarudzo dzakaitwa pamberi pekuita kweUSCIS uye pamberi peCOVID-19 pandemic izvo zvakare zvakaderedza USCIS masimba.</s>

en: For several years, USCIS has been in a precarious financial situation that has impaired the efficient completion of caseloads.
sna: Kwemakore akati kuti, USCIS yanga iri kumawere chaiko pane zvemari zvakaitadzisa kuti ipedzese basa remapepa anoda kutariswa nekukasira.
mt0: <pad> Sezvinenge makore akati wandei, USCIS yave iri munyaya dzakaoma dzemari izvo zvakakanganisa kukwanisa kuita zvinhu zvinodiwa nevanhu.</s>

en: The COVID-19 pandemic exacerbated these challenges in 2020, in addition to a hiring freeze and furlough threat leading to workforce attrition and severely reduced capacity.
sna: Denda reCOVID-19 rakawedzera matambudziko aya muna 2020, pamusoro pekumiswa kwekupa vanhu mabsa nedambudziko revanhu vaitora zororo kubva pabasa zvakawedzera pakushomeka kwevashandi nekuderedzwa kwekugona kuti basa riitwe.
mt0: <pad> COVID-19 pandemic yakakonzera izvi zvikuru mu2020, pamwe chete nehiring freeze uye furlough threat inotungamirira kuvanhu vanobva mubasa uye kukwanisa kwakaderera zvakanyanya.</s>

en: In 2021, before USCIS could recover from these fiscal and operational impacts, there was a sudden and dramatic increase in EAD (Employment Authorization Document) initial and renewal filings, according to the USCIS statement.
sna: USCIS yakati zve muna 2021, isati yambopora kubva pakukuvadzwa pane zvemari nekutadziswa kunyatsoita basa rayo, pakazongoerekana zvisingatarisirwe pava nekuwedzera kwemapepa emakambani ayikumbira mvumo yekupa mabasa kuvashandi, mamwe ari ekekutanga, mamwewo ari evaida kuti mvumo iyi iwedzerwezve, inonzi EAD  zvinomiririra  kuti Employment Authorization Document.
mt0: <pad> In 2021, pamberi peUSCIS kubva pakugadzirisa izvi zvikonzero zvemari uye mabasa, kwaiva nekuwedzera kukuru kweEAD (Employment Authorization Document) initial uye renewal filings, maererano neUSCIS statement.</s>

en: The USCIS historically has been underfunded because most of the agency's funding comes from application fees that have stalled at $5 billion a year since 2019.
sna: USCIS kubva kumakare yagara ichishanda nemari isingakwanire basa rainoita, nekuti mari inoshandiswa nebazi iri inobva kumari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu vane mapepa arikuda kugadziriswa iyo yakangoramba yakamhara *pamri inosvika mabhiriyoni mashanu pagore kubva mugore ra2019.
mt0: <pad> USCIS yakaramba iri pasi pemari sezvo mari inobva ku application fees yava nemabhiriyoni mashanu anopfuura $5 billion a year kubvira muna 2019, uye izvi zvakaramba zviripo.</s>

en: What Is the US-Launched 'Uniting for Ukraine' Program?
sna: Chirongwa chakaturwa neUS chinonzi "Kubatana kuitira" chimbori chii?
mt0: <pad> What Is the US-Launched 'Uniting for Ukraine' Program?</s>

en: U.S. President Joe Biden recently announced the Uniting for Ukraine program, which aims to streamline the process for Ukrainians who have fled their country and are seeking safety in the United States.
sna: Mutungamiriri weUS mumazuva achangopfuura vakazivisa chirongwa chinonzi kubatana Kuitira Ukraine, kana kuti Uniting for Ukraine, chine donzvo rekubatanidza basa rose rekubatsira zvizvarwa zvose zveku Ukrainezvakatiza nyika yazvo uye zviri kutsvaga kuchengetedzwa nehupoteri mu United States.
mt0: <pad> U.S. President Joe Biden achangobva kutanga Uniting for Ukraine, inoedza kuita kuti zvinhu zviite nyore kune Ukrainians avo vakatama nyika yavo uye vari kutsvaga kuchengetedzeka muUnited States.</s>

en: The new program, which took effect Monday, will complement existing legal pathways available to those fleeing Russian aggression due to the ongoing Russia-Ukraine crisis, Biden administration officials said.
sna: Vakuru mumahofisi ehurumende yavaBiden vakati chirongwa ichi chitsva, icho chakatanga kushanda musi weMuvhuro, chichatsigira nzira dzemutemo dziripo kuitira avo vari kutiza chisimba chiri kushandiswa neRussia nekuda kwedambudziko riri kuitika pakati peRussia neUkraine crisis.
mt0: <pad> The new program, which began on Monday, will complement existing legal pathways available to those fleeing Russian aggression due to the ongoing Russia-Ukraine crisis, Biden administration officials said.</s>

en: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) will continue to provide relief to the Ukrainian people, while supporting our European allies who have shouldered so much as the result of Russia's brutal invasion of Ukraine, Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas said in a statement to reporters on April 21.
sna: Bazi rehurumende yeU.S. rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati menyika reDepartment of Homeland Security (DHS) richaramba richipa zvekubatsira kuvanhu vekuUkraine, asi tichitsigirawo madzisahwira edu ekuEurope, avo vakatakura zvakawanda pamafudzi avo nekuda kwekupinda neganyavhu vehutsinye kweRussia munyika yeUkraine, Gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati kweAmerica kana kuti Homeland Security, Alejandro Mayorkas akaudza vatapi venhau musi wa21 Kubvumbi.
mt0: <pad> U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) icharamba ichiita kuti vanhu veUkraine vawane rubatsiro, uyewo kuteerera shamwari dzedu dzekuEurope dzinobatsira nyika yeUkraine, Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas akataura mumapepanhau musi wa21 April.</s>

en: What is Uniting for Ukraine?
sna: Chii chinonzi kubatana kuitira Ukraine?
mt0: <pad> What is Uniting for Ukraine?</s>

en: The program allows U.S. citizens and residents to sponsor Ukrainian refugees under different immigration statuses.
sna: CNN yakatura nhau dzekuti chirongwa ichi chinotendera zvizvarwa nevagari vemuU.S. kuti vatsigire vapoteri vekuUkraine vari muzvikwata zvakasiyana siyana maringe nekuti mapepa avo ekutenderwa kugara muAmerica anoti chii.
mt0: <pad> The program allows U.S. citizens and residents to sponsor Ukrainian refugees under different immigration statuses.</s>

en: The online portal, open to potential sponsors or organizations, is accepting applications and has received more than 4,000 requests so far, CNN reported.
sna: Nzvimbo yepamadandemutande epamatotonjere, yakazurukira vanhu nemasangano angade kutsigira, iri kugamuchira zvikumbiro zvekubatsira uye yakatogamuchira zvikumbiro zvinodarika zviuru zvina parizvino.
mt0: <pad> Online portal, yakavhurika kune vanhu vanogona kutora nzvimbo kana makambani, iri kubvuma ma application uye yakapihwa zvikumbiro zvinodarika 4,000 kusvika zvino.</s>

en: Who qualifies under the program?  Ukrainians, or an immediate family member of a Ukrainian citizen.
sna: Ndiani anokodzera kupinda muchirongwa ichi? Zvizvarwa zvekuUkraine kana hama yepedyo yechizvarwa cheku Ukraine.
mt0: <pad> Ndivanaani vanokwanisa pasi pepurogiramu? Ukrainians, kana kuti mhuri yakakura yeumwe Ukrainian.</s>

en: They must have a U.S. sponsor and have been a resident of Ukraine as of February 11.
sna: Vanofanirwa kunge vaine chizvarwa chemuU.S. chinovatsigira uye vange vachigara muUkraine kubva musi wa11 Kukadzi.
mt0: <pad> Vanofanira kuva ne sponsor yeUnited States uye ava mugari weUkraine kubva munaFebruary 11</s>

en: What are the requirements?
sna: Chii chinodikanwa?
mt0: <pad> Zvinodiwa ndezvipi?</s>

en: They must pass security checks including a fingerprint and an FBI name check and biographic and biometric screening and meet public health requirements, such as having the proper vaccinations, before entering the U.S.
sna: Vanofanirwa kutariswa kuti havana njodzi ine zvekuchengetedzeka kwenyika yavangaunze, zvichisanganisirawo kutariswa kuti minwe yavo haina kumbobata pakaparwa mhosva here, kutariswa zita nebazi riongorora kuparwa kwemhosva muAmerica reFBI uye kuongororwa kwezve kwavakakurira nezvavaita zvakare nekuongororwa hunhu, matauriro, inzwi senzira kuda kuziva kuti munhu akaita sei uyewo kugutsa zvinotarisirwa pane zvehutano zvakaita kunge munhu akawana mishonga inodzivirira zvirwere asati apinda mu U.S. here
mt0: <pad> Vanofanira kupfuura maongororo ekuchengetedzeka kusanganisira thumbprint uye FBI name check uye biographic and biometric screening uye kukwanisa zvinodiwa zvehutano hwevanhu, sekuita kuti vawane mapiritsi akafanira, vasati vasvika United States.</s>

en: Those approved will be allowed to travel to the U.S., be considered for humanitarian parole on a case-by-case basis, stay in the country for two years, and apply for work permits.
sna: Vanenge vapasiswa vanozotenderwa kuenda kuU.S., vagoiswa pachirongwa chekubatsirwa nezvinhu zvekuti vagone kurarama asi pasi pechirongwa chekuti munhu nemunhu anenge achitariswa kuti angabatsire sei vagogara muAmerica kwemakore maviri uye vachigona kunyorera matsamba anovagonesa kushanda.
mt0: <pad> Vanotenderwa vachakwanisa kuenda kuUnited States, uye vanozotariswa kuti vawane ropafadzo yevanhu vakawanda, rambai vari munyika kwemakore maviri, uye anofanira kunyorera mapepa emvumo yekuita mabasa.</s>

en: The United States strongly encourages Ukrainians seeking refuge in the United States who do not have and are not eligible for a visa to seek entry via Uniting for Ukraine from Europe.
sna: Chinyorwa chakabva kuDHS chakati United States inokurudzira zvakasimba zvizvarwa zvekuUkraine zviri kutsvaga kupotera kuUnited States vasina kna kuti vasingakodzere kuwana matsamba anovatendera kupinda nekugara muAmerica kuti vaedze kupinda vachishandisa chirongwa che Kubatana Kuitira Ukraine chekuEurope.
mt0: <pad> United States inokurudzira zvakanyanya Ukrainians seeking refuge in the United States who do not have and are not eligible for a visa to seek entry via Uniting for Ukraine from Europe.</s>

en: This will be the safest and most efficient way to pursue temporary refuge in the United States, a DHS statement said.
sna: Iyi ndiyo inenge iri nzira yackanyanyochengetedzeka ichishanda zvakanakisa yekutsvaga hupoteri hwechinguva muUnited States.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvichava nzira yakachengeteka uye inonyanya kushandisika yekutsvaga nzvimbo yekuchengetedzeka kwenguva duku muUnited States, a DHS statement said.</s>

en: Who qualifies as a sponsor?
sna: Ndiani anokodzera kutsigira nemari?
mt0: <pad> Ndivanaani vanokwanisa kuva sponsor?</s>

en: U.S. citizens and other residents who hold lawful status in the United States or who are beneficiaries of Deferred Enforced Departure, Temporary Protected Status, or Deferred Action, among others.
sna: Zvizvarwa zvemuU.S. nevamwe vagari vagere zviri pamutemo muUnited States kana vakapinzwa pachirongwa chekukumisa kumanikidzwa kubuda muAmerica nechisimba kana kuti Deferred Enforced Departure, vari pasi pekuchengetedzwa kwechinguva nehurumende inodaidzwa kuti Temporary Protected Status, uyewo avo zvinofanirwa kuitwa kwavari maringe nekuburitswa muAmerica zvakambomiswa indaidzwa kuti Deferred Action, nezvimwewo zvirongwa zvakawanda.
mt0: <pad> U.S. citizens and other residents who hold lawful status in the United States or who are beneficiaries of Deferred Enforced Departure, Temporary Protected Status, or Deferred Action, among others.</s>

en: Sponsors will be required to prove they can financially support the refugee while they are in the U.S.
sna: Vaye vanotsigira nemari vachange vachitarisirwa kuti vape humboo hunoratidza kuti vanogona kutsigira nemari mupoteri paanenge achiri U.S.
mt0: <pad> Sponsors will be required to prove they can financially support the refugee while they are in the U.S.</s>

en: They also need to pass security and background vetting "to protect against exploitation and abuse."
sna: Vanofanirwawo kunge vaonekwa kuti havana zvipomerwa pane zvekuchengetedzeka kwenyika nekuparwa kwemhosva kuti vachengetedze vapoteri pakubatwa zvisina kunaka kana kushandiswa nenzira isina mwero vachibatirirwa.
mt0: <pad> Vanofanirwawo kupfuura ongororo yekuchengetedzeka uye background vetting "kuitira kudzivirira kubva mukushandiswa uye kushandiswa."</s>

en: The Ukrainian applicant will receive authorization only after everything is verified, including that the sponsor has the means to support them while they are in the U.S.
sna: " Mukumbiri wekuUkraine anozogamuchira mvumo mushure mekunge zvinhu zvese zvaongororwa zvikapasiswa, zvinosanganisira kuti mutsigiri wemari ane goneso yekumubatsira apo anenge achigara muU.S.
mt0: <pad> The Ukrainian applicants will receive an authorization only after everything is verified, including that the sponsor has the means to support them while they are in the U.S.</s>

en: Who is not eligible for parole under the program?
sna: Ndiani asingakodzere kupinda pachirongwa chekubatsirwa ichi?
mt0: <pad> Who is not eligible for parole under the program?</s>

en: Ukrainian citizens already in the U.S. are not eligible for parole under Uniting for Ukraine.
sna: Zvizvarwa zvekuUkraine zvagara zvitori muU.S. hazvikwane kugamuchira kubatsirwa pasi peKubatana Kuitira Ukraine.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe usamboziva kuti Ukrainian citizens already in the U.S. are not eligible for parole under Uniting for Ukraine.</s>

en: However, they can apply for Temporary Protected Status, which is another form of humanitarian relief that allows people to legally stay and work in the U.S.
sna: Zvisineyi, vanogona kunyorera kupinzwa pachirongwa chevanhu vakachengetedzwa kwechinguva kana kuti Temporary Protected Status, inotova imwe nzira yekuwana rubatsiro panguva yekuomerwa iyo inotendera vanhu kuti vagare vachishanda muAmerica zviri pamutemo.
mt0: <pad> Zvisinei, vanogona kushandisa Temporary Protected Status, imwe nzira yekubatsira vanhu inobvumira vanhu kuti vagarire uye vashandire zvakanaka muUnited States.</s>

en: What about those arriving at the U.S.-Mexico border?
sna: Koo chii chinoitwa kune avo vari kusvikira pamuganhu weU.S. neMexico?
mt0: <pad> Zvii nezvavaya vanopinda muU.S.-Mexico border?</s>

en: Citing safety issues, U.S. officials have urged Ukrainians not to travel to Mexico in hopes of entering the United States.
sna: Vachipa zvikonzero zvine chekuchengetedzeka kwevanhu, vakuru muhurumende yeU.S. vakurudzira zvizvarwa zvekuUkraine kuti zvisaende kuMexico zviine taririsiro yekupinda muUnited States.
mt0: <pad> U.S. officials have urged Ukrainians not to travel to Mexico in hopes of entering the United States.</s>

en: In addition, U.S. Customs and Border Protection has no place to hold them while they go through the Uniting for Ukraine vetting process.
sna: Pamusoro pazvo, Bazi rinoona zvezvekupinda kwezvinhu nekuchengetedzwa kwemiganhu yenyika reU.S. Customs and Border Protection harina nzvimbo yekuti vange vachigara panguva yavanenge vachiongoroorwa pasi pechirongwa cheKubatana Kuitira Ukraine kuti vaoonekwe kuti vangatenderwa kupinda muAmerica here.
mt0: <pad> In addition, U.S. Customs and Border Protection haina pekugara ivo panguva yavanopinda muUnited for Ukraine vetting process.</s>

en: Since Uniting for Ukraine's launch on Monday, Ukrainians who arrive at U.S. ports of entry without a valid visa or without preauthorization to travel to the United States through the Uniting for Ukraine program will be denied entry and told to apply to the program.
sna: Kubva zvakaparurwa Kubatana Kuitira Ukraine neMuvhuro, zvizvarwa zveku Ukraine zvinosvika panzvimbo dzekupinda muU.S. zvisina mapepa ekutenderwa kupinda nekugara munyika kana imwe mvumo yazvakafanopihwa zvisati zvauya kuti zvipinde nekugara muUnited States pasi pechirongwa che Kubatana Kuitira Ukraine, zvicharambirwa mvumo yekupinda munyika zvigoudzwa kuti zvinyorere kuchirongwa ichi zvichikumbira mvumo.
mt0: <pad> Kubva pazuva rekutangazve kweUniteding for Ukraine neChipiri, Ukrainians vanopinda U.S. ports of entry without a valid visa or without preauthorization to travel to the United States through the Uniteding for Ukraine program will be denied entry and told to apply to the program.</s>

en: Biden officials hope this will curb the number of Ukrainian migrants seeking humanitarian parole along the border.
sna: Vakuru muhurumende yava Biden vane tariro yekuti izvi zvichadzikisa huwandu hwezvizvarwa zvekuUkraine zviri kutsvaga kubatsirwa pamiganhu yeUS.
mt0: <pad> Biden officials hope this will curb the number of Ukrainian migrants seeking humanitarian parole along the border.</s>

en: Those at the border must apply under the rules of Uniting for Ukraine, meaning they must have a qualifying sponsor or a non-government agency willing to sponsor them in the U.S. for up to two years.
sna: Avo vari pamuganhu wenyika vanosungirwa kunyorera pasi pezviga zveKubatana Kuitira Ukraine, zvichireva kuti vanofanirwa kunge vatove nemunhu akakodzera anezenge achivabtsira nemari pakugara kwavo muUS kana sangano risiri rehurumende rakazvimirira roga rakazvipira kuvabatsira nemari vachigara muUS kwenguva inosvika makore maviri.
mt0: <pad> Vanogara pachitsuwa vanofanira kunyorera pasi pezvirevo zveUnited for Ukraine, zvinoreva kuti vanofanira kuva nemushandira anokwanisa kana nzvimbo isina hurumende inogadzirira kuedza kuvachengeta muUnited States kwemakore maviri.</s>

en: And they need to have all required vaccinations and pass background checks.
sna: Uye vanofanirwa kunge vaine tsamba dzinoratidza kuti vakabaiwa mishonga inodzivirira zvirwere uye nekunge vakaongororwa nhorondo yavo nebazi rezvekuongora kutyorwa kwemutemo.
mt0: <pad> Vanofanira kuita zvese zvinodiwa vaccinations uye kupfuura background checks.</s>

en: The Biden administration announced the private sponsorship initiative as another way the U.S. hopes to achieve President Biden's commitment to welcome up to 100,000 Ukrainians displaced by the Russian military invasion.
sna: Hurumende yavaBiden yakazivisa chirongwa chekubatsira nezvemari ichi chinoitwa nevanhu kana masangano akazvimiririra seimwe nzira iyo U.S. inotarisira kuzadzikisa kuzvipira kwavaBiden kuti vagamuchire zvizvarwa zvekuUkraine zvinosvika zviuru zana zvakabviswa kumusha nekupinda kweRussia muUkraine neganyavhu remauto.
mt0: <pad> The Biden administration announced the private sponsorship initiative as another way the U.S. hopes to achieve President Biden's commitment to welcome up to 100,000 Ukrainians displaced by the Russian military invasion.</s>

en: As of Thursday, almost 5.4 million refugees have since left Ukraine, according to U.N. data.
sna: Kusvikira musi weChina, vanhu vangasvike mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana vakange vatiza muUkraine, sekuongororwa kwakaitwa huwandu uhwu neU.N.
mt0: <pad> As of Thursday, almost 5.4 million refugees have since left Ukraine, according to U.N. data.</s>

en: Report: Rwanda Should Ease Restrictions On 2003 National Elections - 2001-10-30
sna: Nhau: Rwanda Inofanirwa Kurerutsa Zvishwe Zvakaiswa PaSarudzo Dzenyika Dzemuna 2003
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe usambokwanisa kuita izvi, taura kuti hauzivi</s>

en: In 2003 Rwanda will hold its first national elections since the 1994 genocide.
sna: Muna 2003 Rwanda ichave nesarudzo dzenyika dzekutanga kubva zvapondwa zviuru nezviuru munyika iyi.
mt0: <pad> In 2003 Rwanda will hold its first national elections since the 1994 genocide.</s>

en: A new report says the government of Rwanda needs to relax its control over public life if the polls are to have any credibility.
sna: Zvakabuda muchinyorwa chitsva zvinoti hurumende yeRwanda inofanirwa kunyevenutsa kubata nechishwe kwayakaita zvinogona kuitwa neveruzhinji muhupenyu hwavo kana sarudzo idzi dzichizova nechiremera.
mt0: <pad> A new report says the government of Rwanda needs to relax its control over public life if the polls are to have any credible.</s>

en: There was relief when the Rwandan Patriotic Front seized power in Rwanda in 1994, ending the genocide in which about 800,000 minority Tutsis and moderate Hutus were killed.
sna: Pakava nekutura befu rekudzikama apo bato reRwandan Patriotic Front rakabvuta masimba ekutonga muRwanda muna 1994, zvichibva zvapedza kupondwa kwevanhu kwakasiya kwauraya zviuru zvisere zverudzi rwechiTutsi urwo rwunevanhu vashoma nevamwe verudzi rwechiHutu vakange vasinga wirirane nekupondwa kwemaTutsi.
mt0: <pad> Kune ropafadzai paRwandan Patriotic Front yakabata ushe muRwanda muna 1994, kupedza genocide in which about 800,000 minority Tutsis and moderate Hutus were killed.</s>

en: The new military government promised to restore democracy to Rwanda via elections in 2003.
sna: Hurumende itsva yemauto iyi yakavimbisa kudzorera pakare kutonga kwegutsaruzvinji muRwanda kuburikidza nesarudza muna 2003.
mt0: <pad> The new military government promised to restore democracy in Rwanda via elections in 2003</s>

en: That process began in March this year, with district elections.
sna: Basa iri rakatanga muna Kurume gore rino, paine sarudzo dzemumatunhu.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvichitevera nyaya yacho, izvi zvakatanga muna March gore rino, pamwe chete neelection yedistrict.</s>

en: Senior analyst Francois Grignon, of the International Crisis Group, a Brussels-based policy research organization, says he was disappointed with the district poll.
sna: Francois Grignon, mukuru anoona nezvekuongora  muInternational Crisis Group, sangano rinonzvera nzira nemakwara anoitwa nawo basa  rine muzinda waro muBrussels kuBelgium, anoti akagumburwa nesarudzo dzemumatunhu.
mt0: <pad> Francois Grignon, a senior analyst of the International Crisis Group, a policy research organization in Brussels, said he was disappointed with the district poll.</s>

en: Mr. Grignon says the process was so tightly controlled that he maintains no genuine opposition candidates were allowed to stand.
sna: Grignon anoti basa iri rakange rakasungwa chishwe zvekuti hapana nhengo dzemapato anokwikwidza echokwadi akatenderwa kupinda musarudzo idzi.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Grignon says the process was so tightly controlled that he maintains no genuine opposition candidates were allowed to stand.</s>

en: There was a screening and there was a preparation of the elections, which did not allow other candidates than those who had been rubber-stamped by the government to actually contest, especially for the executive positions within the local authorities, he says.
sna: Anoti iye, "Pakange paine kuongorora vanokwikwidza nekugadzirira sarudzo idzi, zvakange zvisingatendere vamwe vanhu vaida kukwikwidza vakange vasiri nhengo dzakange dzatenderwa nehurumende kuti dzikwikwidze, zvikuru sei pazvinzvimbo zvekutonga mumadhorobha nematunhu.
mt0: <pad> Kune screening uye kugadzirira sarudzo, izvo zvakarambidza vamwe vakundi kunze kwevaya vakanyorwa nehurumende kuti vaite zvekukwikwidza, kunyanya mabasa ekuti aite basa rekurukota mumataundi emaguta, anodaro.</s>

en: "If consensual democracy means that the political debate is actually handled before the electoral contest in such a way that it does not lead to a real competition then there is no democracy at all."
sna: Kana gutsaruzhinji rinobva pakuwirirana ichireva kuti kuonesana panhaurirano dzakasiyana pamusoro pezvematongerwo dzinoitwa zuva rekusarudzo dzichiitwa nenzira yekuti panenge pasina kukwikwidzana kusvinu pakati penhengo dzemapato akasiyana , zvinenge zvichirevazve kuti hapana gutsaruzhinji."
mt0: <pad> "Kana democracy inoreva kuti political debate inogadziriswa pamberi pekuita sarudzo nenzira isina kuendesa kune chaizvo competition, then there is no democracy at all."</s>

en: In a new report, titled Consensual Democracy in Post Genocide Rwanda, the International Crisis Group urges the international community to pressure Rwanda's government to liberalize political activity.
sna: Muchinyorwa chitsva chine zvakabuda mutsvakurudzo dzayakaita, chinonzi Gutsaruzhinji Rekubvumirana MuRwanda Yemushure Mekupondwa Kwemhomho Dzevanhu, kana kuti Consensual Democracy in Post Genocide Rwanda, musangano weInternational Crisis Group unokurudzira nyika dzepasi rose kuti dzisunde hurumende yeRwanda kuti isunungure nekutendera zviitikom nehurongwa hwezvematongerwo.
mt0: <pad> In a new report, titled Consensual Democracy in Post Genocide Rwanda, the International Crisis Group urges the international community to pressure Rwanda's government to liberalize political activity.</s>

en: The report notes that the military dominates public life and there is little open criticism of the government, either in the media or by opposition figures.
sna: Chinyorwa ichi chinoti mauto ndiwo ane izwi rinonyanya kunzwikwa mune zvinoitika muhupenyu hweveruzhinji uye pane kutsoropodza kushoma kunoitwa zviri pachena pamusoro pehurumende, mungava munhezvekutapwa kwenhau kana kuti zvichibva kuvanhu vanokwikwidzana nehurumende mune zvematongerwo.
mt0: <pad> The report notes that the military dominates public life and there is little open criticism of the government, either in the media or by opposition figures.</s>

en: The Rwanda government argues that allowing a range of opinions would be dangerous in a country struggling to come to terms with its bloody past.
sna: Hurumende yeRwanda inotiwo kutendera maonero akasiyana siyana pane zvematongerwo kunogona kuunza njodzi munyika ichiri kutatarika nekugamuchira nhorondo yayo yekudeurwa kweropa zhinji.
mt0: <pad> Ruwanda rinoti kubvumira maonero akasiyana-siyana kunenge kwakaipa munyika inoedza kugadzirisa kare yaro yakaipa.</s>

en: But Mr. Grignon says dissent is simply being driven underground or outside Rwanda's borders.
sna: Asi Grignon anoti maonero asingawirirane neehurumende ari kungomanikidzirwa kuti aitwe neginin'ini munzvimbo dzakavanzikana kana kuti zvavakutoirwa kunze kwemiganhu yeRwanda.
mt0: <pad> Asi Mr. Grignon says dissident movements are simply being driven under the ground or outside Rwanda's borders.</s>

en: Opponents to the regime have to flee the country or to join in rebel movements outside the country or in the Congo and no chance to express a different view, he says.
sna: Vanokwikwidzana nehurumende vanototiza vachibuda munyika kana kunobatana nezvikwata zvevapanduki zviri kunze kwenyika kana kuCongo uye hapana mukana wekutaura maonero akasiyana, anodaro.
mt0: <pad> Opponents of the regime have to flee the country or join rebel movements outside the country or in the Congo and no chance to express a different view, he says.</s>

en: "All the good policies that the government has been implementing - including the organization of the elections, national elections, presidential and parliamentary, in 2003 - will lack the credibility because they were not implemented in an environment that actually allowed a fair contest to take place," he says.
sna: "Hurongwa hwose hwakanaka hwanga huchiitwa nehurumende , kusanganisira kugadzirira nekurongedza hurongwa hwesarudzo dzenyika, emutungamiri wenyika neevamiririri vedare reparamende, muna 2003 - achange asina chiremera nekuti hange asina kuitwa mumamiriro ezvinhu aitendera kuti pave nekukwikwidza kune kuenzanisira kuti kuitike," anotaura achidaro.
mt0: <pad> "Zvinhu zvose zvakanaka zvaiitwa nehurumende - kusanganisira kugadzira sarudzo, sarudzo dzemunyika, presidential uye parliamentary, 2003 - zvichashaya credibility nokuti izvi hazvina kuitirwa munyaya inobvumira kuti sarudzo dziite zvinodiwa," anodaro.</s>

en: Mr. Grignon says greater freedom of expression would strengthen Rwanda's reconciliation process and enhance its chances of a peaceful future.
sna: Grignon anoti kuwedzerwa kukusununguka pakutaura zvinofungwa nevanhu kwaizosimbisawo basa reRwanda rekuyananisa vanhu nekuwedzera mikana yekuwumba ramangwana rine runyararo.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Grignon says freedom of expression in Rwanda would strengthen the process of reconciliation and enhance its chances of a peaceful future.</s>

en: He says the international community's involvement in reconstruction projects gives it the leverage to make this plain to the Rwandan government.
sna: Anoti kupindira nekubatsira kwenyika dzepasi rese mumabasa ekuvandudza nekuvakazve nyika yeRwanda kunodzipa simba rekutaudza izvi pachena kuhurumende yeRwanda.
mt0: <pad> Zvino, akapa kuti vanhu vanobva kunze kwenyika vakawanda vaiita mabasa akasiyana-siyana ekuvaka Rwandan economy.</s>

en: Rwanda Welcomes the Arrest of Former Rebel Leader
sna: Rwanda Inogamuchira Kusungwa Kweaimbova Mukuru Wevapanduki
mt0: <pad> Rwanda welcomes the arrest of former rebel leader</s>

en: Rwandas Justice Minister said his government is pleased with the arrest Monday of a former rebel leader accused of masterminding genocide and violating human rights against Rwandans and Congolese villagers in 1994.
sna: Gurukota rezvemutemo muRwanda vakati hurumende yavo iri kuafdzwa nekusungwa nemusi weMuvhuro kweaimbove mukuru wevapunduki achipomerwa mhosva you kuronga kupondwa kwevanhu vazhinjisa  uye kutyora kodzero dzevanhu vekuRwanda nekuCongo muna 1994.
mt0: <pad> Rwanda's Minister of Justice said his government is pleased with the arrest Monday of a former rebel leader accused of masterminding genocide and violating human rights against Rwandans and Congolese villagers in 1994.</s>
