en: French authorities arrested Callixte Mbarushimana, a former leader of the infamous Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda (FDLR), an ethnic Hutu rebel group.
sna: Vakuru vekuFrance vakasunga Callixte Mbarushimana, uyo akambove mukuru wechikwata chaive chevanhu verudzi rwechiHutu chaive nembiri yehun'an'a, chainzi Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda (FDLR).
mt0: <pad> French authorities arrested Callixte Mbarushimana, a former leader of the notorious Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda (FDLR), a Hutu rebel group.</s>

en: Tharcisse Karugarama welcomed the decision of French authorities to enforce the international arrest warrant issued by his government and the International Criminal Court (ICC) against the former rebel leader.
sna: Tharcisse Karugarama wakagamuchira zvakaitwa nevakuru vekuFrance kushandisa masimba echikumbiro chekuti akambove mutungamiriri wevapanduki uyu chero kunyika kwaanenge abatwa ari chakaiswa nehurumende yeRwanda nedare renyika zhinji dzepasi rose rinotonga nyaya dzehugeven'a.
mt0: <pad> Tharcisse Karugarama akafarira chiziviso cheFrance chekushandisa warrant yekubata inobva kunyika dzakasiyana-siyana yakasainwa nehurumende yake uye International Criminal Court (ICC) pamusoro pevaimbove mukuru wehondo.</s>

en: It is good news that Callixte Mbarushimana has been (arrested) by the French judicial authority.
sna: Inhau dzakanaka idzi dzekuti Callixte Mbarushimana azosungwa nevanoona nezvemutemo vemuFrance.
mt0: <pad> Zvinofadza kuti Callixte Mbarushimana akachengetwa (akapihwa) neFrench judicial authority.</s>

en: Good news in the sense that, first, there was an international arrest warrant against him issued by the Rwandan government in respect of (the alleged) act of genocide committed in Rwanda in 1994.
sna: Nhau dzakanaka nekuti, motsi, pakange paine chikumbiro chakaiswa kunyika dzese pamusoro pake kuti asungwe chakaiswa nehurumende yeRwanda nekuda kwepomerwa mhosva yekukonzeresa kupondwa kwevanhu vazhinjisa muRwanda muna 1994.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvinhu zvakanaka ndezvinoti, pakutanga, pakanga paine warrant yekubata kwaari yakaitwa neRwandan government pamusoro pe(the alleged) act of genocide committed in Rwanda in 1994.</s>

en: Karugarama said the Hague-based court sought the arrest of the former rebel leader who was believed to be hiding in France.
sna: Karugarama akati dare redzimhosva iro rinemuzinda waro muHague, kuSwitzerland, rakaronga kusungwa kweuyu aimbove mukuru wevapanduki aifungidzirwa kuti akange akahwanda muFrance.
mt0: <pad> Karugarama said the Hague-based court wanted to arrest the former rebel leader, who was believed to be hiding in France.</s>

en: Genocide memorial in Rwanda
sna: Chirangaridzo Chekupondwa Kwevanhu muRwanda
mt0: <pad> Genocide memorial in Rwanda</s>

en: The International Criminal Court (ICC) conducted its own investigation about his other activities and they found sufficient evidence to support the charge of war crimes and crimes against humanity perpetrated in the DRC and they issued an arrest warrant, which the French judicial authorities have executed.
sna: Dare renyika zhinji dzepasi rose rinoongorora kuparwa kwemhosva dzehugeven'a reInternational Criminal Court (ICC) rakaferefeta rega pamusoro pemamwe mabasa ake uye rikawana humbowo hwakakwana hunotsigira kupomerwa kwake mhosva dzehondo dzaakapara uye nemhosva dzehugeven'a pamusoro pevanhu dzakaparwa munyika yeDRC, naizvozvo vakatura chikumbiro chekusungwa kwake, icho vakuru vemuFrance vakazozadzikisa.
mt0: <pad> The International Criminal Court (ICC) yakaongorora mabasa ake uye vakawana zvakakwana zvairatidza kuti nyaya yehondo uye nyaya dzakapesana nevanhu vakaitwa muDemocratic Republic of Congo dzinoenderana nezviito zveICC uye vakabudisa warrant yekubata, izvo zvinonzi French judicial authorities have executed.</s>

en: The Hague-based court accused Mbarushimana and other rebels in the FDLR of using violence against unarmed civilians as their main tool in a campaign to forcefully obtain political power for the rebel group.
sna: Dare iri rine muzinda waro muHague rakapomera Mbarushimana nevamwe vapanduki veFDLR kushandisa chisimba chaikuvadza vagariwo zvavo vakange vasina zvombo senzira yavo huru yekuedza kuti vawanire boka revavapanduki iri masimba ezvematongorwo enyika.
mt0: <pad> Mbarushimana uye vamwe vapanduki veFDLR vakapomerwa mhosva yekushandisa simba pamusoro pevanhu vasina simba sechinhu chikuru muhondo yavo yekutsvaga kutora masimba ehurumende yeboka revatsvangi.</s>

en: According to the ICC, "as a result of this deadly blackmail (by the FDLR rebels), victims were killed, raped, and forcibly displaced, and entire villages were razed to the ground."
sna: Zvichienderana nezvakaturwa ne ICC, "nekuda kwekuedza kuwana zvavaida nehukoronyera nechikiribidi zvakaitwa  nevapanduki veFDLR, vanhu vakaurayiwa, vakabatwa chibharo, kumanikidzwa kuti vatize kwavaigara uye misha yakaparadzwa ikasiiwa rangova ivhu."
mt0: <pad> ICC inoti, "sezvo izvi zvakauraya vanhu, vakaita kuti vakadzidze, uye vakamanikidza kuenda kunzvimbo dzose, misha yakazara yakaparadzwa pasi.</s>

en: Karugarama said Mbarushimana and his FDLR rebel forces played a pivotal role in the countrys 1994 genocide in which hundreds of thousands of people were killed.
sna: Karugarama akati Mbarushimana nemasoja ake evapanduki veFDLR vakaita chikamu chikuru mukuurayiwa kwevanhu vazhinji munyika muna 1994 apo zviuru zvemazana evanhu vakapondwa.
mt0: <pad> Karugarama said Mbarushimana and his FDLR rebel forces played a pivotal role in the country's 1994 genocide in which hundreds of thousands of people were killed.</s>

en: We believe that, in the next couple of weeks after due process has taken place in France, he should be able to be transferred to The Hague in the Netherlands to face charges and be prosecuted for war crimes and crimes against humanity committed within the territory of the DRC.
sna: Tinotenda kuti, mumasvondo mashoma ari kutevera, mushure mekunge zvese zvinifanirwa kutevedzerwa pamutemo zvaitwa muFrance,  achange achitamiswa kuenda ku The Hague kuNetherlands kuti anozvidavirira mhosva dzaari kupomerwa agochichiswa nemhosva dzehondo nemhosva dzekukuvadza nekuuraya vanhu dzaakaparwa munyika yeDRC.
mt0: <pad> Tinotenda kuti, mumavhiki maviri ari kuuya, mushure mekuitwa kwakarurama muFrance, anofanira kukwanisa kuendeswa kuThe Hague muNetherlands kuti ave mhosva uye abvunzurudzwe pamusoro pezviito zvehondo uye zviito zvinopesana nevanhu zvakaitwa mukati menyika yeDemocratic Republic of Congo.</s>

en: The Justice Minister also said Kigali will be cooperating with the International Criminal Court in the imminent prosecution of Mbarushimana.
sna: Gurukota rezvemutemo iri rakatiwo Rwanda ichange ibatirana neInternational Criminal Courtmukuchuchiswa nekukurumidza kwaMbarushimana.
mt0: <pad> Mukuru wedare reParamende akataurawo kuti Kigali iri kuita basa rakaoma neInternational Criminal Court mukuedza kwaiitwa Mbarushimana.</s>

en: British, French Foreign Ministers to Re-Invigorate DRC Peace Process - 2002-01-33
sna: Makurukota Ezvekunze ekuBritain neFrance Vchakuchidzira Basa Rekuunza Runyararo MuDRC
mt0: <pad> British, French Foreign Ministers to Re-Invigorate DRC Peace Process - 2002-01-33</s>

en: The British and French foreign ministers travel to the Democratic Republic of Congo Monday to kickoff a three-day, four-nation tour of the troubled region of Central Africa.
sna: Makurukota Ezvekunze ekuBritain neFrance ari kuenda kuDemocratic Republic of Congo neMuvhuro vachitanga kushana kwemazuva matatu kunyika ina dziri mudunhu risina kugadzikana reCentral Africa.
mt0: <pad> British and French foreign ministers travel to the Democratic Republic of Congo Monday to kickoff a three-day, four-nation tour of the troubled region of Central Africa.</s>

en: The mission will be jointly led by British Foreign Secretary Jack Straw and his French counterpart Hubert Vedrine.
sna: Rwendo rebasa uru rwuchange rwuchitungamirirwa negurukota rezvekunze kweBritain Jack Straw neanoita basa rimwechetero kuFrance Hubert Vedrine.
mt0: <pad> The mission will be led by British Foreign Secretary Jack Straw and his French counterpart Hubert Vedrine.</s>

en: They will be visiting the Democratic Republic of Congo, Rwanda, Burundi and Uganda.
sna: Vachange vachishanyira Democratic Republic of Congo, Rwanda, Burundi neUganda.
mt0: <pad> Vanoenda kuDemocratic Republic of Congo, Rwanda, Burundi and Uganda.</s>

en: Their primary objective is to breathe new life into the peace process in the war-torn Congo.
sna: Chinangwa chavo chikuru kufemera hupenyu hutsva kubasa rekuunza runyararo kunyika yasakadzwa nehondo yeCongo.
mt0: <pad> Vanoedza kuita izvi kuti vawedzere nzira itsva yekugadzirisa rugare muCongo yakatambura nehondo.</s>

en: Specifically, the British and French want to see the withdrawal of foreign troops who back the Congolese government (n Kinshasa, demobilization of rebels who occupy more than half the country, and peace talks to end the conflict.
sna: Chikuru kuru, Britain neFrance dziri kuda kubviswa mauto ekunedzimwe nyika anotsigira hurumende DRC) nekuisiswa zvombo pasi kwevapanduki avo vanotonga chikamu chiri pakati nepakati chenyika uye ne nhaurirano dzerunyararo kuti dzipedze gakava nehondo.
mt0: <pad> Zvikuru sei, Britain neFrance vanoda kuti mapoka ehondo enyika dzakawanda anobatsira hurumende yeCongolese (n Kinshasa, kuderedza simba kwevapanduki vanogara munyika inenge hafu, uye kuita mashoko emaregerero ekutungamira kuregerera hondo.</s>

en: British Foreign Secretary Straw said the mission also has a broader goal of making sure the Congo does not become another Afghanistan.
sna: Gurukota rezvekunze muBritain Straw akati rwendo rwebasa urwu rwaivawo nedonzvo guru rekuona kuti Congo haizove imwe nyika yakasakadzwa nehondo nevapunduki seAfghanistan.
mt0: <pad> British Foreign Secretary Straw said the mission also has a broader goal of ensuring the Congo does not become another Afghanistan.</s>

en: The 11th of September has made it much more urgent that we take earlier action against failed, and failing states, he said.
sna: Zuva remusi wa 11th Gunyana (apo nyika yeAmerica yakarwiswa nevanhu vakapfeka mabhomhu vanhu vazhinji vakaurayiwa zvivakwa zvikuru zvika wisirwa pasi) raita kuti zvikoshe zvikuru kuti titore matanhu nekukasira kuekugadzirisa nyika dzirikukonewa kana dzakatokonewa kukuzvotonga nenzira inounza runyararo nekugadzikana.
mt0: <pad> 11 September yaita kuti zvive zvakanyanya kukosha kuti tiite chinhu nhanho-nhanho pamusoro penyika dzakakundikana, uye dzinenge dzichikundikana, akadaro.</s>

en: In Kinshasa, the ministers will meet Congolese President Joseph Kabila.
sna: MuKinshasa, makurukota aya achasangana nemutungamiriri weCongo Joseph Kabila.
mt0: <pad> In Kinshasa, the ministers will meet Congolese President Joseph Kabila.</s>

en: He took power one year ago, after his father, President Laurent Kabila, was assassinated by one of his bodyguards.
sna: Akapinda pachigaro gore rakapera, mushure mekunge baba vake, President Laurent Kabila, apfurwa akafa nemumwe wechengetedzi vavo.
mt0: <pad> He took power a year ago, after his father, President Laurent Kabila, was assassinated by one of his bodyguards.</s>

en: Their next stop will be Kigali for talks with Rwandan President Paul Kagame, and the leader of the Rally for Congolese Democracy rebels, Adolphe Onusumba.
sna: Vabva uku vachazoenda kuKigali kunota hurukuro nemutungamiriri weRwanda, President Paul Kagame, nemutungamiriri webato revapanduki reCongolese Democracy rebels, Adolphe Onusumba.
mt0: <pad> Vanobva Kigali, Rwanda, kuti vaite mazungumzo naPresident Paul Kagame, uye mukuru weRally for Congolese Democracy rebels, Adolphe Onusumba.</s>

en: The ministers will make a brief visit to Burundi to discuss that country's civil war with President Pierre Buyoya.
sna: Makurukota aya achashanya kwenguva pfupi kuBurundi kuti vanokurukura nemutungamiriri wayo Pierre Buyoya pamusoro pehondo yekusawirirana kwezvizvarwa zvemo.
mt0: <pad> The ministers will make a short visit to Burundi to discuss the country's civil war with President Pierre Buyoya.</s>

en: The tour will end in Uganda, where meetings are scheduled with President Yoweri Museveni and Jean-Pierre Bemba, who leads the Movement for the Liberation of Congo guerrillas.
sna: Kushanya uku kuchapeterwa kuUganda, umo kwarongwa misangano nemutungamirir wenyika Yoweri Museveni naJean-Pierre Bemba, uyo anotungamirira varwi veMovement for the Liberation of Congo.
mt0: <pad> The tour will end in Uganda, where meetings are scheduled with President Yoweri Museveni and Jean-Pierre Bemba, who leads the Movement for the Liberation of Congo guerrillas.</s>

en: UNICEF Pushes for Demobilizing Child Soliders Near Africa's Great Lakes
sna: UNICEF Inosunda kuti masoja evana vadiki aisiswe zvombo pasi mudunhu reAfrica rinonzi Great Lakes
mt0: <pad> UNICEF Inoedza Kuti Vana Varambe Vaita Basa Near Africa's Great Lakes</s>

en: The United Nations children's agency, UNICEF, is pushing for child soldiers to be demobilized in Africa's Great Lakes region, as several peace drives there build momentum.
sna: Bazi rezvemubatanidzwa wentika dzepasi rose rinoona nezvevana rinonzi UNICEF, riri kusunda kuti masoja evana vadiki vaitwe kuti vaise zvombo pasi vasiyane nehupenyu hwechiuto mudunhu remuAfrica rinonzi Great Lakes, panguva iyo hurongwa hwekutsvaga runyararo hwava pazvidanho zvepamusoro.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF, iro shirika reUnited Nations revana, riri kuedza kuti vana vakuru vafana vabviswe muhondo munyika yeGreat Lakes yeAfrica, sezvo mabasa emarere ekugadzirisa rugare ari kukura.</s>

en: The agency says funding is in place to help the children leave the military and restart their lives.
sna: Bazi iri rinoti mari yakatovepo yekubatsira vana ava kusiya zvechiuto vagovamba hupenyu hwavo patsva.
mt0: <pad> Agencies says mari inoshandiswa kuitira kuti vana ava vakwanise kubva muhondo uye kutangazve mabasa avo.</s>

en: UNICEF's top child protection official, Manuel Fontaine, says peace initiatives in Uganda, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda are making it possible to get more children under the age of 18 out of fighting units.
sna: Mukuru weUNICEF anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevana, Manuel Fontaine, anoti matanho ekutsvaga runyararo muUganda, the Democratic Republic of Congo neRwanda arikuita kuti zvigoneke kuburitsa vana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemasere kubva muzvikwata zvinorwa hondo.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF's top child protection official, Manuel Fontaine, says peace initiatives in Uganda, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda are making it possible to get more children under the age of 18 out of fighting units.</s>

en: "We insist that child soldiers could be demobilized, even in conflict situations. We should never wait for peace to get children out of any form of armed group. But, obviously, that's a better timing at the moment. It's more conducive to demobilization," Mr. Fontaine said.
sna: "Tinotsinhidza kuti vana vari masoja vanofanirwa kusiiswa zvombo nekusiya hupenyu hwechiuto, kunyangwe munzvimbo dzine hondo. Hatifanirwe kumirira kuti pave nerunyararo kuti tibvisa vana muzvikwata zvevanhu vakapakata zvombo. Asi zviripachena kuti iyi ndiyo nguva yakanaka parizvino. Ine mamiriro akanaka anoita kuti zvive nyore kuti zvombo zviiswe pasi uye vana vasiye hupenyu hwechiuto," Fontaine akadaro.
mt0: <pad> "Tinoda kuti vana vavengi vabve muhondo, kunyange mumamiriro ezvinhu ehondo. Hatifaniri kumbolinda kuita izvi kuti vana vabude kubva munharaunda yehondo. Asi, zviri pachena, izvozvo zvinoenderana nekuti ndicho nguva yakanakisisa panguva ino.</s>

en: He says there are currently 1,200 child soldiers in Uganda, fighting mainly with the rebel Lord's Resistance Army.
sna: Anoti parizvino pane vana vari muchiuto chiuru nemazana maviri muUganda, vari kurwa vari muvapanduki veThe Lord's Resistance Army.
mt0: <pad> He says there are now 1,200 children soldiers in Uganda, fighting mainly with the rebel Lord's Resistance Army.</s>

en: He says that over the past 14 years, the group has abducted some 10,000 children, boys to fight and girls to serve as sex slaves.
sna: Anoti pamakore gumi nemana akapfuurachikwata ichi chakatora vana vanodarika zviuru zana nechisimba, vakomana kuti vave varwi, uye vasikana kuti dzive nhapwa dzavo dzavanobata chibharo pavadira.
mt0: <pad> He says that in the past 14 years, the group has abducted some 10,000 children, boys to fight and girls to serve as sex slaves.</s>

en: According to UNICEF, The Democratic Republic of Congo still has some 10,000 children recruited to fight, while Rwanda has up to 2,000 children involved in combat.
sna: Sekutaurwa kwazvinoitwa neUNICEF, nyika yeDemocratic Republic of Congo ichiine vana zviuru gumi vakapinzwa muchiuto kuti varwe, ukuwo Rwanda ine vana vanosvika kuzviuru zviviri vari kuridza gidi muhondo. combat.
mt0: <pad> Zvinoenderana neUNICEF, Democratic Republic of Congo inogara iine vana vanopfuura 10,000 vakashandiswa kurwa, uye Rwanda inogara iine vana vanopfuura 2,000 vakapinda muhondo.</s>

en: UNICEF says, even though some of the children do not directly engage in fighting, they are exposed to many dangers.
sna: UNICEF inoti, kunyangwe hazvo vamwe vevana ava vasingabva vabata pfuti vachirwa muhondo, vanoiswa mukati menjodzi dzakawanda.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF inoti, kunyange zvazvo vamwe vana havasi kuita basa rakaita kuti vabatanidzwe muhondo, ivo vanoiswa mumangozi akawanda.</s>

en: They may be used as porters, carrying very heavy loads, or as messengers or spies passing information and scouting out enemy territory.
sna: Vanoshandiswa savana mujibha, vachitakuriswa musengwa inorema, kana senhume  kana vasvori vanenge vachifambisa mashoko nekuongorora zviri kuitika mudunhu rinenge riine muvengi.
mt0: <pad> Vanogona kushandiswa seporters, carrying very heavy loads, or as messengers or spies, passing information and scouting out enemy territory.</s>

en: Sometimes, boys, but mainly girls, are used as sex slaves.
sna: Dzimwe nguva, vakomana, asi nyanye vasikana, vanoshandiswa senhapwa dzekufadza masoja makuru pane zvebonde.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe, boys, but mainly girls, are used as sex slaves.</s>

en: They are exposed to violence and HIV-AIDS and other sexually transmitted diseases.
sna: Vanoiswa munjodzi yekukuvadzwa, chirwere cheshuramatongo nedzimwe njovhera.
mt0: <pad> Vanoiswa utachiona uye HIV-AIDS uye mamwe matenda anopararira nemichina yebonde.</s>

en: The girls may become pregnant, making it harder for them to reintegrate into their communities.
sna: Vasikana vanobata pamuviri, zvobva zvanyanya kuvagozhera kuti vazodzokera kuva nhengo yemumisha yavakatorwa nevapanduki.
mt0: <pad> Vanasikana vanogona kuva nemimba, zvichiita kuti zviite zvakaoma kwavari kupinda zvakare mumagariro avo.</s>

en: UNICEF's Manuel Fontaine says demobilization takes time and money.
sna: Mushandi weUNICEF, Manuel Fontaine, anoti kuti vana vaisiswe zvombo nekusiya chiuto zvinotora nguva nemari.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF's Manuel Fontaine says demobilization takes time and money.</s>

en: He says the children must first be found, and then removed from their government or rebel units.
sna: Anoti chekutanga ndechekuti vana ava vanofanirwa vawanikwa kwavanenge vari, pedzezvo vozobviswa kubva mapoka ehurumende kana evapanduki mavanenge vari masoja.
mt0: <pad> He says vana ava vanofanira kutanga kuwanikwa, uye kubva kwavari kubviswa kubva muhurumende kana kuti mapoka ehondo.</s>

en: Then, resources are needed to help them rebuild their lives.
sna: Mushure mazvo, mari nezvimwe zvekushandisa zvinozodiwa kuvabatsira kuvaka huoenyu hwavo pakare.
mt0: <pad> Saka, zvinhu zvinodiwa kuti vawedzere kuvaka upenyu hwavo.</s>

en: That involves providing schools, vocational training and health care.
sna: Izvi zvinosanganisira kuvapa zvikoro, kudzidzira mabasa amaoko nekuti vabetserwa nezvehutano.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinosanganisira kupa schools,vocational training and health care.</s>

en: You do not want to stigmatize them and individualize them.
sna: Havafanirwe kusemwa kana kunongedzerwa.
mt0: <pad> Unofanira kuedza kuvaona sevanhu uye kuti uone kana uri munhu.</s>

en: They are basically going back to communities where there are a lot of other children, many of whom have suffered from consequences of war, even if they were not recruited.
sna: Zviri kuitika ndezvekuti vari kudzokera kumamisha kune vamwe vana vakawanda, vazhinji vavo vakakanganiswa nekuda kwehondo, kunyangwe hazvo vasina kuzotorwa kuitwa masoja.
mt0: <pad> Vanoenda kumisha yezvemhuri dzakawanda, uko kune vamwe vana, vakawanda vavo vakatambura nematambudziko ehondo, kunyange zvazvo vasina kushandiswa.</s>

en: So, you are trying to build services in those communities that are broad services, that would be made available to all those children, Mr. Fontaine said.
sna: Saka unenge uchiedza kuvaka zvinhu zvekushandisa, zvinogona kushandiswa nevana vose ava, akataura achidaro Fontaine.
mt0: <pad> Saka, uri kuedza kuvaka masevhisi mumagariro evanhu aya ari masevhisi anonyanya kushandiswa nevana ava, Mr. Fontaine akadaro.</s>

en: He says, unfortunately, the needed government institutions are not yet in place in some countries to move the process ahead quickly enough.
sna: Anoti, chakaipa ndechekuti, hapasati pava nemapazi ehurumende anofanirwa kunge aripo kuti aenderere nebasa iri pamberi nechimbi chimbi.
mt0: <pad> He says, zvisinei, mabasa ematare anodiwa haasati akaiswa munyika dzakawanda kuti zvinhu zvifambe nekukurumidza.</s>

en: He says that's why UNICEF is pressing to see such structures develop, so that children can get back home and start to lead normal lives once again.
sna: Anoti, ndicho chikonzero UNICEF iri kushingirira kuti pavakwe hwaro uhwu, kuitira kuti vana vagone kudzokera kumisha yavo vagotanga kurarama hupenyu hwamazuva ose zvakare sevamwe vana vezera ravo.
mt0: <pad> Saka UNICEF iri kuedza kuti zvinhu izvi zvigadzirwe, kuti vana vakwanise kudzokera kumusha uye kutanga kuvaka mabasa avo.</s>

en: Goma Residents Hopeful Rebel Withdrawal Spells Peace in Eastern Congo
sna: Vagari vekuGoma Vanetariro kuti kubuda kwevapanduki kuchaunza runyararo kudunhu rekumabvazuva reCongo
mt0: <pad> Goma Residents Hopeful Rebel Withdrawal Spells Peace in Eastern Congo</s>

sna: DRC inopomera vapanduki veM23 mhosva yekukanda mabhambu muRwanda
mt0: <pad> DRC Accuses Rebel M23 of Shelling Rwanda</s>

sna: Hapana panowanikwa zvenhau pakavhurwa parizvino
mt0: <pad> No media source currently available. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know</s>

sna: Vapanduki veM23 vabuda kubva munzvimbo dzavakange vatora kumabvazuva eCongo
mt0: <pad> M23 Rebels Withdrawing from Positions in E. Congo</s>

en: Tanzania Asks Uganda to Help It Mend Ties With Rwanda
sna: Tanzania inokumbira Uganda kubatsirwa kugadzirisa hukama hwayo neRwanda

en: Rwanda Accuses DRC of Firing Across Border

en: World Bank, Nike Team Up for 'The Girl Effect' Initiative

mt0: <pad> World Bank, Nike Team Up for 'The Girl Effect'</s>

en: The Adolescent Girls Initiative partners the World Bank, the Nike Foundation and governments of developing and developed nations to empower girls in poor countries.
sna: Chirongwa chevanasikana vachangoputudza che The Adolescent Girls Initiative chinobatana ne, Nike Foundation nehurumende dzenyika dzakasimukira nedzichiri kubusirira kuti dzipe masimba negoneso kuvasikana vari munyika dzisina kupfuma.
mt0: <pad> The Adolescent Girls Initiative inobatanidza World Bank, Nike Foundation uye mahurumende emanyika anobudisa uye akabudirira kusimudzira vakadzi munyika dzisina mari.</s>

en: The two-year-old program is helping girls in Asia, Africa and the Middle East gain the education and skills they need to transition into the workforce.
sna: Chirongwa ichi, chava nemakore matatu chichiitwa, chiri kubatsira vanasikana vari muAsia, Africa nedunhu reMiddle East kuti vawane kudzidza nehumwe humhizha hwavanoda kuti vagone kuyambuira mukuva vashandi.
mt0: <pad> Program inotora makore maviri iri kubatsira vakadzi muAsia, Africa uye Middle East kuti vawane mashoko uye mabasa anodiwa kupinda muchikwata chekushanda.</s>

en: My name is Sanchita.
sna: Zita rangu ndinonzi Sanchita.
mt0: <pad> My name is Sanchita.</s>

en: I come from a small village called Ishwarpur in Bangladesh, American actress Anne Hathaway delivered her lines as powerfully from behind a podium at the World Bank as she does on the silver screen, telling the story of an impoverished girl.
sna: Ndinobva mumusha mudiki unonzi Ishwarpur kuBangladesh, mukadzi anoita zvemitambo yemafirimu wekuAmerica, Anne Hathaway, akataura mashoko ake aya, nehunyanzvi nesimba ari  seri kwepanomira vanhu vachitaura muimba inoitirwa misangano kuWorld Bank,, sezvaanongoita kana achiita zvemafirimu anozobuda pazvivhitivhiti, achitaura rungano rwemwanasikana anorarama muhurombo.
mt0: <pad> I come from a small village called Ishwarpur in Bangladesh, American actress Anne Hathaway delivered her lines as powerfully from behind the podium at the World Bank as she does on the silver screen, telling the story of an impoverished girl.</s>

en: When a baby is born in Ishwarpur, families desperately hope it will be a boy, she continued.
sna: Anoenderera mberi achiti, kana mwana azvarwa muIshwarpur, mhuri dzese dzinenge dzichidokwairira kuti deno aita mukomana.
mt0: <pad> When a baby is born in Ishwarpur, families desperately hope it will be a boy, she continued.</s>

en: "It has been this way for as long as anyone can remember.
sna: "Zvagara zvakadaro kubva kumakare anagyeukwe naani zvake."
mt0: <pad> "Zvakaita izvi kwemakore ose, sezvo munhu anogona kukumbuka.</s>

en: It is believed that boys will contribute to the family income in a place where people are very poor.
sna: Zvinofungidzirwa kuti vanakomana vanozobetsera pakuunza mari kumhuri inogara munzvimbo iyo vanhu vageremo vari varombo chose.
mt0: <pad> Zvinofungidzirwa kuti vanakomana vachaita kuti mhuri iwane mari munyika yavanhu vakawanda vanogara nerombo rakaderera.</s>

en: These circumstances are familiar to those who benefit from the Adolescent Girls Initiative.
sna: Mamiriro ezvinhu aya anozivikanwa nevose vanobetserwa neAdolescent Girls Initiative.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvinozivikanwa kune avo vanobhadhara kubva kuAdolescent Girls Initiative.</s>

en: Who benefits?
sna: Ndiani anobatsirwa?
mt0: <pad> Ndivanaani vanobudirira?</s>

en: A dozen such teenage girls and young women visited the World Bank from developing Asian, Middle Eastern and African countries.

mt0: <pad> A dozen such teenage girls and young women visited the World Bank from developing Asian, Middle Eastern and African countries.</s>

en: They were just a few of the girls who benefit from training and education programs that help them transition from school to employment.
sna: Vaingove vashoma vevanasikana vanobetserwa nezvirongwa zvehumhizha hwamaoko nekudzidza zvinovabatsira kuti vayambukire kubva kuchikoro vachitanga kushanda pamabasa.
mt0: <pad> Vana ava ndivo chete vamwe vakadzi vanoshandisa mabasa uye kudzidziswa kwevana kuti vakwanise kuenda kubva kuchikoro kusvika kubasa.</s>

en: Hathaway told the audience that, with the help of a development organization, Sanchita gained an education and borrowed $60 to buy a cow and start a vegetable garden.
sna: Hathaway akaudza vanga vachiteerera kuti, achibetserwa nesangano rinozvebudiriro, Sanchita akagona kudzidza, ndokukwereta mahora makumi matanhatu ekutenga mhou kwava kutanga kurima muriwo mubindu.
mt0: <pad> Hathaway told the audience that, with the help of a development organization, Sanchita gained an education and borrowed $60 to buy a cow and start a vegetable garden.</s>

en: The teenage girl could then afford to pay her own school fees, as well as her brother's, and contribute to her family in such a way that Sanchita's parents hope she does not marry any time soon.
sna: Mwanasikana uyu anemakore angasvike gumi nematanhatu aizogona kuzvibhadharira mari yake yekuchikoro, nevehanzvadzi yake, nekubatsira mumhuri nenzira yekuti vabereki vaSanchita vanovimba nekutarira kuti haaroorwe nekukasira.
mt0: <pad> Masikana acho anokwanisa kubhadhara mari yechikoro yaro, pamwe chete neyahama yake, uye kuita basa remhuri sezvaiita kuti vabereki vaSanchita vanoedza kuti haana kuroorwa nguva nenguva.</s>

en: Hathaway spoke of her own childhood in a comfortable suburban U.S. neighborhood, and of a time when she had no idea about the kind of circumstances Sanchita faced nor how much girls need safe spaces for education.
sna: Hathaway akataurawo nezvekukura kwake ari mwana muhupenyu hweehutofotofo nerudekaro mumusha unogara vakasimukira mune rimwe dhorobha rekuU.S. neighborhood, uyezve nezvenguva apo akange asina ruzivo zvachose pamusoro pemamiriro ezvinhu ayo Sanchita aisangana nawo uye kuti vanasikana nafanirwa kuve nenzvimbo dzakachengetedzeka kuti vagone kudzidza.
mt0: <pad> Hathaway akataura pamusoro peupenyu hwake achiri mudiki mumisha yeU.S., uye pamusoro pezuva iro haana kumbofunga kuti Sanchita aiita zvinhu zvakadaro kana kuti vakadzi vanoda nzvimbo dzakachengeteka dzekudzidza.</s>

en: Places that could teach them how to take the light they have as girls and ignite the world," explained Hathaway.

mt0: <pad> Places that could teach them how to take the light they have as girls and ignite the world," Hathaway explained.</s>

en: I wouldn't know how much the world needs 'The Girl Effect.'  Girl power"The Girl Effect" is what the Adolescent Girls Initiative wants to see happen for 600 million girls in developing countries.
sna: Ndingasazive hangu kuti pasi rose ringade Mutsindo Remwanasikana kana kuti  'The Girl Effect.'  Simba remwanasikana mu"The Girl Effect" ndiro iro Adolescent Girls Initiative inoda kuona richiitika kuvanasikana mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu vari munyika dzichiri kubudirira.
mt0: <pad> I wouldn't know how much the world needs 'The Girl Effect.' Girl power"The Girl Effect" is what the Adolescent Girls Initiative wants to see happen for 600 million girls in developing countries.</s>

en: Overall, an estimated one-third of young women in developing nations are not employed and not in school.
sna: Zvichihwerengedzwa, zvinofungidzirwa kuti chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chevanhukadzi vechidiki munyika dzichiri kubudirira vasikumabasa kana muzvikoro.
mt0: <pad> Total, an estimated one-third of young women in developing countries are not employed and not in school.</s>

en: World Bank President Robert Zoellick said underinvesting in girls impedes development.
sna: Mutungamiriri weWorld Bank, Robert Zoellick akati kuisa mari nezvekushandisa zvishoma mukusimudzira vanasikana kunononotsanekudzivisa budiriro.
mt0: <pad> Robert Zoellick, President of the World Bank, said underinvesting in girls impedes development.</s>

en: He added that educating girls also makes sense for poor families, noting that an extra year of secondary schooling can raise their wages by 10 to 20 percent.
sna: Akawedzerawo achiti kudzidzisa vanasikana kunobatsira mhuri dzinorarama muhurombo, achiti iye gore rega rega rinowedzerwa mwana achienda kuchikoro chekumusoro kunozobetsera vanasikana kuti mari yavanozotambira inge yawedzera nezvikamu zviri pakati negumi kusvikira makumi maviri kubva muzana.
mt0: <pad> He added that educating girls also makes sense for poor families, noting that an extra year of secondary school can raise their wages by 10 to 20 percent.</s>

en: If they earn greater income they also have greater access to reproductive health information and services, so then more likely to delay marriage and childbirth, have healthier babies and attain higher literacy rates, Zoellick said.
sna: Zoellick akati, "Kana vakatambira muhoro wakakura vanengewo vogona kuwana ruzivi pamuso pezvehutano hwavo maringe nekubereka vana nemitezo yavo sevanhukadzi nezvinogona nekwanogona kubatsirwa, saka naizvozvo vanenge vogonawo kunonoka kuroorwa nekuita vana, vozova nevana vane hutano huri nani uye vowanazve goneso yepamusoro pakugona kuverenga nekunzwisisa zvinyorwa nezvitaurwa.
mt0: <pad> Kana vakawana mari yakawanda, vanokwanisa kuwana ruzivo rwezvehutano hwekuita mwana uye masevhisi, saka zvinonyanya kutora nguva yekugara pamwe chete nekuroora uye kubva pachikoro, kuva nemimba ine utano uye kuwana ruzivo rwezvekunamata, Zoellick akadaro.</s>

en: The evidence strongly suggests that investing in adolescent girls is a key way to break inter-generational patterns of poverty.
sna: Humboo huripo hunonongedzera pakuti kutsigira vanasikana vekumakore egumi nematanhatu itsvonhongoro pakutyora nekushaisa simba nzira dzehurombo dzinobata nekuteedza mazera nemazera mudzimhuri.
mt0: <pad> Zvipupuriro zvinoratidza kuti kuisa mari muvakadzi vadiki ndiko kwakakosha kupedza marudzi ehurombo ari kubva kuchizvarwa nechizvarwa.</s>

en: Current operations The Adolescent Girls Initiative public-private partnership, with its $20 million in funds, is already at work in seven countries, with plans to expand to Haiti and Yemen.
sna: Zvirongwa zviripo. Chirongwa cheAdolescent Girls Initiative icho chiri kubatana nemapazi ehurumende nemsangano akazvimiririra, muchikwama chayo muine mamiriyoni makumi maviri, chakatotanga kushanda munyika nomwe paine hurongwa kuwedzera chichipinda muHaiti neYemen.

mt0: <pad> Kebbeh Kamara said she has benefited from training in Greater Monrovia, Liberia.</s>

mt0: <pad> I learned how to start a business, how to make money on your own, how to be self-sustainable, she said, "how to save money and what to spend money for."</s>

mt0: <pad> I learned how to express yourself. Eye contact. Speak loud," explained Saturnino. "This way can give me really a voice to speak in front of people."</s>

mt0: <pad> She said she hopes to take the lessons she has learned here in workshops back to the Adolescent Girls Initiative clubs in Southern Sudan.</s>

en: And even if I go back home, I'm not longer Sarah again -- I'm somebody now."

mt0: <pad> Asi kunyange kana ndiri kubva kumusha, handisisiri Sarah zvakare -- ndakava munhu."</s>

mt0: <pad> Mumwe munhu akahwina kutenda kweimwe Southern Sudanese, mwana-mwariri-akava-rapper Emmanuel Jal.</s>

en: A supporter of the Adolescent Girls Initiative, Jal performed at the World Bank event.

mt0: <pad> Jal, a supporter of the Adolescent Girls Initiative, performed at the World Bank event.</s>

en: The girls joined him on stage, beaming as they danced behind him -- as did at least one World Bank official -- while the audience of staffers in business suits took to their feet and raised their hands in the air as well.
sna: Vasikana vabatana naye mudariro rekuimbira, vachipenya pavaitamba vari mumashure make, -- izvo zvakaitwawo nemushandi mumwechete weWorld Bank -- apowo vateereri vakanga vari vashandi vakapfeka hanzu dzavo dzebasa vakatanga kudzana vachisimudzawo maoko avo mudenga zvakare.
mt0: <pad> Vanasikana vakaenda naye pamberi, vachirumbidza sezvo ivo vaiimba naye -- uye kunyangwe mumwe mutengesi weWorld Bank -- uye vamwe vashandi vepasi rese vakamira uye vakasimudzira maoko avo.</s>

en: Activists Press for Better Help to End Congo Rapes
sna: Vanorwira Kodzdero Vanokumbira Betsero Iri Nani Kuti Ibpedze Kubatwa Chibharo Kuri Kuitika muCongo.
mt0: <pad> Activists Press for Better Help to End Congo Rape</s>

en: As U.N. Special Representative for Sexual Violence In Conflict Margot Wallstrom embarks on a new trip to the Democratic Republic of Congo, two activists recently concluded lobbying efforts in the United States for more effective action on trying to end conflict-related rapes in Congo.
sna: Apo mumuririri akasanangurwa weMubatanidzwa wenyika dzese panyaya dzekubhinywa pabonde munguva yehondo,  Margot Wallstrom anotanga rwendo rwake rwekuDemocratic Republic of Congo, vanhu vanorwira kodzero vaviri vakange vachangopedza mabasa avo ekukumbira betsero muUnited States kuti pave nedzimwe nzira dzinoshanda pakupedza kubatwa zvibharo munguva yekurwisana muCongo.
mt0: <pad> As UN Special Representative for Sexual Violence in Conflict Margot Wallstrom embarks on a new trip to the Democratic Republic of Congo, two activists recently concluded lobbying efforts in the United States for more effective action on trying to end conflict-related rapes in Congo.</s>

en: One of them, Justine Masika Bihamba, told a gathering of Washington, D.C., university students and concerned citizens that the area in which she works, Beni, in North Kivu province, is still overrun by Ugandan rebels who regularly rape women.
sna: Mumwe wavo, Justine Masika Bihamba, akaudza gungano remuWashington, D.C., vadzidzi vepazvikoro zvapamusoro nevagari vane hanya nenyaya iyi, kuti nzvimbo yaanoshanda ari mairi, Beni, mudunhu reNorth Kivu, ichiri kutongwa nevapanduki vekuUganda, avo nguva neguva vanobata vanhukadzi chibharo.
mt0: <pad> Mumwe wavo, Justine Masika Bihamba, akaudza vanhu vakaungana muWashington, D.C., kuti nzvimbo yaanogara, Beni, in North Kivu province, is still overrun by Ugandan rebels who regularly rape women.</s>

en: She said in these situations women are considered victims, and are not implicated in the search for peace.
sna: Akati mumamiriro ezvinhu akadai madzimai ndiwo anenge achikuvadzwa nekukanganisirwa, uye havagone kupomerwa mhosva apo runyararo rwunenge rwotsvagwa.
mt0: <pad> She said mune izvi zviitiko vakadzi vanofungirwa kuti ndivo vanhu vakaurayiwa, uye havabatsiriri mukutsvaga rugare.</s>

en: Striving for peace in the region
sna: Kushandira runyararo mudunhu
mt0: <pad> edzai kuita kuti zvinhu zviite zvakanaka munyika</s>

en: Bihamba coordinates an organization called the Synergy of Women Against Sexual Violence.
sna: Bihamba anoronga mafambisirwo ebasa mumusangano unonzim "Kubatanidza Masimba Emadzimayi Mukurwisa Kubatwa Chibharo" kana kuti Synergy of Women Against Sexual Violence.
mt0: <pad> Bihamba coordinates an organization called the Synergy of Women Against Sexual Violence.</s>

en: Counselors with the group have been attacked and threatened because of their work.
sna: Madzimayi anobatsira kuteerera nekupa mazano kune vanenge vabhunywanvanoshanda neboka iri vanosirwiswa nekutyisidzirwa nekuda kwebasa ravo.
mt0: <pad> Counselors with the group have been attacked and threatened because of their work.</s>

en: When Bihamba was at work one day, Congolese soldiers attacked her home, and sexually assaulted one of her daughters.
sna: Rimwe zuva Bihamba ari kubasa, mauto ekuCongo akapaza ndokupinda pamba pake vakabata mumwe wevanasikana vake chibharo.
mt0: <pad> When Bihamba was at work one day, Congolese soldiers attacked her home, and sexually assaulted one of her daughters.</s>

en: Bihamba explained that what is needed - above all - is peace in eastern Congo.
sna: Bihamba akatsanangura kuti chinhu choga chinodikwa - pamusoro pezvimwe zvese - rugare kumabvazuva ekuCongo.
mt0: <pad> Bihamba explained that what is needed - above all - is peace in east Congo.</s>

en: She said she believes sexual crimes would go down drastically if fighting stopped.
sna: Anovimba kuti mhosva dzekubhinywa kwemadzimayi dzinozoderera kana kurwisana kukamira.
mt0: <pad> She said she believes kuti mabasa anoita vanhukadzi achange akawanda kana kurwa kwacho kwamira.</s>

en: Activist Donatella Rostagno, from the European network for Central Africa, accompanied Bihamba on her trip to the United States.
sna: Murwiri wekodzero, Donatella Rostagno, anoshandira Kubatana KweEurope Kuitira Central Africa kana kuti European Network for Central Africa, akaperekedza Bihamba parwendo rwake rwekuUnited States.
mt0: <pad> Activist Donatella Rostagno, from the European network for Central Africa, accompanied Bihamba on her trip to the United States.</s>

en: She said she supports the work being done by the U.N. special representative for sexual violence in conflict.
sna: Akati anotsigira basa ririkuitwa nemumiriri akasanagurwa panyaya dzekubhinywa munguva dzemakakava nekurwisana.
mt0: <pad> She said she supports the work being done by the UN special representative for sexual violence in conflict.</s>

en: Rostagno also said feels, however, the international community is not doing enough to stop Congo's war, despite having a large U.N. peacekeeping mission there.
sna: Rostagno anofungawo kuti, kunyangwe zvakadaro, nyika dzepasi rose hadzisi kuita zvakakwana kuti dzimise hondo yemuCongo, kunyangwe kuine basa guru ririkuitwa nemauto ari pasi peU.N. mukuchengetedza runyararo ikoko.
mt0: <pad> Rostagno akatiwo, asi, nyika dzakawanda dzinoita zvakawanda kuti dzideredze hondo muCongo, kunyange zvazvo imomo mune imwe UN peacekeeping mission.</s>

en: The majority of the actions is made to look at the consequences, to work with the women who are victims, but not enough is done to look at the causes of the rapes and the conflict, said Rostagno.
sna: Rosragno akati basa zhinji nderekuona zvininoitika mushure mekubhinywa, kushanda nemadzimayi anenge akuvadzwa, asi hapasi kuitwa zvakakwana zvekuongorora zvinokonzera kubaatwa zvibharo.
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zviito zvinoitwa kuona zvaiita, kushandira vakadzi vakawanda, asi zvakakwana hazvina kuitirwa kuona chikonzero chekuuraya uye kurwadziwa, akadaro Rostagno.</s>

en: Deteriorating situation amid global concern
sna: Kunyanya kuiipa Kwemamiriro ezvinhu paine kushushikana kukuru pasi rose
mt0: <pad> Deteriorating situation amid global crisis</s>

en: She fears the overall situation in eastern Congo is getting worse, not better - despite the international attention - with rebels, militias, and renegade soldiers still running rampant.
sna: Anotya kuti mamiriro ezvinhu kumabvazuva ekuCongo ari kunyanya achiwedzera kushata, kwete kuita zviri nani - kunyangwe hazvo nyika zhinji dziri kunyatsotarisisa zviri kuitikako- kuchiine vapanduki, zvikwata zvikwata kwata zvevanhu vane zvombo, masoja akapanduka vachamuka chibhebhenenga vachiita zvavanoda.
mt0: <pad> She fears the overall situation in east Congo is getting worse, not better - despite international attention - with rebels, militias, and renegade soldiers still running rampant.</s>

en: A lot of these rebel groups are getting reorganized, and are even getting in a coalition so the movements that we see in the region, it is worrying us, said Rostagno.
sna: Zvizhinji zvezvikwata zvavapanduki izvi i=zvavakuungana zvakare zviine hurongwa hutsva, pamwe pacho zvichibatana nekushanda pamwepo nezvimwe zvikwata zvinova ndizvo zvatava kuona mudunhu iri, zviri kuti shungurudza nekutityisa, akadaro Rostagno.
mt0: <pad> A lot of these rebel groups are getting reorganized, and even getting in a coalition, so the movement that we see in the region, it is worrying us, said Rostagno.</s>

en: I think we were more optimistic on this region six months ago than today.
sna: Ndinofunga kuti takange tiine tariro pamusoro pedunhu rino mwedzi mitanhatu yakapfuura kudarika patiri nhasi.
mt0: <pad> I think we were more optimistic about this region six months ago than today.</s>

en: The United Nations has identified three armed groups that gang raped dozens of people about two months ago in a week-long attack in Luvungi, another part of North Kivu province.
sna: Mubatanidzwa Wenyika Dzepasi Rose, United Nations rakanongedzera zvikwata zvitatu zvine zvombo zvakikutsirana kubata vanhu vakawanda zvhibharo munguva ingaite masvondo maviri apfuura apo zvakabvoronga muLuvungi,chimwe chikamu chedunhu rekumaodzanyemba reNorth Kivu.
mt0: <pad> United Nations yakaona mapoka matatu akabata pfuti akapambwa makumi maviri evanhu mwedzi miviri yapfuura muLuvungi, imwe nzvimbo yeNorth Kivu province.</s>

en: Those implicated are the Mai Mai Cheka, the Democratic Liberation Forces of Rwanda, and followers of an army deserter, Colonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.
sna: Zvikwata zviri kunongedzerwa zvinoti Mai Mai Cheka, Democratic Liberation Forces of Rwanda, nevateveri vemukuru wemauto akapanduka anonzi, Colonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.
mt0: <pad> Vanofungidzirwa ndeveMai Mai Cheka, the Democratic Liberation Forces of Rwanda, uye vakuru vemuranda wemauto, Colonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.</s>

en: Proposals for improvementDuring their presentation, the two activists, Bihamba and Rostagno, also offered concrete proposals to make the situation better.
sna: Mazano Ekuti Zvinhu zviite Nani. Pavakapa maonero avo, varwiri vekodzero vaviri ava, Bihamba naRostagno, vakapawo mazana anobatika ekushanlda nawo mukuita kuti mamiriro ezvinhu ave zviri nani.
mt0: <pad> Proposals for improvementDuring their presentation, the two activists, Bihamba and Rostagno, also offered concrete proposals to make the situation better.</s>

en: Rostagno explained that foreign non-governmental organizations get funding to tackle the issue of sexual violence, but local organizations often get ignored.
sna: Rostagno akatsangura kuti masangano akazvimiririra ekunze anofanirwa kutsvaga rubatsiro rwemari yekugadzirisa ganyavhu rinoitwa panezvepabonde, asi masangano emunyika anenge achisanwa nekusaonekwa kuti aripowo.
mt0: <pad> Rostagno akataura kuti maNPO epasi rese anogamuchira mari yekugadzirisa dambudziko rekushungurudzwa kwepabonde, asi maNPO emuno anonyanya kunyatsotadza.</s>

en: She said complex applications to get outside funding favor bigger organizations.
sna: Akati kunetsa kunoita kuwana rubatsiro rwemari kubva kune dzimwe nyika kunopedzesera kongobatsira masangano makuru.
mt0: <pad> She said a complicated application to get outside funding favors bigger organizations.</s>

en: They can just do it, they send it, they receive the money.
sna: Vanogona kungonyora tsamba dzekukumbira, votumira, votowana mari yacho.
mt0: <pad> Vanogona kungozviita, vanoendesa uye vanowana mari.</s>

en: The problem is that the money in most cases is spent to pay for the fixed cost of the organization, for the salaries of expat people coming to the region and to the country, while the local non-governmental organizations, those working with the communities, with the women, with the children, in the villages, those who need need money to survive in order to do their work do not have access, said Rostagno.
sna: Dambudziko nderekuti munguva zhinji, mari iyi inoshandiswa mukubhadhara zvagara zvichifanirwa kubhadharwa nemasangano aya, kuitira mihoro yevashandi vekunze vanouya kundu iri nemunyika, asi masangano akazvimiririra emunyika, ayo anoshanda nezvikwata zvevanhu vakasiyana siyana, nemadzimayi, nevana, mumamisha, avo vanoda mari yekuti vararama pavanoita basa ravo havawaniswe mukana wekuiwana, akadaro Rostagno.
mt0: <pad> Mhinduro yacho ndeyekuti mari inoshandiswa kubhadhara mari yakatarwa yesangano, mabasa evanhu vanenge vachiuya kunyika, uye vaya vanoshanda nevanhu vemunharaunda, nevakadzi, nevana, mumaguta, vaya vanoda mari kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo havasi kuwana mari, akadaro Rostagno.</s>

en: Bihamba said Congolese soldiers should be paid directly through bank withdrawals, rather than being paid through their superiors.
sna: Bihamba akati mauto emuCongo anofanirwa kupihwa mihoro yavo ichiiswa kumabhanga kwete kuti inopihwa vakuru vavo kuto vazovagamuchidza.
mt0: <pad> Bihamba said Congolese soldiers should be paid directly through bank withdrawals, rather than being paid through their superiors.</s>

en: Bihamba said with the current system they receive only about a third of their salary, which causes some soldiers to loot and rape.
sna: Bihamba akati nenzira iri kushandiswa ikezvino, mauto anongogamuchira chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chemihoro yavo, zvinozoita kuti mamwe mauto abe nekubvuta zvinhu zvevanhu nekubata chibharo.
mt0: <pad> Bihamba said with the current system they receive only about a third of their salary, which causes some soldiers to loot and rape.</s>

en: She also called for an international tribunal for the Congo to help end general impunity, as well as more local tribunals for raped victims to seek justice.
sna: Akatiwo panofanirwa kuve nedare rinoongorora nekutonga zviri kuitika muCongo kuti zvibatsire kupedza kutyorwa kwemitemo nekodzero pasina chinoitika kune vanenge vatyora mutemo, uyewo kuve nemamwe matare emunzvimbo dzigere vanhu kuitira vakabatwa chibharo kuti vawane kururamisirwa.
mt0: <pad> She also called for an international tribunal for the Congo to help end general impunity, as well as more local tribunals for victims of rape to seek justice.</s>

en: In North Kivu, where more than 5 million people are estimated to live, she said there are only three tribunals.
sna: Kudunhu rekumaodanyemba reNorth Kivu, uko kunofungidzirwa kuti kunogara vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu, akati kunongova nematare matatu chete.
mt0: <pad> In North Kivu, where more than 5 million people are estimated to live, she said there are only three tribunals.</s>

en: Desmond Tutu Retires From Public Life
sna: Desmond Tutu Anozorora Kubva Pakushanda Neveruzhinji
mt0: <pad> Desmond Tutu Retires From Public Life</s>

en: Desmond Tutu fought apartheid in South Africa, and was critical of the war in Iraq.
sna: Desmond Tutu akarwisa rusaruraganda muSouth Africa, uye vaitsoropodza hondo yemu Iraq.
mt0: <pad> Desmond Tutu aiva mukurwisa apartheid muSouth Africa, uye aiva akatsigira hondo yeIraq.</s>

en: We waged a war that shouldn't have happened, he said.He also spoke out against genocide in Rwanda.
sna: Takarwa muhondo yakange isingafanirwe kunge yakaitika, akadaro. Vakataurawo vachitsoropodza kupondwa kwevanhu kwakaitika muRwanda.
mt0: <pad> We waged a war that shouldn't have happened, he said. He also spoke out against genocide in Rwanda.</s>

en: God have mercy on us, he said.
sna: Mwari ngaava netsitsi nesu, vakadaro.
mt0: <pad> Mwari ane ngoni kwatiri, akadaro.</s>

en: The retired Anglican archbishop announced in July that he would retire from public life on his birthday.
sna: Bhishopu vakasiya basa veAnglican vakazivisa muna Chikunguru kuti vaizorega basa rekushanda muruzhinji nemusi wekupemberera zuva ravakazvarwa.
mt0: <pad> Archbishop achiri kugara ari mupenyu akataura munaKurume kuti achange aenda kubva pabasa rake rechitendero pazuva rekuberekwa kwake.</s>

en: "The time has come to slow down, and sip maybe rooibos tea with my beloved wife in the afternoons" he said.
sna: "Nguva yasvika zvino kuti yekuti ndichiita zvinhu zvishoma nezvishoma, ndichidzvuta zvichida svutugadzike yerudzi rwe rooibosndiine mudiwa wangu masikati" vakadaro.
mt0: <pad> "Nguva yakwana yekuzorora, uye kunwa tea yerooibos pamwe chete nemadzimai angu anodiwa mumangwanani" akadaro.</s>

en: Tutu rose through the ranks of the Anglican church in South Africa to become the first black Anglican archbishop of Capetown.
sna: VaTutu vakakwira nekusimuka muzvinhanho zvekereke ye Anglican muSouth Africa kusvikira vazove munhu mutema wekutanga kuvamubhishopu mukuru weCapetown.
mt0: <pad> Tutu akakura achipinda mumakereke eAnglican muSouth Africa kuti ave mukuru wechitendero chechiKristu chinonzi Archdiocese of Capetown.</s>

en: He was a vocal critic of South Africa's white-ruled government and encouraged non-violence to end apartheid.
sna: Vaive mutsoropodzi ayitaura achishora hurumende yechichena yemuSouth Africa uye vaijurudzira nzira dzisina mhirizhonga dzekupedza hutongi hwechichena.
mt0: <pad> He was a vocal critic of South Africa's white-ruled government and encouraged non-violence to end apartheid.</s>

en: Tutu was the recipient of many awards, and in 1984, he received a Nobel Peace Prize for advocating "a democratic and just society without racial divisions.
sna: VaTutu vakagamuchira menduru dzakawanda, uye muna 1984, vakagamuchira menduru ye he received a Nobel Peace Prize nekuda kwebasa ravo rekurwira "nyika ine gutsaruzhinji nekururamisira pasina kutsaura maringe neruvara rweganda remunhu."
mt0: <pad> Tutu akahwinwa nemamwe mabasa akawanda, uye muna 1984, akahwinwa neNobel Peace Prize nekuedza "kusimudzira vanhu vakatendeka uye vakaremekedza nyika isina kupararira kwerudzi."</s>

en: He used the recognition to step up the anti-apartheid campaign, calling for an economic boycott against South Africa.
sna: Vakashandisa izvi kuti vawedzere kurwisa hutongi hwerusarura rudzi, vachikurudzira kuti dzimwe nyika dzisadyidzane pane zvehupfumi neSouth Africa.
mt0: <pad> Akashandisa rimwe rekuzivikanwa kusimudzira hondo yeanti-apartheid, achikurudzira kuti South Africa iiswe mutongo weboycott.</s>

en: After the end of apartheid, Tutu called it an incredible day when Nelson Mandela won South Africa's first all-race elections.
sna: Pakapera hutongi hwesaruraganda hwechichena, vaTutu vakati raive zuva rinoshamisa apo vaNelson Mandela vakakunda pasarudzo dzekutanga dzemarudzi ose.
mt0: <pad> Mushure mekuguma kweapartheid, Tutu akaita kuti zuva rakakura rekuti Nelson Mandela akunda South Africa's first all-race election.</s>

en: I would say the highest point for me was when I stood on the balcony in 1994 to introduce our new, brand new president to South Africa and the world," he said.
sna: “Ndingati nzvimbo yepamusoro soro yandakasvika ndeapo ndakamira ndiri muima yemamusoro pandaonekwa nevanhu vakange vari pasi ndikaratidza mutungamiriri wedu mutsva, achangoburwa kuSouth Africa nekupasi rose,” vakadaro.
mt0: <pad> I would say the highest point for me was when I stood on the balcony in 1994 to introduce our new, brand new president to South Africa and the world," he said.</s>

en: To help mend the nation, President Mandela appointed Tutu as head of the country's Truth and Reconciliation Commission.
sna: Kubatsira kuporesa nyika, President Mandela vakagadza vaTutu semukuru webazi raizobatsira kuunza kuyanana nekuregerera kuburikidza kureurura chokwadi chezvakaitika chinonzi Truth and Reconciliation Commission.
mt0: <pad> Kuti abatsire nyika, Mambo Mandela akaita Tutu mukuru weTruth and Reconciliation Commission yenyika.</s>

en: The group issued a report that included numerous confessions of guilt under apartheid in return for amnesty.
sna: Boka iri rakaburitsa chinyorwa chaisanganisirawo kureurura kwemhosva dzakaparwa pasi hutongi wesaruraganda kuti munhu aganuchire kuregererwa.
mt0: <pad> The group issued a report that included numerous confessions of guilt under apartheid in exchange for amnesty.</s>

en: It makes specific proposals on how we can cultivate a culture of human rights and of structures to insure that the atrocities of the past will not reoccur, Tutu said.Tutu also campaigned to fight poverty and AIDS.
sna: Chinyorwa ichi chinotaurawo zvinogona kuitwa kuti tisakurire nekukurisa tsika tekuchengetedza kodxero dzevanhu nehwaro hunoita kuti hutsinye hehumhondi hwakare ahuitike zvakare, vakadaro vaTutu.VaTutu vakamirawo vachirwisana nehurombo nedenda reshuramatongo.
mt0: <pad> It makes specific proposals on how we can cultivate a culture of human rights and of structures to insure that the atrocities of the past will not reoccur, Tutu said.Tutu also campaigned to fight poverty and AIDS.</s>

en: In recent years, he expressed his disappointment in post-apartheid South Africa, especially the level of violent crime.
sna: Mumakore achangopfuura, vakaratidza kugumbuka kwavo ne South Africa yakauya mushure mekutonga kwerusaruraganda, zvikuru kutyorwa kwemutemo kunenge kuine mhirizhonga nezvombo.
mt0: <pad> In makore achangopfuura, akaratidza kushungurudzika kwake pamusoro peSouth Africa yepost-apartheid, kunyanya pamusoro pehuwandu hwemhirizhonga.</s>

en: Despite his withdrawal from public life, Tutu says he will continue to support his peace foundation and will remain part of a group of elder statesmen who campaign for peace and human rights.
sna: Kunyangwe havo vavakurega kunyanya kuonekwa pane veruzhinji, vacharamba vachitsigira sangano ravo rinorwira kuti Africa nepasi rose pave nerunyararo uye vacharanba vari chikamu chevakuru anasorojena vanopanga mazano vanorwira kuti pave nerunyararo nekodzero dzevanhu.
mt0: <pad> Despite his withdrawal from public life, Tutu says he will continue to support his peace foundation and will remain part of a group of elder statemen who campaign for peace and human rights.</s>

en: But Tutu says he will no longer give interviews and, as he put it, will mostly "shut up."
sna: Asi vaTutu vanoti havachazenge vachitaura nevatori venhau kupindura mibvunzo yavo, nekuti, sekutaura kwavo vanenge "vakanyarara."
mt0: <pad> Tutu says he will no longer give interviews and, as he put it, will mostly "shut up."</s>

en: I have been part of our struggle for freedom and democracy, and I am part of the celebration that we did succeed, he said.
sna: Ndanga ndiri chikamu chekurwira rusununguko negutsaruzhinji, uye ndiri chikamu chemhemberero yekuti takabudirira, vakadaro.
mt0: <pad> Ndave chikamu chehondo yedu yekurwa nehurumende uye rusununguko, uye ndiri chikamu chekupembera kuti takasvika kwatiri, akadaro.</s>

en: "I have been part of the post apartheid dispensation and long for us to do infinitely better."
sna: "Ndange ndiri chikamu chemwaka wakatevera nguva yekutonga kwechisaruraganda kwechichena uye ndinoshuvira kuti tive parinani nenzira yepamusoro soro."
mt0: <pad> "Ndangariro yangu yava nemakore iri kuedza kuti ndiite zvakanaka, uye ndinoda kuti tiite zvakanaka zvikuru."</s>

en: Many say his voice will be missed.
sna: Vazhinji vanoti inzwi ravo richashuvirwa kuti deno ranga richingoripo.
mt0: <pad> Vanhu vakawanda vanoti izwi rake richava nengoni.</s>

en: Tutu also campaigned to fight poverty and AIDS.
sna: VaTutu vakamirawo vachirwisana nehurombo nedenda reshuramatongo.
mt0: <pad> Tutu akaedzawo kurwisa urombo uye HIV.</s>

en: Malawi's Jacaranda School for Orphans Celebrates Christmas
sna: Chikoro chenherera muMalawi che Jacaranda School for Orphans Chinopemberera Kisimusi
mt0: <pad> Malawi's Jacaranda School for Orphans Celebrates Christmas</s>

en: The management for the Jacaranda School for Orphans in Malawis commercial capital Blantyre recently hosted a party for its students as it closed for Christmas and New Years Day holidays.
sna: Vanotungamira chikoro chenherera cheJacaranda School for Orphans chiri muguta guru mune zvetenga nekutengesa muma Malawi, Blantyre, munguva pfupi ichangopfuura vakaita mutambo wemabiko kuitira vadzidzi vavo apo chikoro chinovhara kuitira mazororo eKisimusi neGoredzva.
mt0: <pad> Mukuru weJacaranda School for Orphans muMalawi's commercial capital Blantyre achangobva kuita party yevana vake sezvo chikoro ichi chakanga chasara kwezvipembero zveKisimusi neNew Year Day.</s>

en: Around 500 people including students, staff members and others from surrounding areas attended the event, which was held at the schools premises in Chigumula area.
sna: Vanhu vangasvike mazana mashanu kusanganisira vadzidzi, vashandi nevamwewo vakabvamunzvimbo dzakapoteredza vakange vari pachiitiko ichi, chakaitirwa muxchivanze chechikoro  munzvimbo yeChigumula.
mt0: <pad> Mazana mashanu evanhu vakapinda mutambo uyu, uyo waiva pazvikoro zveChigumula Primary School, Chigumula.</s>

en: The party included gifts, Santa Claus, and a "dancing show case" by the students.
sna: Mutambo uyu wasanganisirawo zvipo, Santa Claus anozivikanwa sekuti Father Christmas, uye "nekuratidza zvidobi zvekutamba mimhanzi" kwakaitwa nevadzidzi.
mt0: <pad> Party inosanganisira zvipo, Santa Claus, uye "dancing show case" by the students.</s>

en: The school management told VOA that the yearly celebration has been a school tradition for the past 13years.
sna: Vanoona nekufamba kwakanaka kwechikoro ichi vakaudza VOA kuti mhemberero inoitwa gore negore itsika yanga ichiitwa nechikoro kwemakore gumi nematatu adarika.
mt0: <pad> Mukuru wezvikoro akaudza VOA kuti chiitiko chegore-negore chinove chikonzero chekupemberera zvikoro zvese kwemakore gumi nematatu.</s>

en: The school's director, Luc Deschamps, said: "[We feel] it is very important for us to celebrate Christmas because the children do not have parents.
sna: Mukuru wechikoro ichi, Luc Deschamps, akati: "Tinonzwa kuti zvakakosha kupemberera Kisimusi nekuti vana ava havana vabereki".
mt0: <pad> Luc Deschamps, director of the school, said: "[We feel] it is important for us to celebrate Christmas because the children do not have parents.</s>

en: They stay with either a grandmother or a distant aunt or uncle, and they are not able to cerebrate at home or have a party or a little bit of sweets and cake for the children.
sna: Vanogara nambuya kana tete, kana imwe hama yekure yavanoita tete, mai, baba kana sekuru, uye havakwanise kupemberera vari kumusha kana kuva nekamutambo kadiki kekufara kana kudyawo zviwitsi zvishomanana kana keke kuitira vana ava.
mt0: <pad> Vanogara neamai kana akanaka aunt kana uncle, uye havakwanise kuita nyaya kumba kana kuti kuitira vamwe vakuru kana kuti kugadzira zvimwe zvokudya uye keke yevana.</s>

en: So, we provide a happy day for the children to celebrate the spirit of Christmas. And it is also a way of our children to learn to give."
sna: Saka tinogadzira zuva remufaro kuitira vana ava kuti vapemberere mweya weKisimusi. Uye inovawo nzira yekuti vana vedu vadzidze kupa kune vamwe."
mt0: <pad> Saka, tinopa mazuva anofara kuvana kuti vapembere moyo weChirangaridzo. en: No media source currently available
sna: Hapana nhau dziri kuwanikwa ikezvino
mt0: <pad> No media source currently available. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know</s>

en: Deschamps, who is also an Honorary Consul of France in Malawi, said before the main event the patrons were treated to "a nice meal" from the students.
sna: Deschamps, uyo anova mumiriri anoremedzeka weFrance muMalawi, akati mutambo uyu usati watanga vaenzi vakapihwa "kudya kwainaka nice meal" kwakange kwabikwa nevadzidzi.
mt0: <pad> Deschamps, a Honorary Consul of France in Malawi, said before the main event the patrons were treated to "a nice meal" from the students.</s>

en: We had a big, big lunch with good meat and rice,[the dish made from maize flour called] nsima, of course, and vegetables.
sna: Tava nekudya kwemasikati kwakakura chose kune nyama yakanaka nesadza kana rinonzi nsima kuMalawi uyewo nemuriwo.
mt0: <pad> Takadya chikafu chikuru, chikuru chaizvo, nyama yakanaka uye nsima, chokwadi, uye mboga.</s>

en: And it was the students themselves who cooked the meal for everybody, for over 500 people, he said.
sna: Uye vanga vari vana vechikoro vamene vabikira munhu wese kudya uku, kuitira vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu, akadaro.
mt0: <pad> And it was the students themselves who cooked the meal for everyone, for over 500 people, he said.</s>

en: One of the students, Eddah Zimba, said, "The celebrations are really cool, ... I have enjoyed myself.
sna: Mumwe wevadzidzi ava, Eddah Zimba, akati, "Mhemberero idzi dzakaisvonaka, ... Ndanakidzwa chose.
mt0: <pad> Mumwe wevadzidzi, Eddah Zimba, akati, "Zvinopembera zvakanaka,... ndakazviita zvinonakidza.</s>

en: I have eaten, and now I am here dancing.
sna: Ndadya, uye iye zvino ndava kudzana.
mt0: <pad> I have eaten, and now I am here dancing.</s>

en: What has interested me most is the gift that we have received the like the puffs, the biscuits, the squash and the dance."
sna: Chanyanya kundinakidza zvipo zvatagamuchira zvakaita se shuga yakaitwa furo kana kuti ma puffs, mabhisikitsi, mutambo we squash nekudzana."
mt0: <pad> Zvimwe zvandafarira zvikuru ndezvekudya zvatakawana zvakadai sepuffs, biscuits, squash uye dance.</s>

en: She thanked the schools management for hosting the Christmas party for students who in most cases do not have such celebrations at home.
sna: Akatenda vanoona kufamba zvakanaka kwechikoro nekuronga mutambo uyu kuitira vadzidzi avo kazhinjihavakwanise kuita mhemberero idzi kumusha kwavo.
mt0: <pad> She thanked the schools management for hosting the Christmas party for students who in most cases do not have such celebrations at home.</s>

en: Another student Emmanuel Chisale said good meal aside, the event has taught him the spirit of sharing.
sna: Mumwe mudzidzi Emmanuel Chisale akati kunze kwezvekudya zvakanaka, chiitiko ichi chakamudzidzisa mweya wekugoverana nevamwe.
mt0: <pad> Mumwe mudzidzi Emmanuel Chisale akati kunze kwechikafu chakanaka, chiitiko ichi chamudzidzisa moyo wekugoverana.</s>

en: This party has brought a change in my life.
sna: Mutambo uyu waunza shanduko muhupenyu hwangu.
mt0: <pad> Mhemberero iyi yakachinja hupenyu hwangu.</s>

en: I have learned that we have to have a heart for sharing one another as the Father Christmas was doing, he said.
sna: Ndadzidza kuva nemweya wekugoverana nevamwe sezvanga zvichiitwa naFather Christmas, akadaro.
mt0: <pad> Ndakadzidza kuti tinofanira kuva nemoyo wekugoverana sezvaiita Baba Krismas, akati.</s>

en: Founded in 2002, the Jacaranda School for Orphans is the only one in Malawi which provides free primary, secondary and tertiary education to children without parents.
sna: Jacaranda School for Orphan chakavambwa mugore ra2002 ndicho chikoro choga muMalawi chinopa zvidzidzo zvepachena kuvana vasina vabereki kubva kuchikoro chepazasi, chepamusoro nekuzvokoro zvinogadzirira vadzidzi kuita mabasa akasiyana siyana.
mt0: <pad> Mwaka wa2002, yunivhesiti yeJacaranda yeOrphans ndiyo chete inogara muMalawi inopa dzidzo mahara kuvana vasina vabereki.</s>

en: A Malawian woman, Marie Da Silva, started the school after she returned from the United States where she spent nineteen years working as a nanny.
sna: Mumwe mudzimayi wekuMalawi, Marie Da Silva, akatanga chikoro ichi mushure mekunge adzoka kubva kuUnited States uko akange apedza makore gumi nemapfumbamwe achishanda semuchengeti wevana mumhuri.
mt0: <pad> A Malawian woman, Marie Da Silva, started the school after she returned from the United States where she spent nineteen years working as a nanny.</s>

en: Economists Predict Bumpy Road for Malawi's Economy in 2030
sna: Nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zhira yehupfumi weMalawi ichange yakaoma mugore ra2030
mt0: <pad> Economists Predict Bumpy Road for Malawi's Economy in 2030</s>

en: Economists in Malawi say the country is likely to continue facing financial challenges in 2015 unless the government can regain the confidence of donors, who are still withholding 40 percent of budgetary support due to the corruption scandal known as Cashgate.
sna: Nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi muMalawi dzinoti nyika iyi ichakaroenderera mberi ichitarisana nezvinetso pane zvehupfumi muna 2015 kuzhe kwekuti hurumende yagonazve kupa vanobatsira nemari kugutsikana kwekuti inogona kugadzirisa zvinhu, nekuti vabatsiri vachi vakapfumbatira zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemari yekubatsira pamari yekufambisa basa rehurumende mberi nekuda kwenyaya yehuori inozivakanwa nekuti Cashgate.
mt0: <pad> Economists in Malawi say the country is likely to continue facing financial difficulties in 2015 unless the government can regain the trust of donors, who are still withholding 40 percent of budgetary support due to the corruption scandal known as Cashgate.</s>

en: More than $30 million were looted from government coffers in the scandal, and several people, including government officials, were arrested.
sna: Mari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana matatau yakamorwa kubva muzvikwama zvehurumende munyaya iyi uye vanhu vazhinji, kusanganisira vashandi vakuru vehurumende vakasungwa.
mt0: <pad> More than $30 million was looted from government coffers in the scandal, and several people, including government officials, were arrested.</s>

en: The withholding of donor aid has forced Malawi's government to pass what is known as the Zero Aid national budget for the 2014-2015 fiscal year.
sna: Kusatsukunura mari yerubetsero iyi kwazomanikidza hurumende yeMalawi kuti ibvumidze hurongwa hwezvekushandiswa kwemari inoshandiswa yakapihwa zita rekuti Hurongwa Hwekushandisa Mari Munyika Pasina Rubatsiro mugore rinotanga muna2014 kusvikira 2015.
mt0: <pad> The withholding of donor aid has forced Malawi's government to pass what is known as the Zero Aid national budget for the 2014-2015 fiscal year.</s>

en: Analysts, such as Abel Mwanyungwe, an economics lecturer at the Polytechnic College of the University of Malawi, say the drop in spending has hurt the economy.
sna: Vanoongorora nekunzvera, vakaita sa Abel Mwanyungwe, uyo anodzidzisa zvehupfumi paPolytechnic College yepa University of Malawi, vanoti kuderera kwemari iri kushandiswa nehurumende kwabva kwakuvadza zvehupfumi hwenyika.
mt0: <pad> Analitiki, sezvakataurwa naAbel Mwanyungwe, a lecturer in economics at the Polytechnic College of the University of Malawi, vanoti kuderera kwemari kwakanangana nenyaya yehupfumi.</s>

en: This has been a bumpy year as we are coming from the Cashgate effects that have quite a major dent on the economys performance.
sna: Iri ranga riri gore rizere kugujurwa sezvo tichiine mazvimbiswa eCashgate iyo yakasiya yakuvadza zvehupfumi hwenyika.
mt0: <pad> Izvi zvakave gore rakaoma sezvo tiri kubva kuCashgate effects izvo zvinoita kuti nyika inotambura zvikuru.</s>

en: We have seen that in most cases the very delicate and crucial departments and service providers have been affected, in the sense that we dont have enough drugs in the hospitals.
sna: Takaona kuti kazhinji kacho mapazi akakosha nemapoka anoita basa risingagone kusavapo ndiwo akanyanya kukanganiswa, semuenzaniso iye zvino hatichina mishonga inoringana muzvipatara.
mt0: <pad> Tinoona kuti munyaya dzakawanda dzinonyanya kudhura uye zvinokosha zvikamu uye vashandi vane basa vakabatwa, nekuti hatina mhuka yakakwana muzvipatara.</s>

en: In schools, in terms of teachers payments is not in time, said Mwanyungwe.
sna: Muzvikoro, mari dzemihoro yevadzidzisi haisikusvika nenguva, akadaro Mwanyungwe.
mt0: <pad> In schools, in terms of teachers payments is not in time, said Mwanyungwe.</s>

en: Mwanyungwe also links Cashgate to the recent depreciation of Malawis currency, the kwacha, which has resulted in strikes by various government workers demanding higher pay.
sna: Mwanyungwe akabatanidza Cashgate nekudonha kwehukoshi hwemari yemuMalawi, inonzi kwacha, izvo zvakonzera kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vehurumende vari kuda mihoro yepamusoro.
mt0: <pad> Mwanyungwe also links Cashgate to the recent depreciation of Malawis currency, the kwacha, which has resulted in strikes by various government workers demanding higher pay.</s>

en: For example, support staff for the judiciary have been on strike for six weeks, seeking a 45 percent pay increase which the government says it cannot afford because it has no money.
sna: Semuyenzaniso, vashandi vanotsigira mune zvemutemo vanga vachiramwa mabasa kwemasvondo matanhatu, vachida kuti mihoro yavo iwezderwe nezvikamu makumi mana nezvishanu kubva muzana iyo hurumende iri kuti haikwanise kuvapa nekuti haina mari.
mt0: <pad> Semuenzaniso, vashandi vanotungamira nyaya dzemutongo vakagara vachiratidzira kwemazuva matanhatu, vachida kuti vawedzere mari yavo ne45%, izvo zvinonzi hurumende haikwanise kuita izvi nokuti haina mari.</s>

en: Workers at Malawi's Anti-Corruption Bureau went on strike demanding a 70 percent pay raise until the government threatened to forfeit their December salaries if they did not return.
sna: Vashandi vanoshanda mubazi rinorwisana nehuori muMalawi reAnti-Corruption Bureauvakaramwa mabasa vachida kuwedzerwa mihoro yavo nezvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana kusvikira hurumende yavatyisidzira nekuvatorera mari dzavo dzemihoro wemwedzi waZvita kana vasina kudzokera kubasa.
mt0: <pad> Vanhu veMalawi's Anti-Corruption Bureau vakaenda kuratidzira vachida kuti vawedzere mari yavo 70 percent kusvika hurumende yakabva yavapomera kuti vaifanira kudzorerwa mari yavo yeDecember kana isina kubhadharwa.</s>

en: Mwanyungwe said the government can only avoid further strikes in 2015 if it makes efforts to restore donor confidence in the management of its public finances.
sna: Mwanyungwe akati hurumende inogona koga kunzvenga kumwe kuramwa kwemabasa nevashandi kana ikagona kuwanazve kuvimbika mumeso emasangano anobatsira nemari mumashandisiro ayinoita mari dzinofanirwa kuita mabasa anobatsira ruzhinji.
mt0: <pad> Mwanyungwe said the government can only avoid further strikes in 2015 if it makes efforts to restore donor confidence in its management of public finances.</s>

en: My fear is that if we dont have this donor confidence and donor support coming back to the economy, we may force the government to go into serious local borrowing that would lead to serious repercussions in terms of inflation, in terms of interest rates and this may have a sort of catch-catch lose situation, said Mwanyungwe.
sna: Chinondityisa ndechekuti kana tikasagona kugutsa vanotibatsira nemari nemari iyi ikasadzoka ichipindazve munezvehupfumi hwenyika, zvinogona kumanikidza hurumende kuti ikwerete mari kubva kumasangano emuno izvo zvinozoita kuti mari yemuno ishaye simba ukuwo mitengo yezvinhu ichikwrira, nekudhura kwemari ingakweretwe mumabhanga, yongova nyatwa yekunzi zindakupa zindakutorera, akadaro Mwanyungwe.
mt0: <pad> Ndiri kunetseka kuti kana donors doesn't trust us and support us, we may force the government to go into serious local borrowing that would lead to serious repercussions in terms of inflation, in terms of interest rates and this may have a sort of catch-catch lose situation, said Mwanyungwe.</s>

en: The donors are, among other things, demanding that the government prosecute all those involved in the scandal and strengthen its financial management system.
sna: Masangano anobatsira nemari vari kuda, pamusoro pezvimwe zvinhu, kusungwa kweavo vese vari munyaya yehuori iyi, uye kusimbiswa hwehurongwa nehwaro hwekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende.
mt0: <pad> Vanopa rubatsiro, pakati pezvimwe zvinhu, vari kuda kuti hurumende inofanirwa kuita mhosva kune vese vakapinda munyaya dzemari uye kuvandudza nzira dzakashandisa mukugadzirisa mari.</s>

en: Newton Kambala, the president of the Malawi Confederation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry, said the scandal rendered 2014 as "a very bad year for the business sector, because of huge debts that the government owes the private sector."
sna: Newton Kambala, mutungamiriri wesangano remubatanidzwa wemakambani anogadzira nekutengesa zvinhu muMalawi, yeMalawi Confederation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry, akati nyaya yehuori iyi yakabva yaita kuti gore ra2014 rive "gore rakaipisisa chose muchikamu chezvemabhizimisi, nekuda kwezvikwereti zvikuru zvemari inofanirwa kubharwa nehurumende kune vemabizimisi."
mt0: <pad> Newton Kambala, president of the Malawi Confederation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry, said the scandal rendered 2014 as "a very bad year for the business sector, because of the huge debts that the government owes the private sector, because of the huge debts that the government owes the private sector."</s>

en: He warned that if the situation persists, "2015 will be worse."
sna: Akayambira kuti kana mariro ezvinhu akaendera mberi, "2015 anenge akanyanya kushata."
mt0: <pad> He warned that if the situation persists, "2015 will be worse."</s>

en: In his state of the nation address last Saturday, Malawi president Peter Mutharika said his government is doing everything possible to address the problems caused by the Cashgate scandal.
sna: Mumashoko avo pamusoro pemamiriro enyika neMoigovera vapfuura, mutungamiriri weMalawi vaPeter Mutharika vakati hurumende yavo iri kuita zvose zvainogona kugadzirisa matambudziko akakonzerwa nehuori hweCashgate.
mt0: <pad> Muhurukuro yake yeState of the Nation yakaitwa nemusi waMugovera, Malawi president Peter Mutharika said his government is doing everything possible to address the problems caused by the Cashgate scandal.</s>

en: My government has strengthened the financial system to make sure that Cashgate never occurs again in Malawi.
sna: Hurumende yangu yasimbaradza hurongwa hwekushandisa nekuchengeta mari zvekuti huori nehumbavha hweCashgate haufe hwakaitika zvekare muMalawi.
mt0: <pad> Mwari anoda kuti Malawi ive nevanhu vakatendeka.</s>

en: We have resourced fairly well the law enforcement institutions, including the Anti-Corruption Bureau, so that they do a thorough independent job, prosecute all suspects, and recover the stolen resources where possible, said Mutharika.
sna: Tapa zvekushandisa zvakawanda zvinopa goneso kune vanoita zvemutemo, kusanganisira bazi rinorwisa huori reAnti-Corruption Bureau, kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo vakazvimiririra, vagoongorora vose vanofungidzirwa kuti vakapara mhosva, vagotora zvose zvinenge zvabiwa apo izvi zvichigoneka kuitika, vakadaro vaMutharika.
mt0: <pad> We have resourced fairly well the law enforcement institutions, including the Anti-Corruption Bureau, so that they do a thorough independent job, prosecute all suspects, and recover the stolen resources where possible, said Mutharika.</s>

en: Mutharika also said his government is implementing newly-adopted fiscal reforms that seek to grow the countrys economy by 5.5 percent in 2014, up from an estimated 5.0 percent in 2013.
sna: VaMutharika vakatiwo hurumende yavo yatanga kushandisa nzira itsva dzekuvandudza mashandisirwo anoitwa mari yebasa rehurumende izvo zvinoedza kukurisa zvehupfumu hwenyika nezvikamu zvisahnu nechidimbu kubva muzana muna 2014, pachiratidza kukwira kubva pazvikamu zvishanu chete kubva muzana muna 2013.
mt0: <pad> Mutharika also said his government is implementing newly-adopted fiscal reforms that seek to grow the country's economy by 5.5 percent in 2014, up from an estimated 5.0 percent in 2013, Mutharika said.</s>
